Only the principle of reciprocity is capable of stabilizing these complementarily or symmetrically adjusted behaviors either, in the first case, by the alternating permutation of a form of domination and submission in the two sexes or, in the second case, by the concomitant abandonment of radicalized forms of dominance behaviors.

因此，对米德而言，男性和女性身份的建构发生在两性关系动态的内在层面上，与身体生物学无关，尽管后者可能决定某些虚拟的互补性，这些互补性存在于父母/婴儿互动的阶段（母乳喂养期间鼓励/阻止嘴巴的被动接受或主动抓握，或通过鼓励或不鼓励括约肌控制来消除或保留粪便）。

For Mead, the construction of male and female identities thus occurs on the immanent plane of relational dynamics between the sexes and owes nothing to bodily biology, even though the latter may condition certain virtual complementarities, present from the stage of parent/infant interaction (with the passive receptiveness or active prehension of the encouraged/discouraged mouth during breastfeeding or the elimination versus retention of fecal matter by encouraging sphincter control or not).

这种理解性行为分化中先天与后天习得的理论框架，自相矛盾地同时捍卫了本质主义和存在主义的立场。对米德而言，女性并非天生，而是通过月经、分娩和更年期逐渐成为女性，这些阶段标志着男性生命中缺失的不可逆转的阶段，因此男性被迫以女性被禁止的活动为基础来定义其男性气质。尽管如此，本能的母性行为的本质被分娩方式的多样性所驳斥，即使“除非女性被教导否认其生育能力，否则她们仍可被称为母亲”。每当复杂活动（政府、科学、艺术、宗教、工业）只由单一性别进行时，文明的衰落就构成威胁。缺乏互动阻碍了对相互协调行为的创造力和发明力的激发：“如果一个社会剥夺了女孩以男孩被允许的方式运用她们的思想或身体的权利，这难道不是危险吗？”

This theoretical framework for apprehending what is innate and what is acquired in the differentiation of sexuated behaviors paradoxically makes it possible to defend essentialist and existentialist positions at one and the same time. For Mead, one is not born but rather becomes a woman—through menstruation, childbirth, and the menopause, marking the irreversible stages absent in the life of men, consequently obliged to define their masculinity on the basis of activities forbidden to women. Despite this, the instinctive nature of maternal behavior is refuted by the diversity of forms of childbirth, even if “women may be said to be mothers unless they are taught to deny their child-bearing qualities.” And civilizational decline threatens whenever the conduct of complex activities (government, science, art, religion, industry) is the preserve of a single sex. The lack of interaction precludes stimulation of the creativity and inventiveness of mutually adjusted behaviors: “is not the danger for a society to deny its girls the right to use their minds or their bodies in some way that is permitted to boys?”

虽然米德注意到一些研究表明活动节律与性别相关（男性交替进行剧烈运动和补偿性休息，女性则根据自身生物节律从事单调而持续的工作），但更应该强调的是，这种与生俱来的虚构实际上只存在于伊特穆尔人（Iatmul）之中。在萨摩亚，两性的节律相同，并由等级和年龄决定；在阿拉佩什人（Arapesh），男女在这两种节律风格之间交替；巴厘岛人对突然爆发式的工作毫无所知；而美国中产阶级女性则陷入了两难境地（尽管她们受过教育，可以自由选择配偶和职业，但结婚后却被分配了单调乏味的工作，而这些工作并不被视为劳动）。

While Mead takes note of studies showing that activity rhythms are sex-related (men alternating violent effort and compensatory rest, with women practicing monotonous and continuous work in tune with their biological rhythm), it is better to emphasize that in fact this innatist fiction only transpires among the Iatmul. In Samoa, the rhythms are the same for the two sexes and determined by rank and age; among the Arapesh, men and women alternate between these two rhythmic styles; the Balinese know nothing of sudden bursts of work; and middle-class American women are caught in a double bind (though educated to freely choose their spouse and employment, upon marrying they are assigned monotonous tasks not recognized as labor).

米德的实证描述和论述往往颇具说服力，但她的民族志和概括却饱受诟病，因为所描述的社会似乎被“扭曲”了。阿拉佩什人（Arapesh）的男女看起来同样温柔敏感，蒙杜古莫人（Mundugumor）的男女同样暴力且好斗，而尚布利人（Chambouli）的男女则与美国人截然相反。但她论证的核心观点依然不变：无论社会赋予男性和女性何种属性，这些属性都独立于生物学基础，而性别角色——我们今天所说的性别——在不同文化之间差异巨大；这是社会科学家和女权主义者从她的著作中汲取的教训，该著作对美国习俗的自由化起到了重要作用。

While Mead’s empirical descriptions and accounts are often persuasive, her ethnography and generalizations have come in for criticism, given the extent to which the societies described seem to have been “warped.” Arapesh men and women appear similarly gentle and sensitive, Mundugumor men and women similarly violent and aggressive, and Chambouli men and women inversely distinct from Americans. But the key point of her demonstration remains intact: Irrespective of the attributes a society confers on men and women, these are independent of the biological substratum, and sexual roles—what we today call gender—vary greatly from one culture to another; that is the lesson the social sciences and feminists have taken from this work, which was instrumental in liberalizing customs in the United States.

洛朗·贝尔格

Laurent Berger

玛格丽特·米德，《男性与女性：变化世界中的性别研究》（纽约：莫罗，1949 年）。

Margaret Mead, Male and Female: A Study of Sexes in a Changing World (New York: Morrow, 1949).

1949

1949

社会理论与社会结构：默顿为社会学提出行为准则

Social Theory and Social Structure: Merton Suggests a Code of Conduct for Sociology

罗伯特·K·默顿（1910-2003）所著的《社会理论与社会结构》虽然被誉为二十世纪社会学的伟大经典之一，但它并非通常意义上的著作，而是对不同时期关于不同主题的文本的整理。其千变万化的特性或许令人困惑，但切勿被其表象所误导：无论是分析个体行为的结构还是社会结构对个体的影响，考察群体和组织的动态变化，还是社会生活的基本机制，本书都构建了一个非常连贯的理论框架。随着章节的推进，默顿奠定了基础，即使不能构成一个完整的社会理论，至少也构成了一个社会学研究的总体框架。在本书后续的多个版本中，作者对这一框架进行了孜孜不倦的修改、补充和阐释（1968年版是至今使用最广泛的版本，长达702页，而1949年版仅有423页）。但从初版开始，这本书就包含了默顿社会学思想的要点，展现了他研究方法的独创性。它对卡尔·曼海姆的知识社会学以及芝加哥学派（尤其是威廉·托马斯）的某些贡献持开放态度，提出了一种新的功能主义观点，与当时占主导地位的结构功能学派截然不同，后者是由20世纪30年代在哈佛大学担任默顿导师的社会学家塔尔科特·帕森斯创立的。

Though feted as one of the great classics of twentieth-century sociology, Social Theory and Social Structure by Robert K. Merton (1910–2003) is not a book in the ordinary meaning of the term but a collation of texts written at different periods on various subjects. Its kaleidoscopic nature may seem disconcerting, but one should not be misled by this appearance: Whether analyzing the structures of individual action or the action of social structures on individuals, examining the dynamic of groups and organizations or the elementary mechanisms of social life, it deploys a very coherent theoretical matrix. As the chapters progress, Merton lays down the groundwork for, if not an overall theory of society, then at least a general framework for sociological inquiry. This framework was tirelessly reworked, supplemented, and explained by its author over the course of the book’s many subsequent editions (the 1968 edition, the most widely used today, runs to 702 pages, compared with the 423 pages of the 1949 edition). But from its first edition, the book contained the main points in Merton’s ideas about sociology, revealing the originality of his approach. It is open to Karl Mannheim’s sociology of knowledge and certain contributions of the Chicago school (particularly William Thomas), putting forward a new vision of functionalism that stood apart from the then-dominant structural-functional school, instituted by the sociologist who had been Merton’s mentor at Harvard in the 1930s, Talcott Parsons.

从一开始，默顿就表明他拒绝沉溺于当时典型的社会哲学的抽象概念。在他看来，重要的是社会学理论必须能够通过实证验证，并建立在严谨的调查方法之上。甚至可以说，正是这种纲领性意图赋予了他的著作以连贯性：即“规范”探究实践，尤其是以令人满意的方式将理论与实证探究联系起来。从这个意义上讲，这种方法旨在将分析性和规范性紧密结合起来：默顿试图为社会学专业建立一种“行为准则”——自1941年至1979年在哥伦比亚大学担任教授以来，他一直致力于社会学专业的组织工作。

From the outset, Merton stated his refusal to indulge in the abstractions of social philosophy typical of the period. To his mind, it was important that sociological theories be empirically verifiable and based on rigorous investigation methods. One could even say that this is the programmatic intent lending his work its coherence: that of “regulating” the practice of inquiry and especially of linking up theory and empirical inquiry in a satisfactory manner. In this respect, the approach is meant to be inseparably analytical and normative: Merton seeks to establish a sort of “code of conduct” for the profession of sociology—a profession he was ceaselessly involved in organizing from the chair he held at the University of Colombia from 1941 to 1979.

这套行为准则包含哪些内容？首先，默顿呼吁发展中层理论，并用实例阐释其益处。通过鼓励这些专注于社会现实特定方面的局部理论（例如，参照群体理论或社会流动性与分层理论），他力图打破非理论性的社会学以及脱离研究的一般理论。作为一名乐观主义者，他认为这种更为温和的自下而上的方法最终将带来知识的提升。

What does this code of conduct entail? First, Merton calls for the development of middle-range theories, illustrating their benefits by examples. By encouraging these local theories focused on a defined aspect of social reality (for example, the theory of reference groups or that of social mobility and stratification), he seeks to break both with atheoretical sociography and with general theory disconnected from inquiry. As an optimist, he thought that this more modest bottom-up approach would eventually generate gains in knowledge.

在此基础上，本书中的各种“范式论文”提出了研究方案以及用于探究的操作概念。它们的特殊性在于，它们囊括了一种理论观点（例如著名的“意外发现”（serendipity）概念，即在不刻意追求的情况下获得科学发现或技术发明的后果；或“自我实现的预言”（self-realizing prophecy），即通过改变行为主体的行为而实现的预测）。关于“社会学中的功能分析”的章节体现了这一策略，它系统地包含了对提交给读者的推理局限性的思考。默顿试图在“功能”这个棘手概念的使用中引入某种秩序，这个概念在20世纪40年代后期启发了他的大多数美国同事，他借此机会构建了一个他认为更为稳健的分析框架，尽管该框架仍有待未来的研究进行检验。尽管他的分类工作很有用，但并非所有工作都具有结论性：例如，显性功能和隐性功能之间的区分并没有产生预期的结果，因此并未真正被采纳。但对默顿来说，一个命题未能令人信服本身就是一个结果，因为验证它意味着要将那些最终令人失望的理论选项放在一边。因此，在“社会在《结构与失范》（1938）一书中，他提出了一种结构性方法来研究越轨行为的社会和文化起源，这导致了社会学和犯罪学的重大发展——直到范式枯竭。

On this basis, the various “paradigm-essays” composing the book present investigation protocols, along with operatory concepts for inquiry. Their specificity is that they encapsulate a theoretical viewpoint (such as the famous notions of serendipity, the effect of making a scientific discovery or technical invention without having sought to do so, or a self-realizing prophesy, a prediction that comes true by its modifying actors’ behavior). The chapter about “functional analysis in sociology” exemplifies this strategy, which systematically includes thinking about the limits of the reasoning submitted to the reader. Merton, seeking to introduce some order in the usage of the tricky notion of “function,” which was inspiring most of his American colleagues in the late 1940s, took the opportunity to lay down a framework for analysis that he deemed more robust, although still to be tested in future research. Though useful, perhaps not all his classificatory work is conclusive: For example, the distinction between manifest function and latent function did not produce the hoped-for results and was not really taken up. But for Merton, the fact that a proposition failed to convince was a result in itself because verifying it entails setting to one side theoretical options that turn out to be disappointing. Thus, in the chapter on “Social Structure and Anomie” (1938), he sets out a structural approach to the social and cultural origins of deviant behavior, which led to major developments in sociology and criminology—until the paradigm dried up.

通过收集《社会理论与社会结构》中已被大量引用的文章，默顿知道这可以提高他著作的知名度。事实上，这是他最著名的作品，比他认为是杰作的《站在巨人的肩膀上》（1965 年）更为出名。这些章节是方法论课程或社会理论史入门模块的指定阅读材料。这正是他所期望的，他习惯于先与学生分享他最初的想法，然后再将其整理成论文。尽管如此，《社会理论与社会结构》中的思想并没有具有普遍性。尽管在意大利和东欧人们广泛阅读默顿的作品，但在法国，人们对默顿的研究较少。虽然亨利·孟德拉斯 1953 年的法文译本（《社会学方法论》）取得了一些成功，但默顿在法国的贡献仍然局限于理论和方法方面，从而掩盖了他的许多实证见解。尽管如此，默顿的书仍然是一部经典之作，对研究产生了持久的影响，值得重新查阅，以作者推荐的阅读古典理论的态度为例：不盲目崇拜或崇敬，并不断关注批判性修订和实现。

By gathering articles in Social Theory and Social Structure that had already been copiously cited, Merton knew he would increase the profile of his book. Indeed, it is his best-known work, more so than On the Shoulders of Giants (1965), which he considered to be his masterwork. Chapters are given as assigned reading in courses on method or introductory modules to the history of social theory. This is what he expected, and he was used to sharing his initial ideas with students before consolidating them in his essays. Still, the influence of the ideas in Social Theory and Social Structure has not been universal. Though extensively read in Italy and Eastern Europe, Merton is less studied in France. While Henri Mendras’s 1953 translation into French (Éléments de méthode sociologique) met with some success, Merton’s contribution in France remained limited to matters of theory and method, thus occluding his many empirical insights. Nevertheless, Merton’s book is a classic that has exerted a lasting effect on research and is useful to re-consult, taking as one’s example the attitude its author recommended when reading classical theory: without fetishism or reverence, and with a constant concern for critical revision and actualization.

阿诺·圣马丁

Arnaud Saint-Martin

罗伯特·K·默顿，《社会理论与社会结构》（纽约：自由出版社，1949 年）。

Robert K. Merton, Social Theory and Social Structure (New York: Free Press, 1949).

1950

1950

社会学与人类学:莫斯与社会无意识的神圣化

Sociologie et anthropologie: Mauss and the Consecration of the Social Unconscious

《社会学与人类学》（Sociologie et anthropologie）一书的诞生源于一种误解。战后思想复兴亟需一部收录埃米尔·涂尔干侄子马塞尔·莫斯（Marcel Mauss，1872-1950）主要著作的选集，以重振其遗产。这为重新发现《礼物》（Essai sur le don，1923）和《身体技巧》（Les techniques du corps，1934）提供了契机，也让我们得以领略这位侄子的才华最终与其创始人祖先的才华相媲美。该卷还包括其他文本，即“Esquisse d'une théorie générale de la magie”（“魔法通论”，1902 年）、“Rapports réels et pratiques de la Psychologie et de la Socialology”（“心理学与社会学之间的真实和实际关系”，1924 年）、“Effect Physique chez l'individu de l'idée de mort suggérée par la Collectivité”（“集体暗示的死亡观念对个人的物理影响”，1926年）和“La notion de personne”（“人的类别”，1938年）。在修订过程中，出版商最终收录了与亨利·博沙（Henri Beuchat）合著的《爱斯基摩人的季节变迁》（Essai sur les changes saisonnières des sociétés eskimos），1904年。这篇预示了50年后美国文化生态学发展的文章的加入，使这本选集重新平衡了人类学的视角，无疑使它成为一本更佳之作。

Sociologie et anthropologie (Sociology and anthropology) is based on a misunderstanding. The postwar intellectual renaissance was in need of an anthology of the main texts by Marcel Mauss (1872–1950), Émile Durkheim’s nephew, to revitalize his legacy. This was an opportunity to rediscover “Essai sur le don” (“The Gift,” 1923) and “Les techniques du corps” (“Techniques of the body,” 1934) and appreciate that the nephew’s genius ended up rivaling that of his founding ancestor. The volume includes other texts—namely, “Esquisse d’une théorie générale de la magie” (“A General Theory of Magic,” 1902), “Rapports réels et pratiques de la psychologie et de la sociologie” (“Real and practical relations between psychology and sociology,” 1924), “Effet physique chez l’individu de l’idée de mort suggérée par la collectivité” (“The physical effect on the individual of the idea of death suggested by the collectivity,” 1926), and “La notion de personne” (“The Category of the Person,” 1938). Over the course of the revised editions, the publisher ended up including “Essai sur les variations saisonnières des sociétés eskimos” (“Seasonal variations of the Eskimo,” 1904), written with Henri Beuchat. The addition of this text, which anticipated the developments of American cultural ecology fifty years later, rebalances the anthology toward anthropology, undeniably making it a better book.

这本书并非一部文本合集，而是充分展现了莫斯令人眼花缭乱的理论想象力，同时也展现了他巨大的好奇心、多才多艺以及几乎可以涉猎任何事物的能力。这体现在书中讨论的主题以及所涉及的历史时期和文化中。他的论点以此为基础——以及所遵循的方法：《论唐》带有原始结构主义的倾向，《人的概念》则深刻地烙上了精妙的进化论（关乎道德秩序），而《身体的技术》则是文化主义的瑰宝。因此，人们倾向于区分两种“莫斯”：一种是把握某个客体或场域（互惠性、身体、季节性），以该术语的强意义来创造它，并且似乎从一开始就穷尽了所有可能的分析；另一种是探究同时代人所关注的问题，探讨魔法（即非理性）以及个体与集体的关系（即心理学与社会学的关系），或者提倡与战前非常流行的人格主义哲学进行对话。两位莫斯都出现在这个合集里，但显然是前者的贡献，无论它们被认为多么不完美或近似，仍然有能力用他们理论的力量和大胆让我们震惊。

Independent of being a collection of texts, the book displays Mauss’s dazzling theoretical imagination to the full, while also exhibiting his vast curiosity, versatility, and ability to turn his hand to virtually anything. This may be seen in the themes discussed—and the historical periods and cultures on which his arguments draw—as well as in the methods followed: While “Essai sur le don” is of proto-structuralist persuasion, and “La notion de personne” is profoundly marked by a nicely judged evolutionism (pertaining to the moral order), “Les techniques du corps” is a culturalist gem. Hence the tendency to distinguish between two Mausses: the Mauss who takes hold of an object or field (reciprocity, the body, seasonality), invents it in the strong meaning of the term, and seems to exhaust all potential analysis from the outset; and the Mauss who inquired into the preoccupations of his contemporaries, addressing magic (that is, the irrational) and the relationship between the individual and the collective (that is, how psychology relates to sociology) or advocating dialogue with personalist philosophy, which was very much in vogue just before the war. Both Mausses figure in this collection, but it is obviously the contributions of the former, however imperfect or approximate they may have been said to be, that still have the power to stun us by the power and audacity of their theory.

圣殿守护者乔治·古维奇委托列维-斯特劳斯撰写序言。这是一个严重的错误，误会也大到不能再大。他无疑期望这位刚从美国长期流亡归来的年轻人类学家会孜孜不倦地强调与涂尔干的渊源，并赞扬这位法国社会学派的优秀学生。列维-斯特劳斯却走上了截然相反的道路。在他那篇长文中，文风狂热，哲学色彩浓厚，穿插着一些尖锐的论述（“莫斯仍然相信可以建立一种象征主义的社会理论，而很明显，我们必须去寻找社会的象征起源”；“因此，民族学问题最终是一个交流问题”；“宇宙在我们开始知道它所意指什么之前就已经开始意指了”），他对莫斯的解读赤裸裸，赞扬与批评并存；他也借此机会为自己扫清障碍。列维-斯特劳斯当时刚刚出版《亲属关系的基本结构》 （ Les structures élémentaires de la parenté），其主要灵感来源是《论唐人》（Essai sur le don）；他自称是雅各布森的追随者，并开始与拉康对话，但对话很快就戛然而止。他当时的两个口号是“语言”和“无意识”。

Georges Gurvitch, the guardian of the temple, had entrusted Lévi-Strauss with writing the preface. This was a serious mistake. The misunderstanding could not have been greater. He no doubt expected the young anthropologist, just back from a long period of exile in the United States, to diligently emphasize the filiation with Durkheim and laud the good pupil of the French school of sociology. Lévi-Strauss pursued the exact opposite line. In his lengthy text with its feverish style and marked philosophical tones, punctuated with hard-hitting formulations (“Mauss still believes it possible to erect a social theory of symbolism, whereas it is quite clear that one must instead look for a symbolic origin for society”; “the ethnological problem is thus ultimately a problem of communication”; “the universe started signifying well before we started knowing what it was signifying”), he delivers a reading of Mauss that strips him bare, in which praise and criticism are equipoised; he also takes the opportunity to clear the ground for his own benefit. Lévi-Strauss had just published Les structures élémentaires de la parenté (The Elementary Structures of Kinship), for which “Essai sur le don” was the main source of inspiration; he claimed to be a follower of Jakobson and was starting a dialogue with Lacan, which would soon be cut short. His two watchwords at the time were language and unconscious.

尤其在《论唐》一书中，列维-斯特劳斯承认其前辈的伟大功绩，他超越了我们通常的范畴，将商品、地位和人置于互惠机制的同一层面。但他指责前辈未能洞察互惠原则背后的交换原则，这种原则存在于更深层次，即人类文化特有的普遍社会无意识之中。文化行为之间并无相似之处，尤其是在商品均衡流通方面；但所有人类文化都有一个共同的基础，那就是交换（女性交换）。列维-斯特劳斯对范畴的批评更为严厉。尽管莫斯理解范畴的文化本质，并委托人类学通过文化多样性来梳理范畴，但他并未意识到范畴直接源于语言，并必然植根于意义体系之中。然而，如果意义（换句话说，产生能指的认知能力）总是超过知识，那么后者的所有增加都意味着类别的重新调整。这个想法在《野性心灵》中以词形变化的形式再次出现。另一个令人眼花缭乱的想法是：hau和mana需要被视为“浮动能指”，或者没有任何特定所指的零能指，作为类别之间差距的调整变量。这个想法后来（在《神话学》的结尾）在列维-斯特劳斯的仪式理论中再次出现，他认为仪式是一个非意义空间，正是因为它是一个间隙空间，与神话不同，它充满了意义。

Concerning “Essai sur le don” in particular, Lévi-Strauss recognizes his predecessor’s great merit in transcending our ordinary categories and in placing goods, statuses, and people on the same plane in a mechanics of a reciprocity. But he reproaches him with not having seen the principle of exchange underpinning that of reciprocity, lying at a deeper level, that of a general and social unconscious specific to human culture. There is no similarity in cultural behaviors, notably pertaining to the balanced circulation of goods; but there is a common foundation to all human cultures, residing in exchange (of women). Lévi-Strauss’s criticism is even severer concerning categories. Although Mauss understands their cultural nature and entrusts anthropology with drawing up their inventory through cultural diversities, he does not appreciate that they issue directly from language and are necessarily embedded in systems of meaning. Nevertheless, to the extent that signification (in other words, the cognitive capacity to generate signifiers) always exceeds knowledge, all increases in the latter imply a readjusting of categories. This idea resurfaced in La pensée sauvage (The Savage Mind), in inflected form, for that matter. Another dazzling idea: The hau and the mana need to be thought of as “floating signifiers,” or as zero signifiers devoid of any specific signified, as adjustment variables for gaps between categories. This idea reemerged much later (at the end of Mythologiques) in Lévi-Strauss’s theory of the ritual as a space of non-signification, precisely because it was interstitial space that, unlike myth, was saturated in meaning.

这本书在莫斯与列维-斯特劳斯之间开辟了一片空间，前者敏锐的观察力和常识达到了白炽化的程度——因为归根结底，互惠互利能够建立社会联系，身体姿势能够响应文化所设定的规范，这几乎是常识的问题——而后者则雄心勃勃地试图将现实所提供的数据进行转化，借助语言结构所提供的模型，这种转化开辟了更大的阐释可能性。过去七十年来，社会科学的主要争论无疑都发生于这一空间之中，它们坚决抵制任何自然主义的诱惑。

This book opened up a space between Mauss and Lévi-Strauss, between the former’s faculty for observation and common sense taken to the point of incandescence—for, ultimately, it is almost a matter of common sense that reciprocity creates social ties or that bodily postures respond to codes laid down by culture—and the latter’s ambition to subject the data given by reality to transmutation, which, by virtue of the model offered by the structures of language, opened up greater potential for interpretation. And it is most definitely within this space that, over the past seventy years, the main debates of the social sciences have taken place, turning their back resolutely on any naturalist temptation.

埃马纽埃尔·德斯沃

Emmanuel Désveaux

马塞尔·莫斯，《社会学与人类学》（巴黎：法国大学出版社，1950年），克劳德·列维-斯特劳斯作序。2010年由PUF再版。该书大部分内容已被译成英文，出版有独立出版物（《魔法通论》 ，罗伯特·布莱恩译，伦敦：劳特利奇和基根·保罗出版社，1972年）；《礼物：古代社会交换的形式与理由》， WD·霍尔斯译，纽约：WW·诺顿公司，1990年；《社会学与心理学：论文集》，本·布鲁斯特译，伦敦：劳特利奇和基根·保罗出版社，1979年）。

Marcel Mauss, Sociologie et anthropologie (Paris: Presses universitaires de France [“Bibliothèque de sociologie contemporaine”], 1950), with a preface by Claude Lévi-Strauss. Republished by PUF, 2010. Most of the collection has been translated into English as separate publications (A General Theory of Magic translated by Robert Brain [London: Routledge and Kegan Paul, 1972]; The Gift: The Form and Reason for Exchange in Archaic Societies translated by W. D. Halls [New York: W. W. Norton & Company, 1990]; and Sociology and Psychology: Essays, translated by Ben Brewster [London: Routledge and Kegan Paul, 1979]).

1951

1951

极权主义的起源:阿伦特与极权主义的激进新颖性

The Origins of Totalitarianism: Arendt and the Radical Novelty of Totalitarianism

《极权主义的起源》问世六十多年后，我们不再需要“重读”它，因为这本书从未停止在世界各地以多种语言被阅读、研究和教授。该书于 1951 年 2 月在纽约以单行本形式出版，分为三部分：“反犹主义”、“帝国主义”和“极权主义”。然而，该书的开篇有一篇导言，这篇导言在 1958 年出版的第二版中被删去，之后再也没有被替换，不过从 1966 年出版的第三版开始，汉娜·阿伦特 (1906-1975) 选择为每部分都插入序言（其中一篇提出了指导她著作的三个问题：发生了什么？为什么会发生？这怎么可能？）。但最重要的是，《极权主义的起源》以简短的“结束语”结束，她认为这段话“不够有结论性”，于是在 1958 年将其删去，并用一段极大地影响了该书后续命运的文字取而代之。

Over sixty years after it first came out, it is not really a matter of “rereading” The Origins of Totalitarianism, for this book has never ceased being read, studied, and taught in many languages around the world. It was published in New York in February 1951 as a single volume, divided into three parts: “Antisemitism,” “Imperialism,” and “Totalitarianism.” However, it opened with an introduction that was cut from the second edition, in 1958, and never replaced, though as of the third edition, in 1966, Hannah Arendt (1906–1975) opted to insert prefaces to each of the three parts (one of which poses the three questions guiding her work: What happened? Why did it happen? How is it possible?). But above all, The Origins of Totalitarianism finished with brief “Concluding Remarks,” which she deemed sufficiently “inconclusive” to cut in 1958 and replace with a text that considerably shaped the book’s subsequent destiny.

另一点值得注意的是在阿伦特的笔记本中发现的一条简洁的记录，它对书中从未明确提出的问题提供了最有用的信息：“历史科学的方法：忘记所有因果关系。相反，分析事件中的因素。中心事件是事件突然结晶的事件。我的书名从根本上就错了；它应该叫做《极权主义的要素》。“这条记录的日期是 1951 年 6 月，就在她的书出版几个月后。但它只有一个直接影响——那就是阿伦特本人于 1955 年出版的德文译本的书名：《极权主义的要素和原始预兆》。

Another point of note is a concise entry found in Arendt’s notebooks that is most informative about a question never explicitly raised in the book itself: “Method in the historical sciences: forget all causality. Instead: analyze elements in the event. The central event is that in which events suddenly crystallize. Title of my book fundamentally wrong; it should have been called The Elements of Totalitarianism.” This entry is dated June 1951, just a few months after her book came out. But it only had one direct effect—namely, the title of its translation into German, by Arendt herself, which was published in 1955: Elemente und Ursprünge totaler Herrschaft.

这份简短的笔记和其他文件表明，阿伦特很快就意识到了两个问题：首先，她的书存在风险，因为这本书的思想工艺和风格属于“不朽的”历史，可能会让人觉得反犹太主义（与民族国家的衰落有关）加上帝国主义（与种族理论的日益盛行有关）不可避免地导致了极权主义统治；其次，她未能捕捉到一种政体类型的根本新颖性，这种政体类型既不能完全用过去来解释，也不能用古典或较新的暴政、专制和威权主义类别来想象。

This brief note and other documents show that Arendt soon reached two realizations: The first was the risk that her book, whose intellectual workmanship and style were that of “monumental” history, might give the feeling that anti-Semitism (linked to the decline of the nation-state) plus imperialism (bound up with the increasing prevalence of racial theories) led inexorably to totalitarian domination; second, she had not managed to capture the radical novelty of a type of regime that was not wholly explicable in terms of its past or conceivable in the classical or more recent categories of tyranny, despotism, and authoritarianism.

她目前的论点是，尽管所有已知的政治体制都致力于维护人类事务的稳定，但这两种极权主义都同样基于“运动规律”。她总结道：“共产主义宣传威胁人们，让他们错过历史的列车，无可救药地落后于时代，虚度一生，正如纳粹威胁他们违背自然和生命的永恒规律，让他们的血液遭受无法挽回的神秘恶化一样。” 从经验上讲，极权主义政权的特点包括：一党垄断组织群众、宣传的重要性以及秘密警察的决定性作用等。至于集中营和灭绝等较为隐晦的现象，我们只能牢记大卫·鲁塞特的公式：“普通人并不知道一切皆有可能。”

As it stood, her thesis was that while all known political regimes had functioned to maintain stability in human affairs, the two totalitarianisms rested alike on the “laws of movement,” which she resumed as follows: “People are threatened by Communist propaganda with missing the train of history, with remaining hopelessly behind their time, with spending their lives uselessly, just as they were threatened by the Nazis with living against the eternal rules of nature and life, with an irreparable and mysterious deterioration of their blood.” More empirically, totalitarian regimes were characterized by, among other factors, the monopoly one party exerted over organizing the masses, the importance of propaganda, and the decisive role played by the secret police. As for the more opaque phenomenon of concentration camps and extermination, it could only be approached keeping David Rousset’s formula in mind that “ordinary people do not know that everything is possible.”

这一切都是相当可观的成就，无疑足以使《极权主义的起源》在其时期及其后时期的格局中占据一席之地——尽管第一部分因试图推翻犹太人自认为是历史永恒受害者这一观点而略显失衡，尽管帝国主义的概念似乎直接出自历史学家的议程，尽管对纳粹和共产主义社会的分析因大量未公开的档案和新模型的使用而陷入混乱。但几乎在这本书出版的同时，阿伦特就确信它需要一份“补充”，而她1952年3月写下的几句话概括了这种直觉：“意识形态=观念的逻辑”。这成为了一部仅用几周时间就完成的著作的起点，而《极权主义的起源》在1955年德文译本和第二版出版时就以此为基础结束了。1958年美国版：在大约二十五页的篇幅中，《意识形态与恐怖》以无与伦比的力量重新整理了所有的材料，将极权主义现象的两个主要组成部分分离出来。

This is all a considerable achievement and would no doubt have sufficed to establish The Origins of Totalitarianism amid the landscape of its period and subsequent periods—despite the first part being thrown slightly off balance by the desire to overturn the vision that Jews supposedly had of themselves as eternal victims of history, despite the notion of imperialism seeming to be lifted straight from the agenda of historians, and despite the analyses of Nazi and communist societies being thrown into disarray by the flood of previously unreleased archives and the use of new models. But almost as soon as her book came out, Arendt was certain it needed a “supplement,” the intuition of which was encapsulated in a few words jotted down in March 1952: “ideology = logic of an idea.” This was the starting point for a text completed in just a few weeks and on which The Origins of Totalitarianism closed as of its German translation in 1955 and its second American edition in 1958: in the space of twenty-five or so pages, “Ideology and Terror” remarshals all the material with incomparable force, isolating the two major components to the totalitarian phenomenon.

我们已经注意到这本书的一些方面已经过时，原因与其作者无关。但有一个重要的观点依然清晰：谁还会读卡尔·J·弗里德里希的《极权主义》（1954）或弗里德里希和兹比格涅夫·布热津斯基的《极权独裁与专制》（1965），更不用说那数千页专门讨论极权主义标准的著作了？阿伦特和美国社会科学界最杰出的代表人物或许彼此保持着谨慎的距离，但事实简单而残酷：与其时代同步的“学术”文献已失去光彩，而这本非正统的著作仍然屹立于人们喜欢的领域之巅，但为什么不能位于“社会科学”之巅呢？至于意识形态与恐怖的结合，谁会否认它有助于理解当代现象呢？因此，为什么不也称其为“极权主义”呢？《极权主义的起源》的教训之一是，伟大概念的一个特性是，它们在发明之后的一段时间内仍然可用，在其创造者以外的学科中富有成效，并且适用于它们被伪造的对象以外的对象。

We have already noted the aspects of this book to have aged, for reasons in no way attributable to its author. But one major point remains undimmed: Who still reads Carl J. Friedrich’s Totalitarianism (1954) or Friedrich and Zbigniew Brzezinski’s Totalitarian Dictatorship and Autocracy (1965), not to mention the thousands of pages devoted to discussions of the criteria of totalitarianism(s)? Arendt and the most eminent representatives of the American social sciences might have maintained a wary distance from each other, but the facts of the matter are simple and cruel: An “academic” literature in tune with its epoch has lost its sheen, while this heterodox book continues to sit atop what one may call what one likes, but why not the “social sciences”? As for the pairing of ideology and terror, who would deny its use in rendering recent phenomena intelligible; hence why not also designate them “totalitarian”? One of the lessons of The Origins of Totalitarianism is that one of the specificities of great concepts is that they remain available for periods after their invention, productive in disciplines other than that of their creator, and applicable to objects other than those for which they were forged.

皮埃尔·布雷茨

Pierre Bouretz

汉娜·阿伦特，《极权主义的起源》（纽约：哈考特，布雷斯，1951 年）。

Hannah Arendt, The Origins of Totalitarianism (New York: Harcourt, Brace, 1951).

1952

1952

生命的知识：康吉莱姆重新定义生命原则

Knowledge of Life: Canguilhem Redefines the Principle of Life

乔治·康吉莱姆（Georges Canguilhem，1904-1995）的这部杰作看似杂乱无章的讲座和期刊文章，但其整体性却实实在在。在“思想与生命”的导言之后，本书分为三个部分，分别探讨动物生物学实验、细胞理论以及几个相关主题：“活力论”、“机器与有机体”、“生命及其环境”和“正常与病态”。1965年第二版新增了一章“畸形与畸形”。附录由纤维理论和细胞理论的注释以及关于大脑解剖学的摘录组成，这证实了本书尽管文笔有时略显枯燥，但并非一部系统性著作，即便它致力于一个单一的目标：在阐明“生命”属性的同时，解释思想如何理解在持续进化的众多生物——也就是“生命”——中发生的千变万化的现象。

Though this masterwork by Georges Canguilhem (1904–1995) looks like a disparate set of lectures and journal articles, its unity is nevertheless real. After an introduction about “Thought and the Living,” there are three parts about experimentation in animal biology, cell theory, and several correlated themes: “Aspects of Vitalism,” “Machine and Organism,” “The Living and Its Milieu,” and “The Normal and the Pathological.” A chapter about “Monstrosity and the Monstrous” was added for the 1965 second edition. The appendix—composed of notes on fibrillar theory and cell theory and an extract on the anatomy of the brain—confirms that this book, with its at times dry style of writing, is not to be read as a systematic treaty, even though it works toward a single objective: determining the properties of “life” while explaining how thought may understand a protean phenomenon transpiring in numerous beings in a state of continuous evolution—that is, “the living.”

第一条研究线索通过观察有机体来考察生命现象：其组成、功能障碍、发展以及与环境的相互作用。第二条线索则更具认识论色彩：康吉莱姆探究活力论和机械论等理论选择为何能持续如此之久，以及哪些思想能够促进我们对生命的认识，或者相反，阻碍我们认识生命。他指出，科学史对于勾勒理论可能性的领域至关重要，人类思维在其中追求其对可理解性的追求（因此，通过研究细胞理论来理解生物体的构成，引发了在连续塑性物质假说和异质部分组成假说之间的摇摆）。

A first line of inquiry examines the phenomenon of life by looking at the organism: its composition, dysfunctions, development, and interactions with the environment. The second is more gnoseological: Canguilhem asks why the theoretical options of vitalism and mechanism have lasted so long and what ideas further our knowledge of life or, on the contrary, impede it. He shows that the history of science is fundamental for mapping out the field of theoretical possibilities, within which the human mind pursues its quest for intelligibility (hence the study of cell theory to apprehend the constitution of living bodies brings out an oscillation between the hypothesis of a continuous plastic substance and that of a composition of heterogeneous parts).

通过探究整体与其部分之间的关​​联，康吉莱姆思考了生物体内部以及生物体与其环境之间建立的关系体系。与其寻求一个普遍的本质主义生命定义，不如将其视为“一种属性的秩序”——即“一种力量的组织和功能的层级结构，其稳定性必然岌岌可危”。其目标是探究众多内部和外部相互作用如何塑造生物体。他借鉴生理学、病理学、胚胎学和畸形学等不同领域的研究成果，展示了一种两阶段智力运作模式的优势：先识别元素，然后将其与更高层次的组织联系起来。康吉莱姆追随克劳德·伯纳德的脚步，指出将生物体分解为器官和功能只有在最初将生物体视为整体时才有意义：正是由于发现了体内血糖的调节机制，才有可能赋予胰腺功能。更广泛地说，生物体的功能取决于其与环境的关系。从这个意义上讲，疾病并不是一种可以量化衡量其异常程度的状态；相反，它是行动能力的一种改变，“是一种由极其低劣的规范所调节的生活节奏”。胚胎学和畸形学的研究也得出了类似的结论，因为在特定时刻看似可怕的东西，在进化的另一个阶段却是常态。

Through inquiry into how the whole may be linked to its parts, Canguilhem considers the system of relations established both within organisms and between organisms and their environment. Rather than seeking a universal essentialist definition of life, it is better to envisage it “as an order of properties”—that is, “an organization of powers and a hierarchy of functions whose stability is necessarily precarious.” The goal is to follow how numerous internal and external interactions fashion living beings. Drawing on various domains (physiology, pathology, embryology, and teratology), he demonstrates the benefits of a two-stage intellectual operation of identifying elements then connecting them to higher levels of organization. Following in the wake of Claude Bernard, Canguilhem shows that decomposing living beings into organs and functions is only pertinent if the organism is initially addressed as a whole: It is thanks to the discovery of the regulation of glycemia within the body that it was possible to assign a function to the pancreas. More broadly, the functions of an organism depend on its relations with its environment. In this respect, illness is not a state whose abnormality may be quantitatively measured; rather, it a modification of capacities for action, “a pace of life regulated by norms that are vitally inferior.” Works in embryology and teratology point toward a similar conclusion, for what seems monstrous at a given moment is the norm at another stage of evolution.

因此，“环境”的概念占据了核心地位。康吉莱姆借鉴雅各布·冯·于克斯库尔（Jakob von Uexküll）在动物行为学和库尔特·戈德斯坦（Kurt Goldstein）在病理学领域的发现，指出“生物体的特征在于它为自己创造环境，构建其环境”。这种摒弃将生物体视为适应外部约束的存在体的观念，具有两层含义：一是认识论的，二是人类学的。与其解释生命在物理化学宇宙中如何呈现，不如将每个生物体设想为一个感知运动和代谢中心，环境由此被感知和组织。正确理解的活力论，是一种不断尝试理解生物体通过发明新的功能和在世界中存在的方式，从而改变自身和环境的运动。与形而上学的活力论假设所有身体都存在一个生命原则相反，这种方法意味着观察单一组织的多样性。体现在每个生命个体身上。因此，机械论受到了批判，生物体与设计制品之间的类比被斥为彻头彻尾的认识论障碍。

The notion of milieu thus holds a central place. Drawing on discoveries in ethology (Jakob von Uexküll) and in pathology (Kurt Goldstein), Canguilhem states that “it is characteristic of the living that it makes its milieu for itself, that it composes its milieu.” This invitation to abandon conceptions that treat the organism as a being adapting to external constraints has two implications, one epistemological and the other anthropological. Instead of explaining how life appears within a physical-chemical universe, we need to envisage each living being as a sensory-motor, metabolic center from which the environment is perceived and organized. Vitalism properly understood is a constant attempt to understand the movement by which organisms transform themselves and transform their milieu by inventing new functions and ways of being in the world. Contrary to a metaphysical vitalism postulating a vital principle present in all bodies, this approach implies observing the diversity of singular organizations manifest in each living individual. Mechanism is thus critiqued, and analogies between living beings and designed artifacts are denounced as outright epistemological obstacles.

要构建真正的生物学概念，至关重要的是要摒弃我们固有的视角，不再仅仅从人类经验的角度来研究生命。然而，所有关于生命的知识都源于与世界的实用关系。因此，生命与其环境之间关系的这种逆转也具有人类学意义。安德烈·勒鲁瓦-古尔汉的著作指出，在进化过程中，人类的技术（医学、驯化）可以被视为改变环境的方式。关于生命，从来不存在任何直接的知识，只有通过技术过程（无论是物质的、知识的还是科学的）所中介的知识，借助这些技术过程，人类试图对生命过程采取行动，同时试图使其变得易于理解。

To forge authentically biological concepts, it is essential to decenter our perspective and not study life purely from our human experience of it. Yet it is in the pragmatic relation to the world that all knowledge of life originates. The implications of this reversal in the relations between the living and its milieu are thus also anthropological. André Leroi-Gourhan’s work is mentioned to point out that within evolution, human techniques (medicine, domestication) may be viewed as ways of transforming the milieu. There is never any immediate knowledge of life but only knowledge mediated by technical processes (be these material, intellectual, or scientific), thanks to which humans try to act on vital processes while seeking to render them intelligible.

康吉莱姆的著作揭示了探索生命不可逾越的实用主义视野，提出了一种连接技术（technè）与知识（épistémè）的独创方式，为超越传统科学史或任何巴什拉式认识论的路径铺平了道路。通过强调将生命知识——以及掌控生命的权力——置于语境中的必要性，本书为所有追随福柯研究生命政治或生命形式的人类学方法提供了深刻的启发。

By identifying an impassable pragmatic horizon for exploring life, Canguilhem’s work puts forward an original way of connecting technè and épistémè, paving the way for approaches that go far beyond traditional history of science or any epistemology of Bachelardian inspiration. By emphasizing the need to contextualize knowledge of—and power over—life, it offers profound inspiration for all anthropological approaches that, in the wake of Foucault, examine biopolitics or forms of life.

佩里格·皮特鲁

Perig Pitrou

乔治·康吉莱姆，《生命的知识》（巴黎：弗林出版社，1952年）。弗林出版社于1965年再版。斯特凡诺斯·杰鲁拉诺斯和丹妮拉·金斯伯格将其译为英文，题为《生命的知识》（纽约：福特汉姆大学出版社，2008年）。

Georges Canguilhem, La connaissance de la vie (Paris: Vrin, 1952). Republished by Vrin, 1965. Translated into English by Stefanos Geroulanos and Daniela Ginsburg as Knowledge of Life (New York: Fordham University Press, 2008).

1953

1953

历史之战：费弗尔宣布历史的未来

Combats pour l’histoire: Febvre Announces History’s Future

《为历史而战》（ Combats pour l'histoire）是一部旨在将历史建构为一门社会科学的文本汇编。该汇编收录了吕西安·费弗尔的纲领性文章、书评、关于学者的回忆录以及关于他那一代人经历的回忆。人们不可避免地会将这些文本置于写作的时代背景中，正如他本人无疑会做的那样。这些文本展现了从第一次世界大战前夕到第二次世界大战后所形成的情感。其中最动人的例子是他对马克·布洛赫的援引。《历史之战》由阿尔芒·科林出版社编纂，布洛赫的《历史的辩护》（ Apologie pour l'histoire， 《历史学家的手艺》）出版三年后，该出版社还出版了布洛赫和费弗尔于1929年共同创办的评论杂志《年鉴》。费弗尔（1878-1956）是一位弗朗什-孔泰地区的历史学家，他研究的时期包括腓力二世时期、宗教改革时期、“书籍的出现”时期以及拉伯雷和玛格丽特·德·纳瓦拉时期。他还将自己视为自己时代的历史学家，并要求他的同事也如此。

Combats pour l’histoire (Combats for history) is a compilation of texts whose purpose is to construct history as a social science. The collection is composed of Lucien Febvre’s programmatic articles, book reviews, reminiscences about scholars, and memories about the experience of men of his generation. One cannot avoid situating the texts in the periods when they were written, as he would no doubt have done himself. They reveal the sensibilities forged from the run-up to the Great War through to the aftermath of the Second World War. The most moving instance of this is his invocation of Marc Bloch. Combats pour l’histoire was compiled three years after the posthumous publication of Bloch’s Apologie pour l’histoire (The Historian’s Craft) by Armand Colin, the same publishing house that brought out Annales, the review that Bloch and Febvre had founded together in 1929. Febvre (1878–1956) was a historian of Franche-Comté at the time of Philip II, of the Reformation, of the “appearance of the book,” and of the time of Rabelais and Marguerite de Navarre. He also viewed himself as a historian of his time and demanded that his colleagues be likewise.

贯穿这三十三篇文本的线索，是他对历史学的看法：历史学是一门仍在孕育中的科学，其诞生才刚刚开始。我们可以将其划分为三个阶段：一门新兴学科的未来，当前为引领其发展而展开的斗争，以及其风格浸润于十九世纪文学散文的过去。费弗尔与我们现在所处境遇之间的差距，不可避免地令人震撼。他的作品既是侠义的介入，也是反思。仅举一例。例如，他的写作运用呼格和第二人称，与口语产生共鸣。事实上，这些文本中的许多最初都是由一位教授讲授的，而教授并不试图掩盖雄辩在其创作中所起的作用。然而，这种风格所营造的距离感需要理解为源于将当代读者与这些文字的作者分隔开来的历史。

The thread connecting these thirty-three texts is his view of history as a science still undergoing gestation and whose birth has only been announced. One may identify three phases: the future of an emergent discipline, present combats to usher it forth, and a past with a style steeped in nineteenth-century literary essays. One is inevitably struck by the distance that has opened up between Febvre and where we now stand. His pages are as much swashbuckling intervention as they are reflection. To mention but one instance, his writing, with its use of the vocative and second-person address, resonates with the spoken word. Indeed, many of these texts started off as lectures given by a professor who did not seek to conceal the role eloquence played in their composition. And yet, the feeling of distance generated by the style needs to be understood as stemming from the history separating the present-day reader from the author of these pages.

仅仅保留吕西安·费弗尔过时而戏剧性的表达方式是有失公允的。他批判但很少贬低他那个时代思想和学术领域中最根深蒂固的观念：公认的文学史叙事；思想史与文本产生和接受的社会条件的脱节；以国家空间为中心、视野狭隘，以及对时间流逝僵化、线性的思维方式。这些只是他指出的几个缺点。如今，令人震惊的是——这种对比如此鲜明——费弗尔倡导的那些对他一生都至关重要的评论，例如《综合评论》（Revue de synthèse）和《年鉴》（Annals），以及《形而上学与道德评论》（Revue de métaphysique et de ethics ）等。他将这些学术出版物视为表达、辩论甚至干预当代事件的场所。他或许不会抹去学术期刊与散文和观点期刊之间的区别，也不会将学术期刊仅仅局限于博学。

It would be unfair to retain solely Lucien Febvre’s dated and dramatic mode of address. He attacks yet rarely disparages the most firmly held ideas in the intellectual and academic setting of his period: the agreed narrative of literary history; the isolation of intellectual history from all consideration of the social conditions in which texts are produced and received; the narrow field of vision focusing on national space, taken as central, and a rigid, linear way of thinking of the passage of time. These are but a few of the shortcomings he flags. What strikes us today—the contrast being so pronounced—is the role Febvre advocated for the reviews that mattered in his life, the Revue de synthèse and the Annales, along with others such as the Revue de métaphysique et de morale. He views these scholarly publications as places of expression, polemic, and even intervention in contemporary events. He might not erase the distinction between scholarly journals and periodicals of essays and opinions, nor does he confine academic journals to mere erudition.

参与公开讨论绝不意味着将信仰转化为口号。正确的方法在于“化繁为简”。这种批判性探索面向知识工作的未来。但费弗尔近乎歉意地写道，期待不应伪装成预言。相反，正确的方法在于允许实验自然进行。因此，组织或重组历史学科需要深入的讨论和果断的方法。费弗尔在多个领域展开斗争，引领历史学家与历史语言学、社会心理学、地理学、文学研究、涂尔干传统中的社会学，甚至民族学进行对话。对社会科学的吸引力并不排斥对不同地点和时期的文化相似性进行研究。在《为历史而战》一书中，费弗尔与列维-施特劳斯一样，迅速发出警告：文化遗产面临着在全球范围内被侵蚀甚至混同的风险。

Taking part in public discussion in no way means converting beliefs into slogans. For the correct method consists in “complicating what seems too simple.” This critical exploration is turned toward the future of intellectual work. But anticipation, Febvre writes almost apologetically, should not dress itself up as prophecy. On the contrary, the correct approach consists in allowing experimentation to take its course. Hence, organizing or reorganizing history as a discipline requires firm discussion and a resolute approach. Febvre does battle on a great number of fronts, pulling in his wake the agenda of historians in dialogue with historical linguistics, social psychology, geography, literary studies, sociology in the Durkheimian tradition, and even ethnology. The attraction to social science does not exclude pursuing research on the cultural similarities of places and periods. In Combats pour l’histoire, Febvre, like Lévi-Strauss, is quick to raise the alarm that cultural legacies risk being eroded then conflated on a worldwide scale.

然而，历史学的未来并非仅仅由其对其他学科的开放性所定义。毕竟，声称某一学科已经封闭，往往是为了更好地彰显自身，而非对知识生活造成明显损害的做法。费弗尔所宣扬的历史，本应是一场集体研究。这一点在本书的多个章节中都有所阐述。这是贯穿全书的主要论点。书中大胆地接受了复制生命科学或地球科学实验室的呼吁。集体研究构建并整合了大量数据，旨在超越个案（最好的情况下）和轶事（最坏的情况下），并将不同的专业和问题联系起来，从而阐明一个共同定义的历史问题。

However, history’s future is not defined solely by its openness to other disciplines. After all, claiming a discipline has become closed is often a specter one raises to better set oneself apart, rather than a practice doing observable harm to intellectual life. The history Febvre announces was to be a collective exercise in research. This point is made in several chapters of the book. It is the main thesis running through the work. Calls to copy a life or earth sciences laboratory are bravely assumed. The collective work builds and combines a very large volume of data in order to move beyond individual cases (at best) and anecdote (at worse) and to relate different specialisms and issues to throw light on a conjointly defined historical problem.

费弗尔不仅将自己定位为这些调查方法和技术的制定者，他还希望参与到当今的议题中。正因如此，他提出的一些问题至今仍对我们具有启发意义。他拒绝以“种族”来定义“法国人”，认为居住在法国本土的“黑人、阿拉伯人和印度支那人”才是“真正的法国人”。他还断言：“在法国，对外国人没有敌意，除非他们带着自己的国家一起来，并在离开法国后原封不动地返回。” 这场辩论的论调在今天难道仍然有效吗？

Febvre not only sets himself up as the person to order these methods and techniques of investigation, but he also wishes to be involved in the issues of the day. That is why some of the questions he raises speak to us today. He rejects a definition of “being French” in terms of “race,” holding “Blacks, Arabs, and Indochinese” living in mainland France to be “authentic Frenchmen.” He also asserts that “in France there is no hostility toward foreigners, except perhaps if they bring their country with them and return with it unchanged at the end of their stay.” Are not the terms of the debate still valid today?

让-弗雷德里克·绍布

Jean-Frédéric Schaub

Lucien Febvre，《Combats pour l'histoire》（巴黎：Armand Colin [“经济、社会、文明”]，1953）。 Bouquins 重新出版，2009 年。

Lucien Febvre, Combats pour l’histoire (Paris: Armand Colin [“Économies, sociétés, civilisations”], 1953). Republished by Bouquins, 2009.

1954

1954

缅甸高原的政治制度:利奇对社会结构稳定性的批判

Political Systems of Highland Burma: Leach Explodes the Stability of Social Structure

《缅甸高地政治体系》由埃德蒙·利奇（1910-1989）在极其特殊的环境下撰写，展现了二战对社会科学的影响。这本书出自英国人类学界的杰出人物之一，是他1939年10月至1940年6月在缅甸进行田野调查的成果。战后，由于利奇的笔记、照片和田野素描在日军入侵期间被毁，这本书不得不根据记忆和历史文献进行彻底重写。

Political Systems of Highland Burma was written by Edmund Leach (1910–1989) under highly unusual circumstances, illustrative of how World War II affected the social sciences. The work of one of the preeminent figures in British anthropology, and the fruit of fieldwork in Burma from October 1939 to June 1940, the book had to be entirely rewritten after the war, based on memories and historical documents, for Leach’s notes, photographs, and field sketches had been destroyed during the Japanese invasion.

本书讲述了居住在缅甸北部山谷和山区的两个民族——克钦族和掸族。书中包含了此前未知的民族志数据，并以雄心勃勃、富有创新性的理论框架对其进行了解读。

The book is about two ethnic groups, the Kachin and the Shan, living in the valleys and mountainous regions of northern Burma. It contains previously unknown ethnographic data and interprets them in an ambitious and innovative theoretical framework.

利奇主要认为社会结构本质上是不稳定的，这颠覆了功能主义学派最杰出代表（阿尔弗雷德·拉德克利夫-布朗、迈耶·福特斯）的信念。后者认为社会角色和地位相互促进，以确保社会结构的稳定（“机械”或“有机”平衡）。在这样的框架内，变革是可能的，但变革仅限于两个平衡的、因此是静态的结构之间的过渡状态。利奇是最早驳斥这一模型的人之一，他揭示了所有社会结构运作中固有的转型动态（动态平衡）。在他看来，这些动态源于社会行为体对角色和地位的概念化，而由于权力关系的相互对立，这些概念化始终模糊不清。

Leach argues primarily that social structures are essentially unstable, upending the convictions of the most illustrious representatives of the functionalist school (Alfred Radcliffe-Brown, Meyer Fortes), who considered social roles and statuses as being mutually reinforcing to ensure the stability of a social structure (the “mechanical” or “organic” equilibrium). Change was possible within such a framework but limited to a transitory state between two balanced hence static structures. Leach was one of the first to refute this model, showing the dynamics of transformation inherent to the functioning of all social structures (dynamic equilibrium). To his mind, these dynamics derived from the conceptualizations that social actors have of roles and statuses, which are always ambiguous because of the power relations pitting them against each other.

他的分析出发点是克钦族内部存在的一种矛盾局面，即克钦族的政治组织形式有两种对立的：gumlao和gumsa。前者被 Leach 描述为“民主的”，是一种只在村庄层面存在的无头系统，权力在所有血统的代表之间公平分配，没有任何等级区别。后者是“专制的”，对应于酋长制模式，即一种中央集权的系统，以“贵族”和“平民”血统的区别为标志，以及连接村庄社区的金字塔结构，每个社区由世袭的贵族酋长领导，酋长直接服从于最高酋长。Leach 在区域层面进行的历史重构表明，某些目前实行gumlao或gumsa 的克钦村庄过去是按照相反的政治模式组织起来的。利奇运用民族志、语言学和史学资料，认为“甘萨”（gumsa）制度的存在源于某些克钦族酋长试图效仿掸邦王子（他们是掸邦王子的政治盟友）的行为，并效仿掸邦“公国”的等级组织。在此基础上，他以振荡模型的形式构建了一个社会变迁的普遍理论，其灵感源自维尔弗雷多·帕累托的移动均衡概念：在历史的长河中，克钦部落不断在甘萨和甘劳制度这两个对立的两极之间摇摆不定，由于结构性原因，它们从未以任何一种形式持久地体现出来。这两种政治类型的对比存在于理想层面而非经验层面，因为在实践中，主要人物将它们视为一个整体运动系统的两种可能取向，该系统能够适应灌溉水稻种植谷地居民与开垦山地居民之间复杂的关系。利奇顺便指出了这些理想模型（民族学家的模型、所研究社会的模型）与分析试图描述的经验现实之间必然存在的距离。

The starting point for his analysis is the existence of a paradoxical situation among the Kachin, who have a dual political organization comprising two antagonistic forms: gumlao and gumsa. The former, described by Leach as “democratic,” is a headless system only found up to the level of the village, in which authority is spread equitably between all the representatives of lineages without any distinction of rank. The second is “autocratic” and corresponds to the chiefdom model, that is, a centralized system marked by a distinction into “noble” and “common” lineages, and a pyramidal structure linking village communities, each led by a hereditary noble chief directly subordinate to a paramount chief. The historical reconstitution Leach conducts for the regional level reveals that certain currently gumlao or gumsa Kachin villages were in the past organized on the opposite political model. Drawing on ethnographic, linguistic, and historiographic data, Leach argues that the gumsa system owes its existence to certain Kachin chiefs having sought to imitate the behavior of the Shan princes, whose political allies they were, and emulate the hierarchical organization of the Shan “principalities.” On this basis he erects a general theory of social change in the form of an oscillatory model, drawing his inspiration from Vilfredo Pareto’s concept of moving equilibrium: Over the course of history, Kachin tribes perpetually oscillate between the two opposed poles of the gumsa and gumlao systems, without ever embodying either in lasting fashion, for structural reasons. The contrast between these two political types pertains to the ideal rather than the empirical plane, for in practice protagonists perceive them as two possible orientations for an overall system in motion that accommodates the complexity of relations between the populations in the irrigated rice-growing valleys and those on the cleared hills. Leach points out, in passing, the distance which necessarily exists between these ideal models (those of the ethnologist, those of the society studied) and the empirical reality that analysis seeks to describe.

因此，这本书是最早尝试解构当时盛行的“原始主义”族群概念的著作之一。与他的前辈不同，利奇并非从克钦族和掸族是两个起源迥异的群体，其趋同的迁徙运动仅仅汇聚于一处这一观点出发。他也不认为他们各自的文化构成了离散的独立单元；相反，两者之间的界限是模糊且相互依存的。由此，他预示了十五年后他最杰出的学生之一弗雷德里克·巴特（Fredrik Barth）所开展的关于族群的研究。

The book is thus one of the earliest attempts to deconstruct the “primordialist” conception of ethnicity that prevailed at the time. Unlike his predecessors, Leach does not start from the idea that the Kachin and Shan are two populations with distinct origins whose convergent migratory movements merely united in one place. Nor does he hold that their respective cultures form discrete independent units; rather, the boundaries between the two are porous and interdependent. He thereby prefigures the works on ethnicity undertaken fifteen years later by one of his most brilliant pupils, Fredrik Barth.

因此，《缅甸高地的政治体系》标志着一个转折点，它表明，与其采用传统的、以共时性视角审视某个族群的人类学专著，不如采用一种从历时性视角进行的跨族群、多中心研究方法。“克钦山区”的各个民族或许展现出诸多文化差异：掸族讲泰语，信奉佛教，从事灌溉水稻种植，使用水牛和犁，居住在由世袭王子统治的国家，世袭王子掌管着保护贸易路线的军事驻军。相反，克钦族讲几种不同的藏缅语，信奉万物有灵论，使用锄头耕种已开垦的土地，以部落形式居住在山区，等等。然而，他们在经济和政治上相互交织，并使用共同的仪式语言相互交流。利奇解释说，这种通过简单的“仪式行为”表达的语言，在所有人都能理解的层面上，“体现了群体在地位层面上的社会关系”。因此，它证明了以地区而非族群作为分析单位的合理性。

And so, Political Systems of Highland Burma marks a turning point, demonstrating that in the stead of a classical anthropological monograph about an ethnic group envisaged synchronically, it is appropriate to follow an interethnic and multicentered approach conducted from a diachronic perspective. The various peoples in the “region of the Kachin hills” might well display many cultural differences: The Shan speak a Tai language, are Buddhist, engage in irrigated rice cultivation, use buffalo and plows, and live in states headed by a hereditary prince with authority over military garrisons protecting trade routes. The Kachin, on the contrary, speak several distinct Tibeto-Burman languages, are animist, use hoes to cultivate cleared land, live in tribes in the mountains, and so on. Nevertheless, they are economically and politically entwined and communicate with each other using a shared ritual language. This language, performed through simple “ritual acts” understood by all, “says something,” Leach explains, about the social relations of the populations in terms of status. It consequently justifies taking the region, not the ethnic group, as the most appropriate unit of analysis.

这本刻意引发争议的著作使利奇声名鹊起，并将他介绍给了大众。自出版以来，它激励了一代又一代在政治、族群、亲属关系、仪式、神话以及社会模式等各个领域工作的社会科学家。

This deliberately polemical book made Leach’s name and introduced him to the general public. Ever since it was published, it has inspired generations of social scientists working in such varied fields as politics, ethnicity, kinship, ritual, myth, and social models in general.

帕斯卡尔·布歇里

Pascal Bouchery

埃德蒙·利奇，《缅甸高地的政治制度：克钦社会结构研究》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1954 年）。

Edmund Leach, Political Systems of Highland Burma: A Study of Kachin Social Structure (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1954).

1955

1955

视觉艺术中的意义：帕诺夫斯基用意义取代美

Meaning in the Visual Arts: Panofsky Replaces Beauty with Meaning

埃尔温·帕诺夫斯基（1892-1968）在介绍他广受赞誉的“图像学”时，曾举过一个简单的例子：他说，想象一下，一个人在街上看到我们时脱帽致意。我们的感知和实践经验首先让我们赋予这个小事件和普通物体基本意义。我们识别出形式和表达意图。如果我们知道相关的文化规范，我们的理解就会占据上风：我们可能会上升到第二个层次，将这个手势解读为礼貌的问候。从这个“传统意义”出发，我们可以得出“内在意义或内容”——在这个例子中，是这个人的道德画像，前提是我们将这个孤立的行为放在一组关于他的人格、环境、社会归属、先前行为等的更一般信息中。同样，一件艺术作品也可以分三个阶段来分析。在第一个“前图像学”阶段，我们识别出构成“图案”的纯粹形式；在第二个图像学阶段，我们发现了更广泛的“主题”，“体现在图像、故事和寓言中”；在第三个特定图像学阶段，我们试图掌握“揭示一个国家、一个时期、一个阶级、一种宗教或哲学信仰的基本态度的基本原则”，并将其具体化在一件作品中。

As an introduction to the “iconology” that won him acclaim, Erwin Panofsky (1892–1968) used a trivial example: Let us imagine, he says, that a man raises his hat as he sees us in the street. Our perception and practical experience allow us at first to give this little event and ordinary object a basic meaning. We identify the forms and an expressive intent. If we know the relevant cultural codes, our understanding then takes over: We may reach a second level and interpret the gesture as a polite greeting. From this “conventional meaning,” we could proceed to an “intrinsic meaning, or content”—in this instance, a moral portrait of the man, provided we place this isolated act in a set of more general information about his person, environment, social belonging, prior behavior, and so on. Equally, a work of art may be analyzed in three phases. During the first “pre-iconographic” phase, we identify pure forms making up the “patterns”; in the second iconographic phrase, we detect the broader “themes,” “embodied in images, stories, and allegories”; and during the third and specifically iconological phase, we seek to grasp “the underlying principles which reveal the basic attitude of a nation, a period, a class, a religious or philosophical persuasion” as particularized in a single work.

这三个操作——描述我们所见、识别所呈现的主题以及探寻内在意义——既相互区别又相互关联。帕诺夫斯基赋予艺术史学家和理论家的任务是完成前两个操作，从而达到第三个操作。这个三重方案最初构思于20世纪20年代，但后来经过多次修改，如今已成为人们对此有些厌倦，但它在 1955 年的美国引起了轰动，当时它出现在《视觉艺术的意义》的开篇，1969 年，Bernard Teyssèdre 在法语译本的前言中提到了它，法国的缩影中也出现了它。

The three operations—describing what we see, identifying the theme represented, and looking for intrinsic meaning—are distinct yet connected. The task Panofsky assigns to art historians and theoreticians is to conduct the first two in order to reach the third. This tripartite scheme, which he first conceived in the 1920s but subsequently reworked several times, is now viewed with a certain weariness, but it was sensational in 1955 in the United States, when encountered in the opening pages of Meaning in the Visual Arts, then in 1969 in the French microcosm when Bernard Teyssèdre referred to it in his foreword to the French translation.

这些提议究竟有何新颖之处？它出自一位德国学者之手。他曾任汉堡大学教授，师从恩斯特·卡西尔和阿比·瓦尔堡，1933年被纳粹禁止教学后，在新泽西州普林斯顿大学寻求庇护。用将潘诺夫斯基引介到法国的布迪厄的话来说，这些提议不仅是“有史以来对实证主义最精彩的挑战之一”，更以其博学幽默的笔触为艺术史提供了理论基础，从而为这门学科奠定了新的基石。探索“艺术作品的意义”意味着历史性地重塑作品，既要避开唯美主义者过度的情感，也要避开海因里希·沃尔夫林将内容与形式割裂的形式主义。更具体地说，其目标是用理性取代观者的感性，用意义取代美。这项工作将由一门“人文主义学科”来完成，该学科隶属于人文社会科学，即图像学。图像学的目标过去和现在都是，成为一门阐释和记录艺术作品中所展现的人类思维的科学。它既不是图像符号学，也不是源于言语语言学的视觉语言理论，而是一门能够理解艺术整体意义的文化科学分支。

What was so new about these proposals by a German scholar, a former professor at the University of Hamburg, a disciple of Ernst Cassirer and Aby Warburg, who, after being banned from teaching by the Nazis in 1933, found refuge at Princeton, New Jersey? Not only were they “one of the finest challenges ever directed against positivism” (in the words of Bourdieu, who introduced Panofsky to France), but they also provided, in an erudition tainted with humor, the theoretical bases for the history of art, thereby setting the discipline on new footings. For exploring the “meanings of a work of art” meant re-creating it historically, steering clear both of the emotive excesses of aesthetes and of the formalism of Heinrich Wölfflin, guilty of separating content from form. More specifically, the aim was to replace the beholder’s sensibility with rationality, replacing the issue of beauty with that of meaning. This was to be carried out by a “humanist discipline,” taking its place among the human and social sciences—namely, iconology, whose ambition was and is to be a science of interpretation and history of the human mind as manifested in artworks. This is neither a semiotics of the image nor a theory of visual language issuing from verbal linguistics, but the branch of a science of culture capable of apprehending overall meaning in the arts.

《视觉艺术中的意义》以令人眼花缭乱的例证，展现了如何超越图像学描述，达到一种无比严苛的图像学，从而能够重构象征价值的世界。如果没有一系列博学而又令人意外的分析的验证，潘诺夫斯基对方法论的揭示将永远不会产生如此深远的影响：这些分析探讨了人体比例理论、意大利文艺复兴时期眼中的哥特式、建筑中的矫饰主义、丢勒与古代的关系——以及最重要的，提香的《谨慎寓言》以及圭尔奇诺、普桑和弗拉戈纳尔作品中“阿卡迪亚中的我”的主题。

Meaning in the Visual Arts provides dazzling illustrations of how to move beyond iconographic description to reach an incomparably more demanding iconology that is capable of reconstituting the world of symbolic values. Panofsky’s methodological exposé would never have had such impact had it not been validated by a series of erudite yet surprising analyses: on the theory of human bodily proportions, on the Gothic as seen by the Italian Renaissance, on mannerism in architecture, on the relation between Dürer and antiquity—and above all, on Titian’s Allegory of Prudence and on the theme of Et in Arcadia ego in the work of Guercino, Poussin, and Fragonard.

这篇最终文本极其清晰、精妙，比其他任何文本都更能揭示帕诺夫斯基方法论的范畴和局限性。其影响显而易见。不仅存在于作者早期和晚期的伟大著作中（包括《作为象征形式的透视》、《西方艺术的文艺复兴和复兴》和《土星与忧郁》），也存在于受他启发的艺术史学家中，例如埃德加·温德和威廉·赫克歇尔。至于它的局限性，近几十年来，许多作者都对其进行了追溯，例如迈克尔·巴克桑德尔（《十五世纪意大利的绘画和经验》，1972 年）、斯维特兰娜·阿尔珀斯（《描述的艺术》，1983 年），尤其是乔治·迪迪-于贝尔曼（《面对图像》 ，1990 年）。主要的反对意见是，潘诺夫斯基在使用时代精神和民族精神概念时过于黑格尔化，仿佛一个时期的所有作品都属于同一个“有机统一体”；在构建他的知识结构时，他忽略了造型图案的能指功能；在将艺术作品视为供历史学家解读的话语时，他夸大了文学知识，压抑了图像可能具有的令人担忧、暴力或黑暗的一面。就像普桑画作中的牧羊人一样，他似乎对石棺上的“Et in Arcadia ego”铭文比上面的头骨更着迷。如今，许多专家（以及未来的专家）更喜欢阿比·瓦尔堡而不是帕诺夫斯基。我们很多人都想知道艺术作品是否可能包含“更多意义”。尽管如此，《视觉艺术中的意义》一书的作者确实彻底更新了我们对文艺复兴和中世纪的理解：脱帽致敬！

This final text, of remarkable clarity and subtlety, reveals better than any other the scope and limits of Panofsky’s method. Its impact is evident not only in the author’s great earlier and later books (including Perspective as Symbolic Form, Renaissance and Renascences in Western Art, and Saturn and Melancholy) but also among the historians of art he inspired, such as Edgar Wind and William Heckscher. As for its limits, they have been traced over recent decades by such varied authors as Michael Baxandall (Painting and Experience in Fifteenth-Century Italy, 1972), Svetlana Alpers (The Art of Describing, 1983), and especially Georges Didi-Huberman (Devant l’image [Confronting Images], 1990), with the main objections being that Panofsky remains too Hegelian in his use of the notions of Zeitgeist and Volksgeist, as if all the productions of a period belonged to the same “organic unity”; that in building his intellectual constructs he neglects the signifying function of plastic patterns; and that in considering the work of art as discourse for the historian to decipher, he exaggerates literary knowledge and represses the worrying, violent, or dark aspects an image may have. Like the shepherds in the painting by Poussin, he seems more fascinated by the inscription Et in Arcadia ego on a sarcophagus than by the skull above. Nowadays, many specialists (and would-be specialists) prefer Aby Warburg to Panofsky. Many of us wonder whether works of art may not contain “more than meaning.” Nevertheless, the author of Meaning in the Visual Arts has indeed drastically renewed our understanding of the Renaissance and the Middle Ages: hats off!

伊夫·赫桑特

Yves Hersant

埃尔温·帕诺夫斯基，《视觉艺术中的意义》（芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，1955 年）。

Erwin Panofsky, Meaning in the Visual Arts (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1955).

1955

1955

黑非洲社会学:巴兰迪尔对非洲的社会学解读

The Sociology of Black Africa: Balandier Sociologizes Africa

乔治·巴兰迪耶（Georges Balandier，1920-2016）于1948年抵达法属赤道非洲后，游历了加蓬和刚果殖民地。由此收集的大量资料构成了他1954年6月在索邦大学进行答辩的国家论文（thèse d'État）的基础。主要论文和次要论文于次年同时出版，分别题为《黑非洲当代社会学》（Sociologie actuelle de l'Afrique noire ）和《布拉柴维尔黑人社会学》（Sociologie des Brazzavilles noires ）。巴兰迪耶还创作了一部生动的回忆录，记录了他在“模糊的非洲”（Afrique ambiguë）旅行家和民族社会学家生涯的点点滴滴，该回忆录于1957年出版的《人地》（Terre Humaine）文集中。

On arriving in French Equatorial Africa in 1948, Georges Balandier (1920–2016) traveled around the colonies of Gabon and Congo. The considerable material thus gathered form the basis for his thèse d’État defended in June 1954 at the Sorbonne. The primary and secondary theses were published simultaneously the following year under the respective titles Sociologie actuelle de l’Afrique noire (Present-day sociology of Black Africa) and Sociologie des Brazzavilles noires (Sociology of Black Brazzavilles). Balandier supplemented these with his lively memoirs of his time as a traveler and ethnosociologist in Afrique ambiguë (Ambiguous Africa), published in 1957 in the “Terre Humaine” collection.

在 20 世纪 50 年代初的法国民族学中，巴兰迪耶是个非典型人物。20 世纪 40 年代初，他在人类博物馆学习古典民族学，之后转向社会学，尤其是通过乔治·古维奇的著作。最重要的是，他全身心地投入到阅读英国和美国人类学家的著作中，满怀热情地学习他们如何在近四分之一个世纪里致力于重新探讨殖民社会和被殖民社会（尤其是非洲）的文化适应、社会变革和现代化问题。此外，他还经常出入法国和非洲左岸的知识界，特别是以《非洲存在》杂志为基础的反殖民主义运动。这些影响的结合体现在 1951 年发表于《国际社会学手册》的文章《殖民境遇：一个理论概念》中。这篇著名的文章阐述了他所讨论的问题的主要论点此后，他投入了大量精力，这些精力一直延续到《当代社会学》的第一章。值得注意的是，他思想所基于的“情境”概念，其渊源不仅可以追溯到南非人类学家马克斯·格拉克曼的思想，还可以追溯到巴黎知识分子让-保罗·萨特的思想，萨特曾用“情境”（复数）作为他1947年出版的论文集的激动人心的标题。

In French ethnology of the early 1950s, Balandier was atypical. After studying classical ethnology at the Musée de l’Homme in the early 1940s, he went on to discover sociology, particularly through the work of Georges Gurvitch. Above all, he plunged into reading British and American anthropologists, enthusiastically learning how, for nearly a quarter-century, they had worked to renew the issues of acculturation, social change, and modernization in colonized and colonial societies, particularly in Africa. In addition, he frequented French and African intellectual circles on the Rive Gauche, particularly the anti-colonialist movement based around the journal Présence africaine. These combined influences materialize in “La situation coloniale: notion théorique” (The colonial situation: A theoretical notion), an article published in 1951 in Cahiers internationaux de sociologie. This text, which became famous, sets out the main argument in the issue to which he henceforth devoted his energies, appearing unchanged as the first chapter of Sociologie actuelle. It is remarkable that the notion of “situation,” on which his thoughts are based, traces its ancestry back not only to the ideas of the anthropologist of South African origin, Max Gluckman, but also to those of the Parisian intellectual Jean-Paul Sartre who had used it (in the plural) as the rousing title for his collection of articles published in 1947.

巴兰迪尔将其论文的衍生研究称为“社会学”，旨在表明其与传统非洲社会研究的突破，而非仅仅象征性突破。然而，《当代社会学》却给人一种相当经典的民族学专著的感觉，其中超过一半的内容是对加蓬方族人和刚果巴刚果人的比较研究，他详尽地描述和分析了他们的定居历史、栖息地和亲属结构，以及他们的象征性信仰。诚然，这部民族学著作主要致力于研究当下——二十世纪中叶这一特定时刻——的民族学。因此，巴兰迪尔坚定地将他的分析置于持续的文化和社会变革，以及由当今殖民“局势”引发的人口、宗教和政治危机与反应的视角之下。这种方法使他能够理解某些现象“揭示”了社会结构，并进而揭示了形成这种结构的过去和现在的历史动力。因此，正如巴兰迪尔所言，殖民时期出现的弥赛亚和先知运动不仅是文化萎靡的表现，更是“夺回主动权”的尝试。他更进一步，提出了一个创新的假设：对压迫性殖民行政和经济监督的暴力和结构化影响的抵抗，尤其体现在宗教形式中，其内容和表现形式很快在其政治维度和对既定秩序的有力批判中显现。换句话说，这些新兴宗教从根本上来说具有融合性，源于传统信仰与新基督教种子的融合，因此需要将其作为反殖民运动来分析。

Balandier sets out the work derived from his thesis as “sociology,” intended to signal the more than symbolic break with typical research into African societies. Yet Sociologie actuelle comes across as a fairly classical ethnological monograph, with over half the text being a comparative study of the Fang people in Gabon and the Bakongo people in Congo, in which he describes and analyzes at length their histories of settlement, their habitat and kinship structures, and their symbolic beliefs. It is true that this ethnology is intended primarily as an ethnology of the present moment—of the specific moment of the mid-twentieth century. Balandier thus resolutely situates his analysis within the perspective of ongoing cultural and social change and of the demographic, religious, and political crises and reactions triggered by the present-day colonial “situation.” This approach allows him to apprehend certain phenomena as “revealing” the social structure and, consequently, the past and present historical dynamics giving rise to this structure. Thus, the messianic and prophetic movements that appeared during the colonial period are not only an expression of cultural malaise but an attempt to “take back the initiative,” as Balandier notes. He takes this a step further, putting forward the innovative hypothesis that resistance to the violent and structuring effects of repressive colonial administrative and economic oversight transpires especially in religious forms, whose content and manifestations are soon revealed in their political dimension and powerful critique of the established order. In other terms, these new religions, which are fundamentally syncretic, since issuing from a combination of traditional beliefs and new Christian seeds, need to be analyzed as anti-colonial movements.

正在发生的重大变化之一当然是城镇的发展。巴兰迪尔甚至专门为此撰写了一篇著作，该著作取材于他的第二篇论文，考察了这些新的社会人口结构群体的所有个体和集体层面。在方法论创新中，他比较了布拉柴维尔的两个非洲地区，而将白色城镇放在一边。尽管克劳德·列维-斯特劳斯在《法国政治科学评论》上对这本城市人类学的前身给予了高度评价，但它在出版后的几年里并没有产生什么影响。事实上，《当代社会学》也遭遇了几乎同样的命运。因为巴兰迪埃对“民族学”、“社会学”和“人类学”这些术语的矛盾使用与当时这些学科的官方组织方式不符：民族学仍然主要研究“原始”社会，而社会学很少关注西方世界以外的地方。随着巴兰迪埃逐渐在学术界和研究机构中任职，他首先在 1954 年在高等研究实用学院 (EPHE) 的经济和社会科学部门任职，然后于 1957 年在那里创建了非洲研究中心； 1962年，他担任索邦大学教授，并在同一时期担任海外科学技术研究中心（Orstom）人文科学系主任，同时领导团队并指导博士生——他的方法才被非洲研究所采用。直到20世纪60年代中期，尤其是70年代，他的“现状”和城镇人类学才真正开始腾飞，并激发出一种多学科的主题分析思潮，尽管这种思潮并非正式意义上的学派，但他称之为“充满活力”和“批判性”的思潮。

One of the sizable changes taking place was of course the development of towns. Balandier even devoted an entire work to this subject, drawn from his secondary thesis, examining all the individual and collective facets of these new forms of social demographic grouping. In a methodological innovation, he compares two African districts in Brazzaville, leaving the white town to one side. This forerunner to urban anthropology produced little impact in the years immediately following its publication, despite a glowing review by Claude Lévi-Strauss in the Revue française de science politique. Indeed, Sociologie actuelle met almost the same fate. For Balandier’s ambivalent use of the terms “ethnology,” “sociology,” and “anthropology” sat ill with how the disciplines were officially organized at the time: Ethnology still predominated for “primitive” societies, while sociology paid scant attention to places outside the Western world. It was only gradually—as Balandier came to hold positions within academia and research institutions, first in the economic and social science section at the École pratique des hautes études (EPHE) in 1954, where he founded a Centre d’études africaines in 1957; then as professor at the Sorbonne in 1962 and as head of human sciences at the Office de la recherche scientifique et technique outre-mer (Orstom) at the same period, while heading teams and supervising doctoral students—that his approach was taken up by African studies. And it was only really in the mid-1960s and especially the 1970s that he saw his “current situation” and anthropology of towns take off and inspire, while not a school in the formal sense, a multidisciplinary thematic and analytic current that he described as “dynamist” and “critical.”

让·科潘斯

Jean Copans

乔治·巴兰迪尔 (Georges Balandier)，《黑非洲社会学现状：加蓬和刚果社会变化》（巴黎：法国大学出版社 [“当代社会学图书馆”]，1955 年）。 PUF 重新出版，1982 年。道格拉斯·加曼 (Douglas Garman) 翻译成英文，名为《黑非洲社会学：中部非洲的社会动态》（纽约：Praeger，1970 年）。

Georges Balandier, Sociologie actuelle de l’Afrique noire: Changements sociaux au Gabon et au Congo (Paris: Presses universitaires de France [“Bibliothèque de sociologie contemporaine”], 1955). Republished PUF, 1982. Translated into English by Douglas Garman as The Sociology of Black Africa: Social Dynamics in Central Africa (New York: Praeger, 1970).

1956

1956

权力精英:米尔斯与权力的没收

The Power Elite: Mills and the Confiscation of Power

查尔斯·赖特·米尔斯（1916-1962）是纽约哥伦比亚大学的教授，也是战后社会学的杰出人物，他经常被认为是一位知识分子惹是生非的人。在冷战高峰期，他呼吁东西方对话，支持古巴革命，并谴责美国民主的衰落，这疏远了该领域的大多数顶尖专家。即使在今天，他尖刻的、具有政治立场的写作也很少能让读者无动于衷。德怀特·艾森豪威尔总统任期内出版的《权力精英》无疑是他众多作品中讨论最多的一部。这是他三部曲中的第三部，前两部是描绘美国工会领袖的《新权力人物》（1948 年）和描述工薪中产阶级的《白领》（1951 年）。它分析了政治、经济和军事利益的纠葛。米尔斯指出，由具有相似背景、教育和生活方式的个人组成的少数群体掌握了权力，并有能力独自做出可能影响整个人口的决定。

Charles Wright Mills (1916–1962), a professor at Columbia University in New York and a prominent figure in postwar sociology, often came across as an intellectual troublemaker. At the height of the Cold War, he called for East–West dialogue, supported the Cuban revolution, and denounced the decline of American democracy—alienating most of the leading specialists in his discipline. Even today, his caustic, politically committed writing rarely leaves readers indifferent. The Power Elite, published under the presidency of Dwight D. Eisenhower, is no doubt the most discussed of his various works. It is the third in a trilogy, coming after The New Men of Power (1948), a portrait of US union leaders, and White Collars (1951), a description of the salaried middle classes. It analyzes the entanglement of political, economic, and military interests. Mills states that a minority, composed of individuals with similar backgrounds, education, and lifestyle, has confiscated power and has the single-handed capacity to make decisions likely to affect the population as a whole.

作为一名和平主义者，米尔斯对二战以来美国社会的军事化深感忧虑。有一本书给他留下了深刻的印象：弗朗茨·诺伊曼的《巨兽》（1942年）。纳粹德国的权力结构围绕着四个制度秩序：资本主义垄断、纳粹党、国家官僚机构和武装部队。永久的战时经济将这一切紧密联系在一起。米尔斯并没有将第三帝国和富兰克林·罗斯福领导下的美国混为一谈，但他也察觉到了类似的权力交织趋势。同样是在战争期间，他开启了一场密切的与汉斯·H·格特（1908-1978）的思想交流，格特是一位流亡者，将米尔斯引向了德国社会学。他们共同撰写了一篇社会心理学论文，为米尔斯后续的大部分著作提供了理论基础。这篇名为《性格与社会结构》（1953）的论文借鉴了两对主要作者的著作：一方面是西格蒙德·弗洛伊德和乔治·米德，另一方面是卡尔·马克思和马克斯·韦伯。前者展示了个体行为者及其心理如何与家庭等制度联系在一起，而后者则提供了一种从比较和历史的角度思考社会结构的方法。格特和米尔斯解释说，发达社会有五种主要的制度秩序：政治秩序、经济秩序、军事秩序、宗教秩序和亲属秩序。在每个时期，它们之间都会建立一种特定的关系，从而构成社会结构。两位社会学家认为，在他们所处的当代世界中，占主导地位的是“协调”：少数个人在强大的制度秩序之间流动，并确保他们的利益协调一致。

As a pacifist, Mills was worried by the militarization of US society since the Second World War. One book left a lasting imprint on him: Behemoth by Franz Neumann (1942). The structure of power in Nazi Germany was organized around four institutional orders: capitalist monopolies, the Nazi party, the state bureaucracy, and the armed forces. A permanent war economy bound the whole together. Without amalgamating the Third Reich and Franklin Roosevelt’s America, Mills detects a similar tendency toward the entwining of powers. It was also during the war that he started a close intellectual association with Hans H. Gerth (1908–1978), an exile who introduced him to German sociology. Together they wrote a treatise on social psychology that provided the theoretical basis for most of Mills’s subsequent works. Called Character and Social Structure (1953), the treatise draws on the works of two main pairs of authors: Sigmund Freud and George Mead, on the one hand, and Karl Marx and Max Weber, on the other. The first pair shows how individual actors and their psychology are linked to institutions such as the family, while the second pair provides a way of thinking about social structures from a comparative and historical perspective. Gerth and Mills explain that developed societies have five main institutional orders: the political order, economic order, military order, religious order, and kinship order. At each period, a specific type of relationship is built up between them, thus composing the social structure. In their contemporary world, the two sociologists considered it was “coordination” that prevailed: a handful of individuals circulated between the powerful institutional orders and ensured that their interests worked in concert.

《权力精英》一书描述了这种整合模式是如何在美国扎根的。它借鉴了各种各样的资料：历史学家的著作、新闻报道、对名人词典的定量分析等等。由于米尔斯希望覆盖最广泛的受众，本书的理论背景被部分省略。第一章“更高的圈子”阐述了其核心论点：据称，在警务、生产和通讯工具被垄断，家庭和宗教被边缘化，商业、军队和国家获得优势之后，美国经历了权力的逐步集中。随后，米尔斯介绍了权力精英的构成要素：“企业首领”、“军阀”和“政治理事会”，并抨击了多元主义理论家所捍卫的“均衡论”，因为在他看来，美国实际上是由一个“权力三角”统治的。

The Power Elite describes how this mode of integration took hold in the United States. It draws on very diverse sources: works by historians, press articles, quantitative analysis of dictionaries of notables, and so on. The theoretical background to the work is partly removed, for Mills wanted to reach the widest audience. The initial chapter, “The Higher Circles,” sets out the central thesis: The United States is said to have gone through a progressive centralization of power, after the monopolization of the tools of policing, production, and communication had marginalized family and religion to the advantage of business, the army, and the state. Mills then presents the components of the power elite, the “corporate chieftains,” “warlords,” and the “political directorate,” before attacking the “thesis of equilibrium” defended by theoreticians of pluralism, for to his mind, America was in fact run by a “power triangle.”

米尔斯的语气刻意带有争议性。但他对精英的思考方式却独具匠心。他拒绝接受意大利新马基雅维利主义理论家（加埃塔诺·莫斯卡和维尔弗雷多·帕累托）的观点，认为他们过于不严谨，倾向于将强势群体视为历史的主角。受韦伯的启发，他也拒绝提及“统治阶级”，而将“阶级”一词保留给其他阶级。精英阶层以一种经济视角来看待社会分层，并认为政治和军事决策在公共事务管理中同等重要。它们与经济的紧密联系使得国家不应沦为资产阶级的镇压工具。精英首先被定义为一个“地位群体”，其威望和说服力源于其成员所持有的制度地位。精英阶层也构成了一个由一系列相互关联的“小集团”组成的凝聚力群体。

The tone is deliberately polemical. But Mills’s way of thinking of the elite is original. He rejects Italian neo-Machiavellian theoreticians (Gaetano Mosca and Vilfredo Pareto), whom he views as too imprecise and inclined to consider the powerful as the main actors of history. Inspired by Weber, he also refuses to speak of a “ruling class,” reserving the term “class” for an economic approach to social stratification and positing that political and military determinations are equally important in the management of public affairs. They are even so entwined in the economy that the state should not be reduced to a repressive instrument of the bourgeoisie. The elite is defined first and foremost as a “status group” owing its prestige and power of persuasion to the institutional positions held by its members. It also constitutes a cohesive group formed by a set of interconnected “cliques.”

《权力精英》一书引发了广泛的评论。米尔斯将这些批评分为三类：“自由派”、“激进派”和“知识分子派”。他被指责对权力的理解过于单一（“一元论”），没有充分强调大企业的政治影响力，并且对决策的具体条件漠不关心。因此，这部著作引发了20世纪60年代和70年代政治学界的一系列争论。该书的出版也改变了米尔斯的职业生涯，使他成为国际知名人物。他的思想随后被英国新左派所接受。他还必须回应由他恶毒的指责所引发的攻击。在《社会学的想象力》（1959年）一书中，他将自己的模型应用于社会学家自身：在权力集中的影响下，社会学家要么屈服于官僚主义的指令，要么躲避高度抽象的理论，而不是服务于公众——而这正是米尔斯所倡导的“真理政治”所要求他们做的。

The Power Elite has received extensive commentary. Mills divided these critiques into three categories: “liberal,” “radical,” and “intellectual.” He was accused of giving too unitary (“monist”) a vision of power, of insufficiently emphasizing the political weight of big business, and of not being interested in the concrete conditions of decision making. The work thus triggered debates that marked political science in the 1960s and 1970s. Its publication also brought about a shift in Mills’s career, turning him into an international figure. His thought was subsequently taken up by the British New Left. He also had to respond to attacks sparked by his virulent accusations. In The Sociological Imagination (1959), he applied his model to sociologists themselves: under the effect of the centralization of power, they were submitting to bureaucratic command or taking refuge in highly abstract theory, rather than serving the public—as the “politics of truth” Mills advocated would have demanded that they do.

弗朗索瓦·德诺

François Denord

查尔斯·赖特·米尔斯，《权力精英》（牛津：牛津大学出版社，1956 年）。

Charles Wright Mills, The Power Elite (Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1956).

1957

1957

识字的用途：霍加特终于揭示了工人阶级文化

The Uses of Literacy: Hoggart Finally Casts Light on Working-Class Cultures

1957年《识字的用途》出版时， 《每日先驱报》的一篇文章宣称，理查德·霍加特（1918-2014）无疑是一位“愤怒的年轻人”，就像那些与新左派决裂、打破传统精英主义的作家和剧作家一样。与他们一样，霍加特出身普通——更具体地说，他出身于工人阶级，而他在这部难以归类的作品中试图描绘工人阶级的文化，这部作品如今已成为社会科学的经典之作。

When The Uses of Literacy came out in 1957, an article in the Daily Herald declared that Richard Hoggart (1918–2014) was no doubt an “angry young man,” like the authors and playwrights associated with the New Left who had broken with traditional elitism. Like them, Hoggart came from a modest background—more specifically, from the working class whose culture he sought to depict in this unclassifiable work, which has become a classic in the social sciences.

尽管《读写能力的用途》被视为1964年在伯明翰成立的当代文化研究中心（CCCS）的奠基著作之一，但它既是对同时代思想家的延续，也是一种突破。霍加特写作《读写能力的用途》时，是一位文学教授。在文化产品工业化、大众消费快速扩张和工人阶级演变的背景下，他与利维斯夫妇（FR利维斯是剑桥大学的英语文学教授，他的妻子QD利维斯是一位文学评论家）在极具影响力的评论《审视》中表达的担忧如出一辙。大众文化，尤其是受商业驱动的印刷文化（霍加特著作的副标题是《工人阶级生活面面观：特别关注出版物和娱乐活动》），不仅与正统经典相比，而且与“传统”流行文化相比也显得糟糕透顶。后者即使不再真实，至少也与这个阶级的价值观相符。这种描述毫无吸引力，而该书第二部分对这些大众市场文化产品的基调也非常……悲观，有时会转向文化衰落论的言论和价值判断。

Though The Uses of Literacy is read as one of the founding texts of the Centre for Contemporary Cultural Studies (CCCS) founded in 1964 in Birmingham, it is both an extension of and a break with the thinkers of his period. When he wrote The Uses of Literacy, Hoggart was a professor of literature. In the context marked by the industrialization of cultural products, the rapid expansion of mass consumption, and the evolution of the working classes, he shared the worries most notably voiced by the Leavises—F. R. Leavis was professor of English literature at Cambridge while his wife Q. D. Leavis was a literary critic—in the very influential review Scrutiny. Mass culture, particularly print culture subject to commercial imperatives (the subtitle of Hoggart’s book is Aspects of Working-Class Life with Special Reference to Publications and Entertainments), was distressingly poor, not only in comparison to the legitimate canon but also to “traditional” popular culture, which, if no longer authentic, was at least aligned with the values held by this class. This depiction brooked no appeal, and the tone in the second part of the book about these mass-market cultural products is very pessimistic, veering at times toward the rhetoric and value judgments of cultural declinism.

但正如斯图亚特·霍尔所指出的，“谱系并非命运”。霍加特曾是一名奖学金获得者，他并没有在一所面向上层中产阶级的名牌大学工作；相反，他在赫尔大学教授成人夜校课程，他的许多学生都是曾经的工人，后来重返学业。这正是他与利维斯家族的根本区别，也促使他在CCCS建立了另一个知识分子家族，其中包括雷蒙德·威廉姆斯、E.P.汤普森和斯图亚特·霍尔。在他看来，利维斯家族的错误在于专注于文本研究，而从未考虑过个体接受。本书第一部分（写于第二部分之后）的主旨如下：它详细描述了工人阶级的生活方式——他们的生活、思考、判断和欣赏方式——从而将强加于他们的文化产品重新定位到他们的生活方式中。错误在于，他假设个体就像橡皮泥一样，被大众文化的刻板印象所烙印。相反，霍加特认为，新的文化产品与工人阶级的传统价值观有着复杂的联系，他们积极地重新诠释这些价值观，以支持新的态度。此外，衰落论方法的第二个错误是屏蔽或低估了个人如何对待他们所消费的文化产品：讽刺、怀疑、漫不经心的消费、间接关注——所有这些都起到了抵抗和疏离的作用——对于理解人们在阅读小报或耸人听闻的杂志时究竟发生了什么至关重要。

But as Stuart Hall pointed out, “genealogy is not destiny.” Hoggart, a former scholarship boy, did not work at a prestigious university for the upper middle classes; instead, he taught evening courses for adults at the University of Hull, where many of his pupils were former workers who had resumed their studies. Here lay the fundamental break with the Leavises, leading him to establish another intellectual family at the CCCS, which included Raymond Williams, E. P. Thompson, and Stuart Hall. Where the Leavises went wrong, to his mind, was on focusing on textual study without ever taking individual reception into account.
