This legacy will survive, even were one to decide to dissolve the Indo-European perimeter into a field of universal comparisons and to open up the combination of social functions beyond the tripartite scheme.

阿诺·马塞

Arnaud Macé

乔治·杜梅齐尔，《神话与流行》，卷。 1，L'idéologie des trois fonctions dans les épopées des peuples indo-européens（巴黎：Gallimard [“Bibliothèque des sciences humaines”]，1968）。由伽里玛（“Quarto”）再版，1995 年。

Georges Dumézil, Mythe et épopée, vol. 1, L’idéologie des trois fonctions dans les épopées des peuples indo-européens (Paris: Gallimard [“Bibliothèque des sciences humaines”], 1968). Republished by Gallimard (“Quarto”), 1995.

1969

1969

后工业社会：都兰与新型社会的兴起

The Post-Industrial Society: Touraine and the Onset of a New Type of Society

1968年五月运动之后，法国知识界愈发坚定地被结构主义所束缚，常常与当时盛行的左翼思想保持一致，而社会学则在很大程度上遵循着“再生产”和“惯习”的范畴。这就是知识分子的生活。在社会和文化发生巨大变革的时代，许多人希望将其仅仅视为结构、机构和权威之间无情的博弈，因此驱逐了主体，有时甚至呼吁其消亡。

In the aftermath of the May 1968 movement, the French intelligentsia was ever more firmly in the grip of structuralism, often in tune with the prevailing leftism, and sociology largely adhered to the categories of “reproduction” and “habitus.” Such is intellectual life. At a time of formidable social and cultural change, many wished to view this as merely the implacable play of structures, apparatuses, and authorities and so chased out the subject, sometimes even calling for its death.

然而，人们对社会运动、自由理念、创造力以及由此产生的“后工业社会”（尽管“后工业社会”这一术语如今已不如以往）的兴趣并未因此而被冷落。1968年五月风暴仍在吹拂，标志着法国乃至全球正在兴起、构建和变革的事物。阿兰·图赖纳（生于1925年）在1969年出版的《后工业社会：后工业社会的诞生》 （La société post-industrielle: Naissance d'une société ）中，直面了这种“复兴的现代性”（其他人后来称之为“第二次现代性”）的构成要素。

Yet interest in social movements, ideas of freedom, creativity, and hence the subject (even though the term did not enjoy the success it does today) were not sidelined for all that. The wind of May 1968 was still blowing, flagging what was emerging, being built, and transformed in France and around the world. It was the components of this “renewed modernity”—others went on to speak of a “second modernity”—that Alain Touraine (born 1925) tackled head-on in La société post-industrielle: Naissance d’une société (The Post-Industrial Society), published in 1969.

我们先来探讨一下“后工业社会”的起源问题。尽管丹尼尔·贝尔的《后工业社会的到来：社会预测的一次冒险》于1973年出版，但他却是第一个提出“后工业社会”的人，图兰也欣然承认这一点。然而，贝尔看到的是工业社会的某种发展，而图兰却认为这是另一种社会的“诞生”。

Let us start by settling a matter of paternity. Even though Daniel Bell’s The Coming of Post-Industrial Society: A Venture in Social Forecasting came out in 1973, he was the first to speak of “post-industrial society,” as Touraine readily acknowledged. But where Bell saw a sort of development of industrial society, Touraine considered it to be the “birth” of another society.

1968年，一切尘埃尚未落定，图赖纳就出版了《五月运动》 （ Le mouvement de Mai ou le communisme utopique），其中已经透露了他下一本书的主题。他认为，学生这场运动预示着一个新社会的到来，在这个社会中，核心冲突不再是工人与劳工雇主之间的冲突。《后工业社会》探讨并分析了这种新型社会，并提出了理解它的社会学工具。

In 1968, before the dust had even settled, Touraine published Le mouvement de Mai ou le communisme utopique (The May Movement), in which the themes of his next book already transpired. He argues that the student movement heralded the advent of a new society in which the central conflict could no longer be that between workers and labor masters. La société post-industrielle addresses this new type of society, analyzes it, and proposes the sociological tools for understanding it.

历史行动如今采取何种形式？社会支配的消失并非因为劳工运动不再是主角。相反，它获得了新的形式，不再局限于剥削工人，而是在工业以外的领域运作，包括通讯、消费，以及图兰所说的大型组织的帝国主义。它关乎异化、操纵需求、侵入私人生活。在这种情况下，学术知识成为一个关键问题，而大学则成为一个决定性的机构。

What form does historical action now take? It is not because the labor movement is no longer the main protagonist that social domination disappears. Instead, it acquires new forms, no longer limited to exploiting workers but operating in domains other than industry, including communication, consumption, and, according to Touraine, the imperialism of large organizations. It is a matter of alienation, of manipulating needs, of intrusion into private life. Under these circumstances, scholarly knowledge becomes a crucial issue, and the university emerges as a decisive institution.

这个新社会需要一种新的社会学。图赖纳与那些用决策和政策社会学取代原则社会学的人（例如米歇尔·克罗齐尔）站在一起，反对“旧功能主义”和他称之为“新自由主义”的思维方式。他将“新社会运动”的研究置于社会分析的核心（这一表述后来获得了巨大的成功）。他的研究方向是理解集体行动是如何形成的，在这种行动中，“消费者成为生产者，成为其社会和文化的行动者”，并研究“历史的生产、权力的掌控、依赖性参与和创造未来的矛盾”。

This new society requires a new sociology. Touraine sides with those who replace the sociology of principles with that of decisions and policies (such as Michel Crozier, for instance), against the “old functionalism” and a way of thinking he calls “neoliberal.” He places the study of “new social movements” at the heart of social analysis (the expression went on to enjoy great success). His program was to understand how collective action is formed, in which “consumers become producers, actors in their society and culture,” to study “the production of history, the grip of power, the contradictions of dependent participation and inventing the future.”

因此，图赖纳设想“阶级社会”（或工业社会）将被“摧毁”，取而代之的是“新阶级”和“新冲突”，在这些冲突中，那些抗议“程序化社会”（这种新型社会的另一个名称）的人将反对技术官僚的权力。他建议区分对危机的反应（例如大学机构的反应）和构建社会运动（例如，质疑集体生活总体方向的学生运动）。他呼吁在休闲和商业的各个运作层面上采取新的方法，并最终提出：“社会学家的意义何在？”他的主要回应是：“只有社会学才能超越技术官僚的矛盾，以及以个人和集体创造力的名义进行的反抗，[……并且]重新发现我们社会的政治现实，揭示非个人控制背后的社会力量，以及反抗背后的社会运动。”

Touraine thus envisaged the “destruction” of “class society” (or industrial society) in favor of “new classes” and “new conflicts” in which those protesting against “programmed society” (another name for this new type of society) oppose technocratic power. He suggested distinguishing between reactions to a crisis (by university institutions, for example) and building a social movement (a student movement questioning the general direction taken by collective life, for instance). He calls for a new approach to leisure and to business at its various levels of operation, ultimately asking: “What is the point of sociologists?” His main response is that “only sociology makes it possible to move beyond the contradictions of technocracy and revolt in the name of personal and collective creativity [. . . and] rediscover the political reality of our society, to bring forth the social power lying behind the impersonal grip, and the social movements behind the revolt.”

这两本关于1968年五月运动和后工业社会的著作，是图兰职业生涯中的关键时刻，标志着“社会学干预”方法的诞生。众所周知，这种方法旨在将社会学知识的生产与赋予行动者权力联系起来，并邀请他们进行反思。这种反思聚焦于行动者自身对社会世界的解读方式，从而转变他们采取行动的能力。自20世纪70年代以来，这种方法催生了对学生运动、反核运动、区域主义、劳工世界的变革以及种族等各种主题的研究——所有这些都被视为新兴“新社会”的侧面。它们是由一个研究团队特别制作的，其中包括 François Dubet、Zsuzsa Hegedus 和我，后来又有 Nilüfer Göle、Farhad Khosrokhavar、Philippe Bataille 和其他许多人加入，他们与 Touraine 一起在社会运动研究中心工作，然后从 1981 年起在社会学分析与干预中心工作。

These two books, on the May 1968 movement and post-industrial society, were the decisive moment in Touraine’s career when the method of “sociological intervention” came into being. As is known, this consists in linking the production of sociological knowledge to the empowerment of actors, inviting the latter to reflect. This reflection, focusing on these actors’ own way of interpreting the social world, transforms their capacity to act on it. As of the 1970s, this approach gave rise to a proliferation of research on such varied themes as student movements, the antinuclear movement, regionalism, transformations in the labor world, and race—all conceived as facets of the emergent “new society.” They were produced especially by a team of researchers—including François Dubet, Zsuzsa Hegedus, and myself, joined later by Nilüfer Göle, Farhad Khosrokhavar, Philippe Bataille, and many others—who worked alongside Touraine at the Centre d’études des mouvements sociaux, then, as of 1981, at the Centre d’analyse et d’intervention sociologiques.

这些以及其他当前的发展，尤其是与主体性建构和全球化相关的发展，证明了《后工业社会》出版近五十年后，尽管不可避免地在某些方面已然过时，但它依然瞄准了正确的目标。因为我们尚未结束这个社会的诞生，我们仍然不知道该如何命名它，只能说它发生在前一个社会之后——它是“后”。

These and other current developments, particularly relating to the construction of subjectivity and globalization, prove that nearly fifty years after its publication, and despite having inevitably aged in places, La société post-industrielle still trains its sights on the right targets. For we are not yet done with the birth of this society, which we still do not know how to name, other than to say that it comes after the previous one—that it is “post.”

米歇尔·维维奥卡

Michel Wieviorka

阿兰·图兰（Alain Touraine），《后工业社会：社会的诞生》（巴黎：Denoël，1969）。 Leonard FX Mayhew 将其翻译成英文，名为《后工业社会：明天的社会历史：程序化社会中的阶级、冲突和文化》（纽约：兰登书屋，1971 年）。

Alain Touraine, La société post-industrielle: Naissance d’une société (Paris: Denoël, 1969). Translated into English by Leonard F. X. Mayhew as The Post-Industrial Society: Tomorrow’s Social History: Classes, Conflicts and Culture in the Programmed Society (New York: Random House, 1971).

1969

1969

宫廷社会：埃利亚斯将宫廷社会定义为文明进程的熔炉

The Court Society: Elias Defines Court Society as the Crucible for the Civilizing Process

当卢赫特汉德出版《宫廷社会》 （ Die höfische Gesellschaft ）时，作者诺伯特·埃利亚斯（Norbert Elias，1897-1990）已年届七十二岁。他唯一的另一本书《文明的进程》 （Über den Prozess der Zivilisation）三十年前在巴塞尔出版，是在1933年春离开纳粹德国后流亡期间创作的。他随后移居巴黎，并于1935年定居伦敦。

When Luchterhand published Die höfische Gesellschaft (The Court Society), its author, Norbert Elias (1897–1990), was seventy-two years old. His only other book, Über den Prozess der Zivilisation (The Civilizing Process), published thirty years earlier in Basel, had been written in exile after leaving Nazi Germany in spring 1933, when he moved to Paris before settling in London in 1935.

在动荡的战争年代和埃利亚斯的职业生涯中，这本1939年出版的书被遗忘了。1954年，他成为莱斯特大学的讲师，直到1969年，这本书才重新出现在德国知识界，由伯尔尼的AG Francke出版社首次重印。同年，埃利亚斯决定修改并出版他1933年完成的法兰克福大学教授资格论文，尽管未能通过答辩。虽然这两本书的出现引起了人们对埃利亚斯作品的关注，但直到它们以苏尔坎普出版社的平装本出版（《文明进程》出版于1976年， 《宫廷社会》出版于1983年）后，才成为德国社会科学的经典之作。

The 1939 book had been forgotten in the tumultuous years of war and in Elias’s career. In 1954, he became a lecturer at the University of Leicester, and it was not until 1969 that the book reappeared on the German intellectual scene with its first reprint by the Bern-based A. G. Francke publishing house. In the same year, Elias decided to revise and publish the Frankfurt University habilitation thesis that he had completed in 1933, though without being able to defend it. While the appearance of these two books drew attention to Elias’s work, it was only when they came out as Suhrkamp paperbacks (in 1976 for The Civilizing Process and 1983 for The Court Society) that they became classics in the German social sciences.

对埃利亚斯来说，“宫廷社会”需要从两个方面来理解。首先，宫廷被视为一个社会——即一种社会形态或结构（埃利亚斯称之为“形态”），其中个人通过相互依赖联系在一起，并受到特定的行为准则和行为控制。其次，“宫廷社会”被理解为一个拥有宫廷的社会，而宫廷是维持社会主导群体之间紧张关系平衡的关键要素，从而构建社会秩序。以及绝对君主权力的再生产，他利用各种精英之间的竞争。埃利亚斯将大部分注意力放在了十七世纪的法国宫廷上（尽管本书多次将其与封建宫廷、亚洲宫廷社会以及英国和德国宫廷进行比较），这表明法国宫廷是一个至关重要的机构，它使国王既能控制传统贵族，从而抵御王侯之间的竞争，又能保护贵族，利用贵族权力来平衡负责管理王国的司法官和财政官的权力。

For Elias, “court society” needs to be understood in two ways. First, the court is considered as a society—that is, as a social formation or configuration (Elias calls it a “figuration”) in which individuals are linked by reciprocal dependencies imposing specific codes of conduct and behavioral control. Second, “court society” is understood as a society endowed with a court that is an essential element in maintaining a state of equilibrium in the tensions between socially dominant groups and thereby in the construction and reproduction of the power of the absolute sovereign who plays on the rivalry between the various elites. The seventeenth-century French court, to which Elias devotes most of his attention (even though the book sketches out comparisons on several occasions with feudal courts, Asian court societies, and the English and German courts), shows that it was an essential institution allowing the king both to control the traditional aristocracy, thus warding off princely rivalry, and to protect it, using it as a counterweight to the power of the officers of justice and of finance in charge of administering the kingdom.

宫廷社会建立在三个自相矛盾的原则之上。首先，最大的社会差异往往存在于最接近的空间：在宫廷中，绝对神圣的国王时刻与贵族生活在一起，以此来维护自己与贵族之间的距离。因此，国王和廷臣的私人生活始终公开可见。其次，在宫廷社会中，个人的社会身份取决于其自我代表所获的认可或拒绝的认可。国王是这种表现的主导者，可以给予或收回他的恩惠，或调整宫廷礼仪中的等级顺序。因此，围绕礼仪等级的激烈竞争被视为社会权力的基准。第三，在宫廷中，维护社会优越性以服从为前提。贵族只有接受君主的驯服，才能展现其与司法官员之间的距离。国王也未能逃脱这种机制，因为他正是通过服从他强加于廷臣的礼仪才能够控制他们。

Court society is based on three paradoxical principles. First, the greatest social difference was experienced within the greatest spatial proximity: At court, the absolute and sacred king asserted the distance separating him from his nobility by living among them at every moment. Hence private existence, that of the king and of the courtiers, was always on public display. Second, in court society, the social identity of the individual is determined by the credit granted or refused to his or her self-representation. The king is master of this performance and may give or withdraw his favor or modify the order of the ranks in the court ceremonial. Hence the bitter rivalry about the ranks in the hierarchy of etiquette, taken as the benchmark of social power. Third, at court, asserting social superiority presupposes submission. It is only by accepting to be domesticated by the sovereign that the aristocracy may display the distance separating it from officers of justice. Nor did the king escape this mechanism, since it was by submitting to the etiquette he imposed on his courtiers that he was able to dominate them.

宫廷在专制国家的建立中发挥了至关重要的作用，专制国家赋予国王双重垄断权，即税收和合法使用暴力，从而剥夺了贵族权力的古老根基。宫廷也在埃利亚斯所说的“文明化进程”中发挥了核心作用。宫廷社会对情感和情绪施加了严格的控制，迫使个人内化稳定、具有约束力的自我约束机制，以审查自己的冲动，禁止暴力行为，并掩饰情感。宫廷生活要求参与者具备特殊的心理素质：观察他人以洞察其意图的技巧，观察自身以控制自身情感的能力，以及将规制宫廷礼仪法律的纪律内化。以这种方式强加和实践的“宫廷理性”定义了一种新的“人格结构”和一种新的“心理经济”，埃利亚斯用古老的词语“惯习”来指代它。

The court played an essential role in building the absolutist state, which attributed a dual monopoly to the king, over taxation and over the legitimate use of violence, thus stripping the aristocracy of the ancient foundations of its power. It also played a central part in what Elias calls “the civilizing process.” Court society imposed rigorous control over feelings and emotions, thus compelling individuals to interiorize stable, binding mechanisms of self-constraint to censor their impulses, to prohibit violent behavior, and to dissimulate feelings. Court life required special psychological properties of those participating in it: the art of observing others to detect their purposes, the capacity to observe oneself in order to master one’s passions, and the interiorization of disciplines regulating the laws of court civility. “Court rationality,” imposed and practiced in this way, defined a new “structure of personality,” a new “psychic economy,” that Elias refers to using the old word “habitus.”

埃利亚斯的主要著作《文明的进程》 （Uber den Prozess der Zivilisation）的第一部分于1973年被翻译成法语（名为《文明的进程》 La civilisation des mœurs），之后于1978年被翻译成英文，名为《礼仪史》。该书的第二部分于1975年以法语出版（名为《西方的动力》La dynamique de l'Occident），并于1982年以英文出版（名为《国家形成与文明》State Formation and Civilization） 。 《礼仪社会》的法语译本在《文明的进程》的上下两部分之间出版。英文版于1983年出版，即第二部分出版一年后。 1939 年文本分为英文和法文两部分，而且《道德社会》虽然写于《文明进程之上》之前，但实际上是后来翻译的，这掩盖了埃利亚斯观点的根本独创性。该观点将西方社会从中世纪到十九世纪漫长发展过程中权力运作的变革、社会结构的变迁以及心理经济的调整联系在一起。专制国家的建立、宫廷社会的形成和文明进程因此密不可分。今天阅读这本书，需要将其置于当时的时代背景中，才能体会到它在埃利亚斯整体作品中的地位，并将其与过去半个世纪以来许多拒绝或汲取其论点的作品进行比较。

The first part of Elias’s major book Uber den Prozess der Zivilisation (The Civilizing Process) was translated into French in 1973 (as La civilisation des mœurs) before being translated into English in 1978 as The History of Manners. The second part of the book was published in French in 1975 (as La dynamique de l’Occident) and in English in 1982 as State Formation and Civilization. The French translation of Die höfische Gesellschaft was published between the two parts of Uber den Prozess der Zivilisation. In English, it was published in 1983, one year after the second part. The separation of the two parts of the 1939 text, both in English and in French, and the fact that Die höfische Gesellschaft, though written earlier than Uber den Prozess der Zivilisation, was in fact translated later, obfuscated the fundamental originality of Elias’s perspective, which associated transformations in the exercise of power, changes to social structures, and modifications to the psychic economy over the lengthy course of Western societies, from the Middle Ages to the nineteenth century. The building of absolutist states, the formation of court society, and the civilizing process were thus inseparably bound together. On reading the book today, one needs to situate it in its time to appreciate where it stands in Elias’s work as a whole and to confront it with the many works that, over the past half-century, have either rejected or taken inspiration from its theses.

罗杰·查蒂尔

Roger Chartier

Norbert Elias，Die höfische Gesellschaft：Untersuchungen zur Soziologie des Königtums und der höfischen Aristokratie mit einer Einleitung：Soziologie und Geschichtswissenschaft（新：Luchterhand，1969）。埃德蒙·杰夫科特 (Edmund Jephcott) 将其翻译为英文《法院协会》(The Court Society)（牛津：布莱克威尔，1983 年）。

Norbert Elias, Die höfische Gesellschaft: Untersuchungen zur Soziologie des Königtums und der höfischen Aristokratie mit einer Einleitung: Soziologie und Geschichtswissenschaft (Neuwied: Luchterhand, 1969). Translated into English by Edmund Jephcott as The Court Society (Oxford: Blackwell, 1983).

1969

1969

族群与边界:巴特对族群概念的非实体化

Ethnic Groups and Boundaries: Barth Desubstantializes the Idea of Ethnic Groups

唯一与1969年出版的《族群与边界》联系在一起的名字是弗雷德里克·巴特（Fredrik Barth，1928-2016），尽管这本书实际上呈现了七项由不同的斯堪的纳维亚人类学家开展的研究，涵盖了苏丹、埃塞俄比亚、挪威、墨西哥以及（巴特本人提出的）阿富汗等多个领域。但本书的核心内容确实集中在约三十页的导言中，巴特在其中提出了一些理论命题，这些命题后来彻底改变了人们研究族群现象的方式。其核心思想是，族群性从根本上讲是社会组织问题，其次才是文化问题。族群只存在于彼此之间的关系中，并通过一系列因情况而异的（文化）特征来区分彼此。因此，民族学家需要考虑的不是客观差异和相似性的总和，而是行为主体自身认为重要的因素。由此看来，文化并非作为一种本质而存在，而是作为一系列标记的集合而存在。

The only name to have remained associated with the 1969 publication of Ethnic Groups and Boundaries is that of Fredrik Barth (1928–2016), though the book in fact presents seven studies, each by a different Scandinavian anthropologist, on such varied fields as Sudan, Ethiopia, Norway, Mexico, and (by Barth himself) Afghanistan. But it is true that the substance of the book is contained in the thirty or so pages of its introduction, in which Barth sets out theoretical propositions that went on to revolutionize how ethnic phenomena were approached. The central idea is that ethnicity is fundamentally a matter of social organization and only secondarily one of culture. Ethnic groups only exist in their relations to one another and are distinguished from one another by a set of (cultural) features that differ depending on the cases. What the ethnologist thus needs to consider is not the sum of the objective differences and similarities but what the actors themselves take to be significant. Viewed thus, culture does not transpire as an essence but as a repertoire of markers.

巴特的理论主要围绕边界问题展开（当然，边界是指社会意义而非领土意义）。一个族群的延续和存续，其根本在于维护其边界——如果与其他多个族群接触，则维护多个边界。因此，族群研究需要考察双方为维护、改变或可能废除边界而实施的进程。

Barth’s theory is built primarily around the question of boundaries (taken, of course, in the social, not territorial, meaning of the term). What is fundamental for the continuity and persistence of an ethnic group is maintaining its boundary—or boundaries, if in contact with several other groups. Research concerning ethnicity thus needs to examine the processes implemented by either side to maintain, alter, or possibly abolish boundaries.

这种界限是通过语言或其他类型的文化标记来定义的，从而可以将个体归入特定的群体。“表型”特征也可能发挥作用，而对这些身体特征的理解本身当然是文化的。正如任何界限都有两面性一样，将一个人归入一个确定的群体（即他们的归属）是一件密不可分的内外之事。换句话说，族群认同既由他人赋予，也由自身确认。这种认同具有约束力，将价值观和行为规范强加于个人。但这些规范可能会发生整体变化，而无需重新划定界限（族群认同可能会改变内容，但不会改变轮廓）。当新的环境或情况使整个群体感到尴尬或难以忍受时，就会出现这种情况。另一方面，如果只涉及单个个体，该人可能会试图通过“跨越界限”来解决困难，即通过改变群体（这可能源于一种选择，希望获得独立于特定问题的优势：巴特坚持方法论个人主义）。适用于个人的原则也适用于群体，无论是家庭还是其他类型的单位。

The boundary is defined using linguistic or other types of cultural markers, making it possible to assign an individual to a given group. “Phenotypical” characteristics may also come into play, where the apprehension of these physical characteristics is of course itself cultural. As any boundary has two sides, assigning an individual to a determined group (that is, their ascription) is an indissociably internal and external affair. In other words, ethnic identity is both assigned by others and validated by one’s own. This identity is binding, imposing axiological and behavioral norms on individuals. But these norms may undergo overall change without redrawing the boundary line (ethnic identity may change content without modifying the outline). This arises when a new context or situation makes them awkward or unbearable for the group as a whole. If, on the other hand, only a single individual is concerned, that person may seek to solve the difficulty by “crossing the line”—that is, by changing group (where this may result from a choice made in the hope of gaining advantages independently even of a specific problem: Barth adheres to methodological individualism). And what is true for individuals is also true for groups, be they families or other types of unit.

毫不夸张地说，《族群与边界》的出版引发了人类学族群研究的“腾飞”。西方民族学家长期以来对他们学科的同名对象很少（在理论上）感兴趣。族群主要被视为既定事实，定义和限制了他们的研究领域。但东方的情况并非如此，俄罗斯和苏联的民族志学家受到其国土上“族群”数量和质量多样性的启发——从庞大的高加索群体到西伯利亚的小民族——发展了一种独特的民族理论。该理论主要关注民族发生问题，基于一个庞大而封闭的进化论框架，其中民族的通用概念涵盖了原始时期的部落、奴隶制和封建时代的族群（或人民）以及资本主义和社会主义阶段的国家。

It is no exaggeration to say that the publication of Ethnic Groups and Boundaries led to a “takeoff” in anthropological research on ethnicity. Western ethnologists had long paid little (theoretical) interest to the eponymous object of their discipline. Ethnicity had primarily been taken as a given, defining and circumscribing their field of study. This was not the case in the East, where Russian and Soviet ethnographers, inspired by the quantitative and qualitative diversity of the “ethnic groups” present on their state territory—ranging from great Caucasian groups through to minor Siberian peoples—had developed a sui generis theory of ethnos. Focusing mainly on matters of ethnogenesis, this theory was based on a great—and closed—evolutionist scheme in which the generic concept of ethnos encompassed tribes from the primitive period alongside ethnic groups (or peoples) from the days of slavery and feudalism, together with the nations of the capitalist and socialist phases.

西方对理论的漠视一直持续到20世纪50年代的伟大比较研究（其中最具代表性的是乔治·彼得·默多克的《世界文化纲要》）。这些研究要求对构成研究主体的单位——即该领域经验性提供的“族群”（或“文化”）——进行精确而普遍的定义。许多尝试民族的定义往往基于选择所谓的相关定义特征（例如，语言和/或经济体系和/或地域和/或宗教），就像俄罗斯学术界对“族群”（ethnos）的定义一样。这导致了一种理论死胡同，其中充斥着各种相互竞争的定义。巴特的“哥白尼革命”打破了这种局面，它掏空了族群概念的实质，并将其与文化概念分离，从而将宏大的“跨文化”图式打入了认识论幻觉的坟墓。

The West’s indifference to theory lasted through to the great comparative undertakings of the 1950s (the most emblematic being George Peter Murdock’s Outline of World Cultures). These required precise and universal definitions of the units making up the corpus—that is, the “ethnic groups” (or the “cultures”) empirically provided by the field. There were many attempts at definition based on selecting supposedly pertinent defining features (e.g., language and/or economic system and/or territory and/or religion), as was the case for the ethnos of Russian scholarship. This led to a theoretical dead end in which there were diverse rival definitions. Barth’s “Copernican revolution” unblocked the situation by emptying the idea of ethnic group of its substance and unhitching it from that of culture, thus banishing great “transcultural” schema to the graveyard of epistemological illusions.

因此，它为一系列关于族群性运作的实证研究铺平了道路，即关于归属和“边界”维护过程的研究。然而，尽管今天看来难以回归纯粹的实体主义概念，但关于族群现象的本质和现实的争论仍在继续。尤其是，这种分类的本土意义问题仍然悬而未决。族群性是一种社会建构，但这并不妨碍它被体验为一种本质现实，即认知主义方法所称的行动者的原初性——当然，这可能包括“公共当局”和“民众”。

It therefore paved the way for an entire body of empirical research on ethnicity in action—that is, on the processes of ascription and “boundary” maintenance. However, while it might today appear inconceivable to return to purely substantialist conceptions, the debate continues about the nature and reality of ethnic phenomena. In particular, the question of the emic signification of this type of classification is still very much open. The fact that ethnicity is a social construct does not prevent this construct from being experienced as an essential reality, what a cognitivist approach would call the primordialism of actors—which may, of course, include “public authorities” and “populations.”

让-弗朗索瓦·戈西奥

Jean-François Gossiaux

Fredrik Barth 主编，《族群与边界：文化差异的社会组织》（奥斯陆：Universitetsforlaget，1969 年）。

Fredrik Barth, ed., Ethnic Groups and Boundaries: The Social Organization of Culture Difference (Oslo: Universitetsforlaget, 1969).

1970

1970

退出、发声与忠诚：赫希曼对不满情绪表达的理论

Exit, Voice, and Loyalty: Hirschman Theorizes the Expression of Discontent

1970年，阿尔伯特·赫希曼（Albert Hirschman，1915-2012）是发展经济学领域备受推崇的专家，他在该领域已出版多部著作，并成为拉丁美洲国家研究领域的权威。然而，《退出、呼声与忠诚》（Exit, Voice, and Loyalty）的出版标志着他职业生涯的转折点。凭借这本书，这位受过专业训练的经济学家赫希曼最终跻身于那些难以归类的作家之列，他们的学术研究跨越学科界限，并广泛地应用于社会科学的各个领域。事实上，这正是本书的抱负所在。赫希曼提出了一个非常普遍的问题：当行为主体对服务满意度下降或对参与某项联合行动感到失望时，他们可以选择采取哪些行动。他的目的是构建涵盖多个学科相关问题的概念，并构建一个模型，该模型同样适用于对所购商品不满意的消费者、对公共服务不满意的用户以及对其所属组织感到失望的活动家。

In 1970, Albert Hirschman (1915–2012) was a well-regarded specialist in development economics, a field in which he had already published several books and become a leading authority on Latin American countries. However, the publication of Exit, Voice, and Loyalty marked a turning point in his career. With this book, Hirschman—an economist by training—definitively joined the category of unclassifiable authors whose scholarship transcends disciplinary barriers and feeds into work right across the social sciences. Indeed, such is the book’s ambition. In raising the very general question of the forms of action available to agents when their satisfaction with a service drops, or when they are disappointed with their involvement in some joint undertaking, Hirschman’s purpose is to forge concepts for embracing problems relating to several disciplines and to construct a model that applies equally well to consumers dissatisfied with a good they have acquired, users unhappy with a public service, and activists disappointed by an organization to which they belong.

那么，当一项服务、一家公司或一个组织被认为存在缺陷时，人们该怎么办呢？赫希曼的答案之所以新颖，很大程度上在于其简洁性。他指出，在这种情况下，可以设想两种策略。要么用户（公民、消费者等）可以选择背叛（退出），即离开他们已经建立的关系，通过引发竞争进入另一种关系；要么他们可以选择大声疾呼（发声），表达他们的不满，以期改善现有的关系。当然，这两种策略并非总是适用。例如，在在垄断的情况下，退出策略实际上并不可行，因此表达不满的唯一方式就是大声疾呼。在其他情况下，大声疾呼是不可能的，或者成本太高，或者风险太大——例如在专制政体下——在这种情况下，退出将被视为一种特权，或许是以移民的形式。其他因素也可能影响这种选择，例如对公司或组织的忠诚，这可能会推迟叛逃，在某些情况下，还会鼓励人们大声疾呼，同时由于叛逃的威胁而更加重视他们的声音。赫希曼认为，管理者和领导者经常犯的一个错误是，他们认为如果客户或用户不退出或不发声，可能是因为他们已经感到满意。但也可能他们只是在表现忠诚，尽管内心深处充满不满。在这种情况下，如果情况变得更有利于叛逃或大声疾呼，他们的突然离职或突然抗议必然会让掌权者措手不及。

So, what may one do when a service, company, or organization is deemed wanting? The originality of Hirschman’s answer lies largely in its simplicity. He states that in such situations, two strategies may be envisaged. Either users (citizens, consumers, etc.) may choose to defect (exit)—that is, leave the relation they had established to enter another relation, by invoking competition—or they may choose to speak out (voice) to express their dissatisfaction, with the aim of improving the relation in question. Of course, these two strategies are not always available. For example, in the case of a monopoly, the exit strategy is not really feasible, and so the only way of expressing discontent is to speak out. In other circumstances, it is speaking out that is impossible, or too costly, or too dangerous—under authoritarian regimes, for instance—in which case it is exit that will be privileged, perhaps in the form of emigration. Other factors may guide this choice, such as loyalty toward a firm or organization, which may delay defection and, in certain cases, encourage people to speak out while giving greater weight to their voice because of the threat of defection. According to Hirschman, one of the mistakes managers and leaders often make is to consider that if clients or users do not exit or use their voice, it is probably because they are satisfied. But it is possible that they are merely being loyal, though profoundly discontent. In this case, should the conditions become more favorable to defection or speaking out, their sudden departure or abrupt protest will not fail to catch unawares those in charge.

这种方法的妙处在于，它并非将背叛局限于经济领域，将发声局限于政治行动，而是表明这种二律背反可能适用于大多数社会领域，从而帮助我们思考形形色色的情况，其中一些与“宏观”尺度相关，例如空间流动性，而另一些则与“微观”尺度相关，例如婚姻纠纷的管理。该模型的一大优点还在于其启发性：它引导我们思考背叛和发声之间可能存在的各种互动，尤其要分析这两种行动类型如何根据具体情况相互削弱或强化。这对概念的简单性也有利于以多种不同方式进行丰富、批判或扩展，事实上，许多经济学家、社会学家和政治学家后来都这样做了。这导致了许多令人振奋的复杂化，例如区分垂直发言（直接向当局发声）和水平发言（使个人能够分享诉求并为集体行动创造条件）。

The interest of this approach is that rather than limiting defection to the economic sphere and speaking out to political action, it shows that the antinomy may apply to most social realms, and thus it helps us to think about very varied situations, some of which relate to the “macro” scale, such as spatial mobility, while others relate to the “micro” scale, such as the management of marital disputes. The great merit of the model also lies in its suggestiveness: It invites us to think of the range of possible interactions between defection and speaking out and particularly to analyze the way in which these two types of action may, depending on the situation, either attenuate or reinforce one another. The simplicity of the conceptual pair is also conducive to being enriched, critiqued, or extended in many different ways, which in fact many economists, sociologists, and political scientists have subsequently done. This has resulted in many stimulating complexifications, such as the distinction between vertical speaking, directly addressing the authorities, and horizontal speaking, enabling individuals to share demands and create the conditions for collective action.

赫希曼曾评论道：“我认为，以一种两极化的方式呈现情况很重要，甚至可能要夸大那些能够弱化这些对立的知识和观察的成分。” “这就是为什么我通常会在我的作品的第一部分引入一些图式，这些图式然后在第二部分中对其进行批评，指出其局限性。”并且，秉承这种自我颠覆的倾向，赫希曼不断回到他的模型，重新定义其核心概念，并对其进行修改以回应某些反对意见或考虑新情况，例如柏林墙的倒塌，这导致他重新审视将叛逃和发声结合起来的可能方式。

“I believe it is important to present situations in a polarized way, perhaps even to exaggerate components of knowledge and observations that attenuate these oppositions,” Hirschman once observed. “This is the reason why I usually introduce, in the first part of my writings, some schema which is then exposed to critiques, pointing out its limitations, in the second part.” And, true to this propensity to self-subversion, Hirschman kept returning to his model to redefine its central concepts and modify them to respond to certain objections or take new situations into account, such as the collapse of the Berlin Wall, which led him to reexamine possible ways of combining defection and speaking out.

继此书之后，赫希曼又发表了其他著作，探讨利益观念的谱系、失望在参与动态中的作用以及反动修辞手法，这些著作都与《退出》、《发声》和《忠诚》一样成功。这或许至少部分归因于他独特的写作风格，可以说，这种风格建立在对清晰度的系统性承诺之上。因此，赫希曼在构建模型时选择的概念总是简单得令人信服，而恰恰是这种简单性，矛盾的是，却赋予了它们如此强大的操作能力和分析深度。因为正是这种简单性使它们能够“旅行”，鼓励概括，并尽可能接近赫希曼长期以来的梦想——社会科学的统一。

After this book, Hirschman produced others about the genealogy of the idea of interest, about the role of disappointment in engagement dynamics, and about reactionary rhetorical figures, all of which were as successful as Exit, Voice, and Loyalty. This is perhaps at least partly due to his particular style of writing, based, one might say, on a sort of systematic commitment to clarity. Thus, the concepts that Hirschman chose in building his models are always disarmingly simple, and it is precisely this simplicity that, paradoxically, endows them with such great operating capacity and analytical depth. For it is this simplicity that allows them to “travel,” to encourage generalization, and to get as close as possible to the Hirschman’s long-cherished dream—that of the unity of the social sciences.

雅尼克·巴特

Yannick Barthe

阿尔伯特·赫希曼，《退出、发言和忠诚：对企业、组织和国家衰落的反应》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1970 年）。

Albert O. Hirschman, Exit, Voice, and Loyalty: Responses to Decline in Firms, Organizations, and States (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1970).

1971

1971

战败者的视角：瓦赫特尔转换视角看待西班牙征服

The Vision of the Vanquished: Wachtel Switches Perspective on the Spanish Conquest

《征服者的视野》 （ La vision des vaincus ）长期以来在美国民族史研究中占据核心地位。在这部开创性著作中，内森·瓦赫特尔（生于1935年）帮助我们改变了对西班牙征服及其影响以及印第安社会如何应对“遭遇”创伤的看法。如果说这本书对一代又一代的研究者产生了如此大的影响，那不仅仅是因为它以全新的、坚决反欧洲中心主义的方式关注印第安社会的反应，从而对“征服的另一面”提供了独到的分析；也因为它开辟了一种新的思维方式，让我们能够理解所谓“没有历史”或“没有文字”的原始民族的历史和历史性体制。此外，在当代关于结构与经验现实以及结构与历史时间之间关系的辩论中，这本书提供了具体的证据，证明理解一种独立于时间的结构理性是可能的。

La vision des vaincus (The Vision of the Vanquished) has long held a central place in American ethnohistorical studies. In this pioneering work, Nathan Wachtel (born 1935) helped alter how we view the Spanish conquest, its effects, and how Indian societies responded to the trauma of the “encounter.” If the book has produced such an impact on generations of researchers, it is not solely for paying new, resolutely anti-Eurocentric attention to the reactions of Indian societies, thus offering an original analysis of the “other side of conquest”; it is also because it sets out a new way of thinking about the paths to follow in accounting for the history and historicity regimes of so-called primitive peoples “without history” or “without writing.” Additionally, taking its place within contemporary debate about the relationship between structures and empirical reality, on the one hand, and structures and historical time, on the other, the book provided concrete proof that it was possible to apprehend a structural rationality independent of time.

《虚荣的愿景》在殖民统治的语境下研究解构与重构，主要旨在理解印第安人的实践。这本书写于本土主义和第三世界主义运动盛行的时期，通过分析被统治者的实践，重新赋予了印第安人一些自主权。不，文化适应并不总是等同于皈依，也不一定意味着放弃本土传统。的确，印第安人曾通过反抗、千禧年运动和战争，试图重新掌控自己的历史。尽管前西班牙裔社会体系崩溃了，尽管西班牙人尽管美国改变了历史进程，使之对自己有利，但某些“传统”结构仍然继续存在。

While studying destructuring and restructuring within the context of colonial domination, La vision des vaincus seeks primarily to apprehend Indian praxis. By analyzing the practice of the dominated, this book, written at a period marked by nativist and third-worldist movements, reendowed Indian populations with some of their agency. No, acculturation has not always been synonymous with conversion or necessarily experienced as the abandonment of native tradition. Yes, through revolts, millenarian movements, and wars, Indians sought to regain control over their history. And though the pre-Hispanic social system collapsed, and though the Spaniards altered the course of American history to their advantage, certain “traditional” structures nevertheless continued to exist.

正是在这一点上，瓦赫特尔将这些社会从一种将其禁锢于古老命运的视角中解放出来。首先，他表明，即使在今天，征服的创伤仍然通过本土民间传说得到解读和重新诠释，从而不断更新着对过去的认知。其次，他坚持认为，抵抗和反抗并不意味着延续某种固定不变、永恒不变的传统。通过探索秘鲁印第安人的实践以及西班牙帝国南北边界，他揭示了文化适应作为一种过程，往往体现着对统治的拒绝，并表明印第安社会通过借鉴、创新和创造，在培育自身独特性的同时也在自我转型。在此，印第安人的抵抗并非某种纯粹消极的行动，旨在维护和回归前西班牙传统和社会组织模式。它也不是发生在某种“结构性无人区”之中。

It is precisely on this point that Wachtel extricates these societies from a vision confining them to their archaic fate. First, he shows that even today, the trauma of conquest is interpreted and re-signified through native folklore, which provides a constantly renewed vision of the past. Second, he insists on the fact that resistance and revolt do not mean perpetuating some fixed and timeless tradition. By exploring the praxis of Indians from Peru and the northerly and southerly limits of the Spanish empire, he shows how acculturation, taken as a process, often informs a refusal of domination and shows that Indian societies, through borrowings, innovations, and creations, have cultivated their specificity while at the same time transforming themselves. Here, Indian resistance does not correlate to some purely negative operation to preserve and return to pre-Hispanic traditions and modes of social organization. Nor does it take place in a sort of “structural no man’s land.”

《征服者的愿景》谨慎地打破任何本质主义，将印第安人视为其新历史中积极但有限的推动者，并探讨了所谓边境地区起义和抵抗的意义。关于西班牙人与奇奇梅卡人、西班牙人与马普切人接触历史的段落揭示了所研究群体中存在一定数量的技术创新、借鉴和创造。对奇奇梅卡人和马普切人的案例的介绍进一步反过来解释了征服者为何成功征服了印加帝国和阿兹特克帝国。西班牙人在伊比利亚美洲两端边境地区的失败很大程度上（但并非唯一）归因于所遇到的社会的性质：这些社会通常是游牧民族，组织成大量独立的社会政治单位，其成员不习惯生产剩余产品并缴纳贡品。因此，“文化适应”这一概念在分析中占据着关键地位，它指的是“两种文化接触所产生的所有互动现象”。文化适应在人文科学中处于战略地位，它为构建民族学和民族史的社会文化变迁理论奠定了基础。在此，瓦赫特尔区分了两种类型的文化适应：一种是强加的，一种是自发的。第一种与……相关一是有序接触，指本土文化向西方文化转化的过程；二是非有序接触，指西方文化成分融入本土文化的过程。

Being careful to break with any essentialism and to make the Indians the active though circumscribed agents of their new history, La vision des vaincus examines the meaning of revolts and resistance in so-called border zones. The passages about the history of contact between the Spanish and the Chichimeca, and the Spanish and the Mapuche, reveal the existence of a certain number of technical innovations, borrowings, and creations among the groups studied. Presentation of the cases of the Chichimeca and the Mapuche further and conversely explain why the conquistadores succeeded in conquering the Inca and Aztec empires. The Spanish failure in the border zones at either tip of Iberian America is largely (though not solely) attributable to the nature of the societies encountered: They were often nomadic, organized into a large number of independent sociopolitical units, and their members were not used to producing a surplus and paying a tribute. The notion of acculturation, designating “all the phenomena of interaction resulting from contact between two cultures,” thus occupies a key role in the analysis. Lying at a strategic point in the human sciences, it provides a way of laying the foundations for an ethnological and ethnohistorical theory of sociocultural change. Here, Wachtel uses a distinction between two types of acculturation: one which is imposed, one which is spontaneous. The first, associated with situations of managed contact, designates the process by which indigenous culture moves toward Western culture. The second, occurring in contexts of non-managed contact, relates to the integration of Western components in indigenous culture.

《祖先的回归》极大地改变了对殖民地美洲人口的研究进程。通过批判性地比较“征服舞蹈”中可察觉的过去表征以及现今秘鲁、危地马拉和墨西哥的美洲印第安人的民间传说，该书开创了一种历史方法（回归历史），以及一种研究本土历史体制的创新途径。在将民间传说理解为一种语言、一种集体的、匿名的创造物（可从中推导出形式逻辑）的过程中，该书延续了列维-斯特劳斯的结构分析，同时继承了集体心理学的遗产。因此，《祖先的回归》开创的进步的、结构性的历史——在《祖先的回归》（ 1990 年）中达到完全成熟——是所有人文科学（历史学、人类学和社会学）合作的中心时刻。

La vision des vaincus considerably altered the course of research into populations in the colonial Americas. Through critical comparison of the representations of the past detectable in “conquest dances” and the folklore of Amerindian populations in present-day Peru, Guatemala, and Mexico, the book inaugurated a historical method (regressive history), together with an innovative approach for studying native historicity regimes. In apprehending folklore as a language, a collective and anonymous creation from which formal logics may be deduced, it perpetuated the structural analysis of Lévi-Strauss while taking up the legacy of collective psychology. Hence, the progressive and structural history initiated in La vision des vaincus—which reached full maturity in Le retour des ancêtres (The Return of the Ancestors, 1990)—is a central moment in the cooperation of all the human sciences (history, anthropology, and sociology).

纪尧姆·博卡拉

Guillaume Boccara

内森·瓦赫特尔（Nathan Wachtel），La Vision des vaincus：Les Indiens du Pérou devant la conquête espagnole，1530-1570（巴黎：Gallimard [“Bibliothèque des histoires”]，1971）。由伽利玛（“Folio”）再版，1992 年。本和西安·雷诺兹将其翻译成英文，名为“被征服者的愿景：印第安人眼中的西班牙征服秘鲁，1530-1570 年”（Hassocks：Harvester Press，1977 年）。

Nathan Wachtel, La vision des vaincus: Les Indiens du Pérou devant la conquête espagnole, 1530–1570 (Paris: Gallimard [“Bibliothèque des histoires”], 1971). Republished by Gallimard (“Folio”), 1992. Translated into English by Ben and Siân Reynolds as The Vision of the Vanquished: The Spanish Conquest of Peru through Indian Eyes, 1530–1570 (Hassocks: Harvester Press, 1977).

1972

1972

内城语言：拉波夫捍卫语言及其社会用途的统一理论

Language in the Inner City: Labov Defends a Unified Theory of Language and Its Social Uses

1972 年，威廉·拉波夫（生于 1927 年）出版了《内城语言：黑人英语白话研究》，生成语法大获成功。从此，语言学的研究对象变成了属于同质社群的理想说话者-听众的个人方言。诺姆·乔姆斯基的纲领便捷地将研究分为两派，一派致力于解释语言能力，另一派则沿袭了结构方言学和语言人类学的思路，通过基于语言社会用途调查的描述来研究表演。这种灾难性的划分——由于根深蒂固的偏见而加剧，即能力和表演，“内部语言”和“外部语言”——构成了两个截然不同的研究领域。从这个角度来看，语言实践中可观察到的社会差异仅仅是附带现象。这彻底打破了语言学与社会科学的联系，特别是与人类学的联系。人类学是弗朗茨·博厄斯和爱德华·萨丕尔之后语言学的首选领域，而人类学则完全依附于心理学和生物学。

In 1972, when William Labov (born 1927) published Language in the Inner City: Studies in the Black English Vernacular, generative grammar was triumphant. The object of linguistics was henceforth the idiolect of the ideal speaker-listener, belonging to a homogenous community. Noam Chomsky’s program introduced a convenient division of labor between those whose purpose was to explain linguistic competence and those who, following on from structural dialectology and linguistic anthropology, contributed to the study of performance through descriptions based on surveys of the social uses of language. This disastrous division—strengthened by the tenacious prejudice that competence and performance, “internal language” and “external language”—formed two radically separate fields of study. Social variation observable in language practice was, from this perspective, merely an epiphenomenon. This completed the rupture with the social sciences, particularly with anthropology, the chosen field of linguistics since Franz Boas and Edward Sapir, in favor of its exclusive attachment to psychology and biology

《内城语言》是20世纪70年代语言学界为数不多的著作之一，它为那些无法屈从于这种劳动分工的语言学家们带来了希望。它可以被解读为对三个基本命题的论证，通过一个具体的案例：社会语言学本身就是一门语言学；变异与不变性一样，都是语言的一个事实；可以建立一个正式的体系来解释这一点。从实践的角度来看，尽管对语言社会异质性的研究构成了语言学研究的组成部分，但语言学项目的自主性只是相对的，需要与社会学和人类学的新思潮进行更多的合作。

Language in the Inner City was one of the rare works of linguistics in the 1970s to have given grounds for hope to linguists unable to resign themselves to this division of labor. It may be read as the demonstration, about a precise case, of three fundamental propositions: Sociolinguistics is a linguistics in its own right; variation is just as much a fact of language as invariance; a formal system to account for this may be built. As a practical consequence, although the study of the social heterogeneity of language formed an integral part of the program of linguistics, the discipline’s autonomy was only relative, and greater cooperation with new currents in sociology and anthropology was required.

这部专著延续了早期的研究，呈现了1965年至1968年在哈莱姆区进行的一项关于美国黑人白话（后来被称为非裔美国英语）的调查结果。拉波夫指出，这种白话只是美国英语众多方言中的一种，其独特的连贯性却被黑人社区的学校课程所忽视。鉴于它正处于乔姆斯基及其追随者所坚持的解释充分性领域，其雄心壮志显得尤为重要。基于变量规则的分析满足了构建形式模型（例如，评估规则数量）的认识论要求，该模型旨在证明说话主体的能力。因此，非裔美国白话英语中系词be的删除（he fast）和否定一致（It ain't no cat can't get in no coop）的句法规则以所有必要的形式严谨性呈现，并在美国英语的泛方言语法中讨论这些规则的地位。乔姆斯基定义的另外两种适格性类型，即描述性和观察性，也是如此，它们似乎更容易实现。拉波夫证明了使用问卷来判断白话的语法性是不可能的。一旦处理一种占主导地位的方言，调查关系就会破坏它试图掌握的对象。如果语言学家希望在同龄群体中记录，而又不让他们受到语言学家在场所带来的合法规范的约束，他们必须采用人种学方法来克服“观察者悖论”。

Carrying on from earlier research, the monograph presented the results of a survey conducted in Harlem from 1965 to 1968 on the Black American vernacular (later called Afro-American English). Labov shows that this vernacular is only one dialect among others in American English and that its specific coherence was ignored by school programs for the Black community. The ambition was all the greater given that it lay on the very field of explanatory adequacy held by Chomsky and his disciples. Analysis in terms of variable rules satisfy the epistemological requirements for constructing a formal model (for example, in terms of assessing the number of rules) seeking to demonstrate the competence of speaking subjects. Thus, syntax rules governing the erasure of the copula be (he fast) and those of negative concord (It ain’t no cat can’t get in no coop) in Afro-American vernacular English are presented with all the requisite formal rigor, with the place of these rules being discussed within a pan-dialectal grammar of American English. The same is true of two other types of adequacy as defined by Chomsky, descriptive and observational, which seem to be better attained. Labov demonstrates the impossibility of using questionnaires to obtain judgments about the grammaticality of the vernacular. As soon as one is dealing with a dominated dialect, the survey relationship destroys the very object it is seeking to grasp. Linguists must adopt an ethnographic approach in order to overcome the “observer paradox” if they wish to have recordings within the peer group without their being subjected to the legitimate norm by the linguist’s very presence.

与乔姆斯基一样，拉波夫不仅重视句法学和音系学，也重视语用学，并分析了个人经历叙述的叙事句法和言语辩论的序列结构。具体而言，本书旨在推广一种统一的语言及其社会用途理论。调查研究使我们能够明确交际能力与其所处的社会场域之间的关系。研究社交网络对于理解群体内部的语言变异至关重要，而这种变异与群体内部的语言变异密切相关。成员的融入程度（和忠诚度）（不像那些经常参加其他团体、与成年人接触更多的“跛脚”）。因此，拉波夫记录了一种在青少年帮派成员与其他帮派成员争夺地盘关系中起着核心作用的活动——即互相进行仪式性的侮辱。在从语法到互动的转变中，拉波夫直接为会话分析和传播民族志做出了贡献，他在《治疗性话语》（1977）中重复了这一做法。

Like Chomsky, Labov gives a central place to syntax and phonology but also to pragmatics, with analyses of the narrative syntax of accounts of personal experience and the sequential structure of verbal duels. In very concrete terms, the book seeks to promote a unified theory of language and its social uses. Surveys make it possible to specify the relationship between communicative competence and the social field where it is deployed. Studying the networks of sociability is indispensable for understanding linguistic variation internal to the group, which turns out to be correlated to the degree of integration (and loyalty) of its members (unlike the “lames” who frequent other groups and are in greater contact with adults). Labov thus documents an activity that plays a central role in relations between the members of adolescent gangs and other gangs sparring to control territory—namely, the exchange of ritual insults. In moving from the grammatical to the interactional, Labov contributes directly to the analysis of conversation and the ethnography of communication, a move he repeated in Therapeutic Discourse (1977).

这本书后来怎么样了？它在很大程度上被乔姆斯基思潮所忽视，但却在美国、加拿大以及法国等其他国家构建了变异主义社会语言学思潮。在法国，在皮埃尔·昂克雷韦（Pierre Encrevé）的倡导下，变异主义社会语言学与皮埃尔·布迪厄的社会学相结合，形成了独特的形式。

What became of this book? It was largely ignored by the Chomskyan current but helped structure a current of variationist sociolinguistics in the United States and Canada, as well as other countries such as France, where, under the aegis Pierre Encrevé, it acquired an original form through its combination with the sociology of Pierre Bourdieu.

在美国，这本书引发了非裔美国白话英语专家之间的争论，最终明确了其作为英语方言的地位。其中，尤为突出的是非裔美国白话英语起源于克里奥尔语，随后经历了缓慢的“去克里奥尔化”过程，并逐渐被英语同化的观点。拉波夫虽然认同这种假设，认为非裔美国英语会与美式英语的变体长期趋同，但基于在多个城市开展的调查，他认为，由于美国黑人社区所遭受的城市和社会隔离，方言的分化过程也在发挥作用。

In the United States, the book gave rise to a debate between specialists of Afro-American vernacular English, which resulted in clarifying its status as a dialect of English. The thesis of a Creole origin followed by the slow process of “decreolization” and gradual assimilation to English was especially emphasized. While accepting this approach, which supposes a long-term convergence with varieties of American English, Labov, drawing on surveys in several cities, argued that a process of dialectal divergence was also at work, owing to the urban and social segregation affecting Black communities in the United States.

米歇尔·德·福内尔

Michel de Fornel

威廉·拉波夫（William Labov），《内城语言：黑人英语白话研究》（费城：宾夕法尼亚大学出版社，1972 年）。

William Labov, Language in the Inner City: Studies in the Black English Vernacular (Philadelphia: University of Pennsylvania Press, 1972).

1972

1972

石器时代经济学：萨林斯推翻生产主义假说

Stone Age Economics: Sahlins Overthrows the Productivist Hypothesis

《石器时代经济学》问世之时，受马克思主义启发的人类学在美国和欧洲蓬勃发展。马歇尔·萨林斯（生于1930年）提出的人类学借鉴了这一理论视野，并融合了美国新进化论思潮的观点，这些观点源于朱利安·斯图尔特和莱斯利·怀特的思想。然而，在“形式主义”和“实质主义”两派支持者的激烈争论中，萨林斯提出了一种极其非正统、自发打破传统的马克思主义形式，摒弃了教条主义。

When Stone Age Economics came out, Marxist-inspired anthropology was developing strongly in the United States and in Europe. The anthropology put forward by Marshall Sahlins (born 1930) draws on this theoretical horizon, combined with perspectives taken from the American neo-evolutionist current, in the wake of Julian Steward and Leslie White. But amid the controversy opposing supporters of the “formalist” approach and those of the “substantivist” school, Sahlins proposed a most unorthodox and voluntarily iconoclastic form of Marxism shorn of dogmatism.

本书收录了萨林斯十年间所写的六篇文章，其中两篇于 1968 年在法国首次发表，当时萨林斯是南泰尔大学的客座教授，经历了那不寻常的一年的社会动荡。其中一篇文章《最初的富裕社会》迅速为萨林斯在人类学界乃至更广泛领域赢得了原创性的声誉，而本书也顺理成章地以此为起点。这篇文章最初发表于1968 年事件后的《现代》，与当时激进的质疑惊人地一致，令人不安地绕过了狩猎采集社会——毫无疑问，它相当仓促地吸收了旧石器时代和现代的社会——来对年轻抗议者所唾弃的“消费社会”进行无情的批判。萨林斯解释说，稀缺不应该与贫困混为一谈；后者源于追求的目标与可用手段之间的社会不平等。萨林斯认为，真正的富裕并不意味着无限的经济我们试图用日益发达却永远无能为力的手段来满足这些需求；真正的富足始于有限的需求，即使是最基本的技术手段也能满足每个人的需求，而且只需极少的日常劳动。第二种哲学被称为“禅道”，是狩猎采集者所选择的。相反，前者是工业社会所奉行的哲学，它追求生产主义，最终必然导致匮乏，最终导致沮丧。

The book contains six essays written over the ten previous years, two of which were first published in France in 1968, when Sahlins was a visiting professor at the Université de Nanterre and living through the social upheaval of that unusual year. One of these essays, “The Original Affluent Society,” had rapidly won Sahlins a reputation for originality, both within the anthropological community and more widely, and logically enough, it is on this idea that the book starts. Initially published in Les Temps modernes in the aftermath of the 1968 events, this text, strikingly in tune with the radical questionings of the period, conducted a disconcerting detour through hunter-gatherer societies—no doubt rather hastily assimilating those of the Paleolithic and those of the present day—to draw up a pitiless critique of the “consumer society” reviled by the youthful protesters. Sahlins explains that scarcity should not be conflated with poverty; the latter results from social inequality in the relationship between the ends pursued and the means available. True affluence, Sahlins argues, does not conceive of limitless economic needs that we seek to satisfy with increasingly developed yet forever impotent means; true abundance starts with limited needs that even rudimentary technical means may satisfy for everyone, and by very little daily work. This second philosophy, described as the “Zen path,” was the option taken by hunter-gatherers. The former, on the contrary, is the philosophy gripping industrial societies, which chase after productivism, at the end of which insufficiency cannot but give way to frustration.

在另一篇关于“赠予精神”的文章中，萨林斯重温了人类学最热衷的话题之一。该话题由马塞尔·莫斯在20世纪20年代提出，并由克劳德·列维-斯特劳斯在其为莫斯著作撰写的导言中以全新的视角进行了阐述。萨林斯通过梳理和探讨原始资料（毛利语材料，莫斯正是基于此构建了他对回报义务的解读，这无疑是其理论的致命弱点），为半个多世纪以来激发人类学活力的一场激烈辩论贡献了自己的力量：从物质财富中生成社会秩序的炼金术，以及从展现出漠不关心的立场出发的义务。或者，换句话说，物质财富如何通过道德债务的内在运作塑造纽带，这种债务无需任何减法或加法，从而生成超越物质需求的社会。

In another essay about “the spirit of the gift,” Sahlins revisits one of anthropology’s favorite topics, brought to light by Marcel Mauss in the 1920s and placed in a new perspective by Claude Lévi-Strauss in the introduction he wrote to Mauss’s work. Taking up and discussing the primary sources (the Maori material on which Mauss had built his interpretation of the obligation to give in return, no doubt the Achilles’ heel of his theory), Sahlins added his voice to a passionate debate that had energized anthropology for over half a century: the alchemy that generates the social order from material goods together with the obligation to start from a stance of exhibited disinterest. Or, put another way, how material goods shape ties, via the inner workings of a moral debt, exempt from subtraction or addition, which generates society above and beyond material needs.

另外两篇文章扩展了礼物这一主题，探讨了“原始”社会中的交换问题，其观点深受卡尔·波兰尼的理论启发。萨林斯考察了各种形式的互惠（广义、均衡和消极互惠），这一主题也出现在他的朋友兼同事埃尔曼·瑟维斯的著作中。萨林斯有力地证明了互惠并非一项原则，不应将其与交换双方的对称性或交换条件的等价性相混淆。萨林斯并未屈从于社会关系的天使视角，而是提出礼物制度作为市场制度的解毒剂，同时清晰地揭示了债务如何能够成为社会行为体之间相互依存的强大杠杆。

Expanding on the theme of gifts, two other essays address the question of exchange in “primitive” societies, drawing on a view heavily inspired by the theoretical suggestions of Karl Polanyi. Sahlins examines forms of (generalized, balanced, and negative) reciprocity—a topic also found in the work of his friend and colleague Elman Service—providing a salutary demonstration that reciprocity, which is not a principle, should not be confused either with symmetry between the exchanging partners or with the equivalence of the terms exchanged. Without yielding to an angelic vision of social relations, Sahlins puts forward the system of gifts as an antidote to that of the market, while bringing into sharp relief how debt can act as a powerful lever for interdependence between social actors.

但是，没有事先的生产就不可能有交换：这就是萨林斯在两篇连续的文章中讨论的内容，这两篇文章分别论述了“家庭生产方式”这一马克思主义概念，适用于“部落”（即沉积型）社会的经济和社会结构，以及他的改编随后引发了不时错综复杂的争论。他以表格为依据，捍卫了生产不足趋势的观点，认为这是社会单位分散导致政治“无政府状态”的经济必然结果。这就是“恰亚诺夫规则”，根据该规则，在家庭生产体系中，劳动强度与生产单位的生产能力成反比。对萨林斯而言，只有当一种追求炫耀性挥霍的中央集权出现，并以再分配原则取代互惠原则（此处再次带有明显的波兰尼色彩），才能激发生产能力。在这样的社会体系中，与资本主义经济不同，对生产者的控制会导致对生产成果的控制。通过将政治视为决定经济的因素，经典的马克思主义模式正在被暗中颠覆。

But there can be no exchange without prior production: That is what occupies Sahlins throughout two essays placed back-to-back about the “domestic mode of production,” a Marxist concept adapted to the economic and social configuration of “tribal” (i.e., sedimentary) societies, a concept and adaptation that subsequently generated at times convoluted debates. Backed up by tables, he defends the idea of a tendency toward underproduction, said to be the economic corollary of the dispersal of social units translating the state of political “anarchy.” This is “Chayanov’s rule,” according to which in a system of domestic production, intensity of work is inversely proportional to the productive capacity of the unit of production. For Sahlins, it is the emergence of a centralized power with ambitions for conspicuous prodigality, in which the principle of redistribution replaces that of reciprocity (once again, there are clear tones of Polanyi here), that is alone capable of dynamizing production capacities. In such a social system, unlike what happens in a capitalist economy, control of the producers induces control of the fruits of production. By presenting politics as that which determines economics, the classic Marxist schema is surreptitiously being inverted.

《石器时代经济学》为经济人类学的基本问题以及其他许多问题提供了新的见解，成为一部标杆著作，并帮助萨林斯跻身世界人类学重要人物之列。

In throwing new light on fundamental matters in economic anthropology, as well as on many other issues, Stone Age Economics became a benchmark work and helped place Sahlins within the restricted circle of major figures in anthropology worldwide.

弗朗西斯·杜普伊

Francis Dupuy

马歇尔·萨林斯，《石器时代经济学》（芝加哥：Aldine-Atherton，1972 年）。

Marshall Sahlins, Stone Age Economics (Chicago: Aldine-Atherton, 1972).

1973

1973

布汶传奇：杜比与基于事件的历史之战

The Legend of Bouvines: Duby Does Battle with Events-Based History

“1214 年 7 月 27 日是星期天。”中世纪历史学术界最著名的著作之一《布汶的传说》便是这样开头的。乔治·杜比 (1919-1996) 的这部作品常被认为是重新评价基于事件的历史的起点。在马克·布洛赫、吕西安·费弗尔和费尔南·布罗代尔的批评之下，基于事件的历史经历了几十年的耻辱。杜比在他 1991 年出版的思想自传《延续历史》中表达了这种观点。1968 年，杜比接到热拉尔·瓦尔特的委托，要为《法国的三十个旅程》集撰写一卷。他写道：“我接受了委托，这让我的朋友们大为惊讶，甚至有些愤慨。他们惊讶地看到我写了一篇关于一个事件、一场战斗的文章。”

“In the year 1214, 27 July fell on a Sunday.” Thus opens Le dimanche de Bouvines (The Legend of Bouvines), one the most famous works of medieval historical scholarship. This book by Georges Duby (1919–1996) is often held to be the starting point for a reappraisal of events-based history after several decades of disgrace ushered in by criticisms from Marc Bloch, Lucien Febvre, and then Fernand Braudel. Duby partook in this vision of his book in his intellectual autobiography, L’histoire continue, published in 1991. Referring to the commission he received from Gérard Walter in 1968 for a volume in the collection “Les trente journées qui ont fait la France,” Duby wrote: “I had accepted, to the great surprise, and perhaps indignation of my friends. They were amazed to see me write about an event, a battle.”

这篇回忆录与1973年出版的原著已有一定距离，原著的​​语气截然不同。从一开始，事件就被批判为“历史的浮渣”；而优先考虑的是“痕迹”，认为“只有痕迹才能赋予存在。离开痕迹，事件就什么也不是”。事实上，这本书的主题并非这场战斗，而是它如何通过人们的记忆和向当代的传承揭示了那个时代。第一部分，恰如其分地被称为“事件”，实际上被杜比回避了。在快速完成“舞台布景”一章后，他把“那一天”的全部叙述都托付给了编年史家纪尧姆·勒·布勒东。这清楚地表明，杜比的研究并非着眼于事件的真实性，而是着眼于其表象。第二部分“评论”提出了一项首次方法论创新，如今已成为一种标准的学术方法。通过从事件中提取对事件发生地——十三世纪封建社会——的结构性解读，本书得以推进。这场战役的特殊性，加上它发生在星期日，即主日，更进一步强化了这一点，提供了一个机会来展示封建秩序的运作方式、其和平与战争的仪式，以及暴力冲突与社会、象征和宗教规则的交织，这些规则勾勒出一个连贯的世界，即一个尚未被君主制制服的军事贵族社会。最后，第三部分“传奇”提出了进一步的解读转变，展示了这场胜利所构建的记忆的重要性，这场胜利最终成为卡佩王朝乃至法兰西民族的象征。

This reminiscence already takes a certain distance from the original volume published in 1973, in which the tone was different. From the outset, events are criticized as the “spume of history”; the idea privileged is that of “traces” that “alone confer existence. Apart from them, events are nothing.” Indeed, the subject matter of the book is not the battle but what it reveals about its epoch by the ways it has been remembered and transmitted to the contemporary period. The first section, fittingly called “The Event,” is in fact sidestepped by Duby who, after a rapid “Stage Setting” chapter, confides the entire narrative of “The Day” to the chronicler Guillaume le Breton. This makes it clear that Duby’s investigation is not going to focus on the reality of the episode but on its representation. The second part, “Commentary,” proposes a first methodological innovation, now become a standard scholarly move, by plucking from the event a structural reading of the world in which it took place—the feudal society of the thirteenth century. The exceptional nature of the battle, reinforced by the fact that it took place on a Sunday, the Lord’s Day, provides an opportunity to display the seigneurial order at work, its rituals of peace and war, its intertwining of violent conflict with the social, symbolic, and religious rules delineating a coherent universe, that of a military aristocracy not yet brought to heel by the monarchy. Lastly, the third section, “Legendary,” proposes a further interpretive shift by demonstrating the magnitude of the memory-building about this victory, which eventually became a symbol of the Capetian monarchy, then of the French nation.

因此，1973年，《布汶的星期天》以反实证主义宣言的姿态出现，批判了那种聚焦于战役、民族和事件的史学研究方式。战役的展开方式被遮蔽了。杜比最终解构了事件，事件的存在仅仅源于相互衔接的叙述，而杜比对事件的新构思不过是额外的变体。该书一炮打响，贝尔纳·盖内（Bernard Guenée）在1974年发表于《年鉴》的评论中指出：“现在谈论这本书几乎为时已晚。”盖内强调叙事形式，赞扬其有效性，而非探究其认识论意义，尤其指出了其对战役记忆和史学研究的规模，他认为这是该书最具创新性的方面。罗伯特·福西尔（Robert Fossier）于1975年在宪章学院图书馆（Bibliothèque de l'École des chartes）撰文，强调该书对实证主义史学的批判，并强调该书刻意回避任何关于战役的叙述，表明他更倾向于解读封建武士社会，而非“传奇”部分，尽管他对后者关注甚少。这两篇评论从一开始就明确了主流的接受方式及其矛盾之处。

Thus, in 1973, Le dimanche de Bouvines presented itself as an anti-positivist manifesto, a critique of a way of doing history focusing on battles, the nation, and events. How the battle unfolded is screened off. Duby reaches the ultimate stage in the dissolution of the event, which exists solely through dovetailing accounts, with Duby’s new plotting of it being merely an additional variant. It met with instantaneous success, leading Bernard Guenée to observe in a review published in 1974 in Annales “that it is almost too late to speak of this book.” Guenée emphasizes the narrative form, praising how effective it is, rather than inquiring into its epistemological significance, noting especially the scale of its study of the memory and historiography about the battle, which strikes him as the most innovative aspect. Writing in 1975 in the Bibliothèque de l’École des chartes, Robert Fossier instead insists on its critique of positivist history and on the care with which the text circumvents any account of the battle, announcing his preference for the interpretation of feudal warrior society rather than the “Legendary” section, to which he pays scant attention. These two reviews defined from the outset the dominant reception, together with its ambivalences.

在盖伊·拉德罗1980年出版的《与乔治·杜比对话》中，杜比仍然清晰地表达了他对书写、痕迹和主观性的重视。他表示，通过《布汶的星期天》，他想要表明“过去总是被操纵，被卷入话语网络，这些网络编织起来是为了诱捕对手，或在权力攸关的战斗中作为一种保护手段。” 正是以这种方式，作为对史学叙事和历史现实的反思，埃里克·霍布斯鲍姆在与劳伦斯·斯通 (Lawrence Stone) 就历史叙事展开的争论中，他提到了杜比 (Duby) 的书，该书于 1980 年由《过去与现在》杂志出版，而美国中世纪学家加布里埃尔·施皮格尔 (Gabrielle Spiegel)在 20 世纪 80 年代谈到“锻造过去”时使用了《布汶的星期日》 。

In Dialogues avec Georges Duby, published by Guy Lardreau in 1980, Duby is still very clear about the importance he attaches to writing, to traces, and to subjectivity. He says that with Le dimanche de Bouvines, he wanted to show that “the past has always been fiddled with, caught up in networks of discourse woven to ensnare the adversary or as a means of protection in combats where power is at stake.” And it is in just such a manner, as a reflection on historiographical narrative and historical reality, that Eric Hobsbawm referred to Duby’s book in the controversy with Lawrence Stone about narrative in history, published in 1980 by the journal Past and Present, and that the American medievalist Gabrielle Spiegel used Le dimanche de Bouvines in speaking of “Forging the Past” during the 1980s.

但与此同时，将这本书改编成电影的项目促使作为历史顾问的杜比更加关注这场战役的史实层面，从而更加关注事件本身。1984年的新版展现了这种转变的迹象，也体现了法国史学界转向事件、行动者和政治“回归”的阶段。杜比似乎赞同这种对其作品的回顾性描述，这种反馈揭示了历史学术话语的构建方式。因此，自20世纪80年代以来，《布汶的星期日》的经典化却自相矛盾地通过将其解读为“事件”并颂扬杜比的风格来进行。这种叙事的实验性方面，既具有反思性，又具有审美性，被推到了幕后，尽管它提出了关于历史知识及其传播的前提条件的问题——这些问题至今仍具有紧迫性。诚然，今天，这种解读或许只是对1973年出版事件的又一次讨论；这类书籍的伟大之处在于，它们让几个连续的、有时相互矛盾的当下，依次在其中重逢。但正如米歇尔·德·塞托所说：“事件并非我们所见或所知，而是它最终会变成什么样（首先，对我们来说）。”

But at the same time, a project to adapt the book for film led Duby, as historical consultant, to pay greater interest to the factual aspects of the battle and thereby to the event itself. The 1984 new edition showed signs of this change, which also bore traces of the shift in the circumstances of French historiography toward a phase when events, actors, and politics were making their “comeback.” Duby seemed to espouse this retrospective description of his work, in feedback revelatory of how historical scholarly discourse is manufactured. Thus, since the 1980s, the canonization of Le dimanche de Bouvines has paradoxically been conducted through an interpretation of it as an “event” and a celebration of Duby’s style. The experimental aspects of this narrative, which are both reflexive and aesthetic, are pushed into the background, despite raising questions about the preconditions for historical knowledge and its transmission—questions that have lost none of their urgency. Admittedly, this reading is perhaps, today, only another discussion of the publishing event of 1973; the greatness of such books is that they allow several successive, at times contradictory presents to recognize themselves in it in turn. But as Michel de Certeau said, “An event is not what we see or know of it, but what it becomes (and first of all, for us).”

艾蒂安·安海姆

Étienne Anheim

乔治·杜比 (Georges Duby)，《Le dimanche de Bouvines》，1214 年 7 月 27 日（巴黎：Gallimard [“Trente journées qui ont fait la France”]，1973 年）。由伽利玛（“Folio”）再版，1985 年。由凯瑟琳·蒂哈尼（Catherine Tihanyi）翻译成英文，名为《布文传奇：中世纪的战争、宗教和文化》（伯克利：加州大学出版社，1990 年）。

Georges Duby, Le dimanche de Bouvines, 27 juillet 1214 (Paris: Gallimard [“Trente journées qui ont fait la France”], 1973). Republished by Gallimard (“Folio”), 1985. Translated into English by Catherine Tihanyi as The Legend of Bouvines: War, Religion, and Culture in the Middle Ages (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1990).

1973

1973

文化的阐释:格尔茨将文化转化为需要阐释的文本

The Interpretation of Cultures: Geertz Turns Cultures into Texts to Be Interpreted

在《文化的诠释》一书中，克利福德·格尔茨（1926-2006）在其著作《文化的诠释》一章中，将露丝·本尼迪克特1934年出版的《文化模式》称为美国“有史以来最受欢迎的人类学著作”。四十年后，可以肯定的是，格尔茨的这本书如今依然享有这一称号。它同样属于“诠释学”传统，然而，它却颠覆了书名的语法——用复数表示文化，用单数表示诠释行为——深刻地革新了美国人类学。

In one of the chapters in The Interpretation of Cultures, Clifford Geertz (1926–2006) refers to Ruth Benedict’s Patterns of Culture, published in 1934, as “the most popular anthropology book ever published” in the United States. Forty years later, it is a safe bet that Geertz’s book now holds that title. It is part of the same “hermeneutic” tradition, yet in inverting the syntax of the title—plural for cultures, single for the interpreting act—it profoundly renewed American anthropology.

《文化的诠释》并非专题论文，而是十五篇文本的合集（最早的一篇可追溯至1957年）。然而，如同克洛德·列维-斯特劳斯的《结构人类学》（Anthropologie structurale）一样，本书结构严谨，具有很强的回顾性凝聚力（两本书在各自思想界的影响确实相似）。格尔茨只保留了那些有助于重新定义“文化概念”的文章，这是他在序言中设定的目标；他将文本分为五个部分，从最人类学的（对人类物种进行最普遍的考察）到最民族志的（本书以他对巴厘岛斗鸡的著名分析结尾），本书的核心是对经典民族学概念（社会变迁、仪式、意识形态、民族主义、宗教等）的讨论，这些概念植根于具体的例子。最重要的是，格尔茨添加了一个未发表的导言章节《厚描述：迈向文化的解释理论》，总结了他的观点，并提出了一系列很快被人类学领域之外引用的想法和短语：薄描述和厚描述的对立，起初只是记录行为，后来试图在语境中传达其意义；文化的“符号学”概念是“意义网络”，人被比作“悬浮在他自己编织的意义之网中的动物”；人类学的定义是“不是一门寻找规律的实验科学，而是一门寻找意义的解释科学”；民族志工作与“试图阅读一份手稿——陌生的、褪色的、充满省略号、不连贯之处、可疑的修改……不是用传统的声音图表写成的，而是用短暂的塑造行为的例子写成的”进行比较；民族学被描述为小说，是一种与写小说相当的“想象行为”。

The Interpretation of Cultures is not a monographic treatise but a collection of fifteen texts (the oldest dating from 1957). However, like Claude Lévi-Strauss’s Anthropologie structurale (Structural Anthropology), the book has a solid structure and great retrospective cohesion (the impact of the two books in their respective intellectual worlds was indeed similar). Geertz only retained those articles that helped redefine “the concept of culture,” the goal he sets in his preface; he organized his texts into five parts, going from the most anthropological (considering the human species in its greatest generality) to the most ethnographical (the book closes on his famous analysis of Balinese cockfights), with the heart of the book being composed of discussion of classic ethnological concepts (social change, ritual, ideology, nationalism, religion, etc.) rooted in concrete examples. Above all, Geertz added an unpublished introductory chapter, “Thick Description: Toward an Interpretive Theory of Culture,” summarizing his position and setting out a series of ideas and phrases that were soon quoted way beyond the precincts of anthropology: the opposition between thin and thick description, the first merely recording actions, the second seeking to convey their meaning in context; a “semiotic” concept of culture as a “network of meanings,” man being compared to “an animal suspended in webs of significance he himself has spun”; a definition of anthropology “not [as] an experimental science in search of a law but an interpretive one in search of a meaning”; a comparison between ethnographic work and “trying to read a manuscript—foreign, faded, full of ellipses, incoherencies, suspicious emendations [ . . . ] written not in conventionalized graphs of sound but in transient examples of shaped behavior”; a characterization of ethnology as fiction, an “imaginative act” comparable to writing an novel.

本书的理论核心包含两方面。首先，人类学是一门阐释性科学。格尔茨探讨了自然科学（解释或探寻规律）与人文科学（或“心智”科学，阐释或建构意义）之间的对立——这一对立由威廉·狄尔泰发展，保罗·利科加以完善。但对格尔茨而言，这与其说是隶属于哪个哲学流派，不如说是展现了这一概念的丰富性。他基于自身在爪哇、巴厘岛和摩洛哥的民族志经验，为其增添了具体内容。书中以阅读为主要隐喻，将文化设想为“一组文本，文本本身也是整体，人类学家需要跨越其所属者的视角去解读它们”。作品以对文化的解读和诗歌细读的比较（爱德华·萨丕尔和露丝·本尼迪克特的作品中已有此类比较）结束，前者基于在整体（文化）和部分（某某行为）之间来回穿梭。这种做法需要严谨和想象力，关键在于创造语境，通过重建熟悉感使之变得易于理解，从而消除本土行为或话语的晦涩或荒谬性。其次——也是由于这种“诠释学”方法——格尔茨并没有将学术观点定义为与行动者的观点割裂开来（就像法国社会学传统中的情况一样）。相反，他将其视为本土解读的延伸，是二阶或三阶的建构，与直接经验相去甚远，但在本质上并无不同。

The theoretical core of the book is twofold. First, anthropology is an interpretive science. Geertz takes up the opposition—developed by Wilhelm Dilthey and brought up to date by Paul Ricœur—between the natural sciences (explaining or searching for laws) and the human sciences (or sciences “of the mind,” interpreting or building meaning). But for Geertz, this is less a matter of affiliation to a philosophical school than it is showing how fertile such a conception is, to which he adds concrete content based on his ethnographic experience, particularly in Java, Bali, and Morocco. The dominant metaphor is that of reading, with culture being envisaged as “an ensemble of texts, themselves ensembles, which the anthropologist strains to read over the shoulders of those to whom they properly belong.” The work ends with a comparison (already found in the work of Edward Sapir and Ruth Benedict) between interpreting a culture and conducting a close reading of a poem, based on shuttling back and forth between the whole (culture) and the parts (such and such an action). In this undertaking, requiring both rigor and imagination, the key operation is the production of context, making it possible to dissipate the opacity or apparent absurdity of indigenous conduct or discourse by reconstructing a familiarity rendering them intelligible. Next—and consequent upon this “hermeneutic” approach—Geertz does not define the scholarly viewpoint as cut off from that of the actors (as is the case in the French sociological tradition). Instead, he sees it as an extension of indigenous interpretations, as a second- or third-order construct, further removed from direct experience but not different in kind.

同样，在链条的另一端，格尔茨不承认第一秩序，不承认文化的一些客观现象现实，而只承认解释，即使是在“第一秩序”（当事件被当地人感知和体验时）。

Equally, at the other end of the chain, Geertz does not recognize a first order, some objective phenomenal reality of culture, but instead only interpretations, even at the “first order” (when events are perceived and experienced by a native).

《文化的诠释》确立了格尔茨作为他那一代最杰出、读者最多的人类学家的地位，尤其是在自20世纪50年代以来，“硬”客观主义人类学占据主导地位的背景下（莱斯利·怀特的新进化论、“文化唯物主义”以及新兴的认知人类学）。这本书也确立了一种语言和基调，它常常令人愉悦，并且坚决拒绝使用专业术语，即使在最理论化的段落中，它仍然基于富有启发性的民族志案例。

The Interpretation of Cultures established Geertz as the most brilliant and most read anthropologist of his generation, in a context where, since the 1950s, “hard” forms of objectivist anthropology had dominated (the neo-evolutionism of Leslie White, “cultural materialism,” and nascent cognitive anthropology). The book also established a language and tone, frequently pleasing and obstinately refusing jargon, based on suggestive ethnographic examples, even in its most theoretical passages.

这本书的成功与其招致的攻击规模相当。它成为“文本主义”重读的靶子（1986年《写作文化》的许多撰稿人都曾师从格尔茨），也成为后殖民理论的攻击目标。反对者认为，这种阐释方法源于自由主义和资产阶级世界特有的视角，这种视角忽视了隐藏在虚假中立概念背后的权力关系和统治形式。某种程度上，这本书体现了美国社会科学界一个纯真的时代——一个天真而快乐的时代——在那个时代，历史学家、文学批评家和人类学家团结在阐释的旗帜下，讲着同一种语言，学者与本土人之间的“视界融合”和“富有成效的对话”即使难以实现，至少也是可以想象和渴望的理想。

The success of the book was equaled in scale by the attacks it attracted. It became a target for “textualist” rereadings (many contributors to 1986’s Writing Culture were former students of Geertz) as well as for postcolonial theory, the objection being that this interpretive approach stemmed from a characteristic vision of the liberal and bourgeois world, which was blind to the power relations and forms of domination hidden behind falsely neutral concepts. In a way, the book embodies an age of innocence—a naive yet happy time—in the American social sciences when, united under the banner of interpretation, historians, literary critics, and anthropologists spoke the same language and the “fusion of horizons” and “productive dialogue” between scholars and natives were, if not accessible, at least conceivable and desirable ideals.

文森特·德巴内

Vincent Debaene

克利福德·格尔茨，《文化的诠释：精选论文集》（纽约：基础图书出版社，1973年）。丰塔纳出版社于1993年再版。

Clifford Geertz, The Interpretation of Cultures: Selected Essays (New York: Basic Books, 1973). Republished by Fontana Press, 1993.

1974

1974

现代世界体系：沃勒斯坦与现代资本主义的全球扩张

The Modern World-System: Wallerstein and the Planetary Expansion of Modern Capitalism

伊曼纽尔·沃勒斯坦（生于1930年）是二十世纪最具影响力的社会学家之一。他在哥伦比亚大学对非洲独立运动的研究，使他质疑“方法论民族主义”，即对反殖民主义和洲际帝国主义的社会抗议的研究仅限于国家框架。

Immanuel Wallerstein (born 1930) is one of the most influential sociologists of the twentieth century. His research at Columbia University into African independence movements led him to question “methodological nationalism,” which meant that the study of social protest against colonialism and intercontinental imperialism was conducted solely within the framework of states.

《现代世界体系》第一卷已被翻译成十三种语言，其灵感源自费尔南·布罗代尔关于“长时段”理论的著作。该书开创性地分析了西方资本主义在全球层面的发展，并在此基础上衍生了三卷：《重商主义与欧洲世界经济的巩固：1600-1750年》、《资本主义世界经济的第二次大扩张：1730-1840年》以及《中间派自由主义的胜利：1789-1914年》。

The first volume of The Modern World-System, translated into thirteen languages, drew inspiration from the work of Fernand Braudel on the longue durée. It inaugurated analysis of the development of Western capitalism on the planetary scale, pursued in three additional volumes: Mercantilism and the Consolidation of the European World-Economy 1600–1750, The Second Great Expansion of the Capitalist World-Economy 1730–1840, and Centrist Liberalism Triumphant 1789–1914.

他的主要论点是，资本主义被比作根植于洲际劳动分工的州际体系的地理扩张，这种体系构建了专门出口原材料、食品和奴役劳动力的地区（边缘地区）与生产制成品和高科技产品的地区（核心地区）之间不平等的商业交换，而半边缘的农村地区则位于两者之间。尽管这种结构效应借鉴了拉丁美洲“依附”学派，但沃勒斯坦更进一步，发现了一种共同的意识形态以及与创新部门相关的商品链。他还基于汇聚的因素和长达数个世纪的趋势，发现了经济周期，其中扩张阶段和衰退阶段交替出现。贸易萎缩、人口和城市扩张与收缩，以及政治形态之间等级制度或竞争的出现。在这些周期的交叉点和转折点上，存在着“霸权转型”阶段，技术和资本大规模地向低成本生产地区转移，而这一过程往往被新政治霸权日益增强的流动性所掩盖。

His main thesis assimilates capitalism to the geographic expansion of an interstate system rooted in an intercontinental division of labor, structuring unequal commercial exchange between regions specializing in exporting raw materials, foodstuffs, and servile labor (the periphery) and regions producing manufactured and high-technology products (the core) with semi-peripheral rural zones lying between the two. Although this structuring effect was borrowed from the Latin American “dependency” school, Wallerstein went further in identifying a shared ideology and merchandise chains linked to innovative sectors. He also detected economic cycles, based on converging factors plus centuries-long trends, with alternating phases of expansion and contraction in trade, demographic and urban growth and shrinkage, and the emergence of hierarchies or rivalry between political formations. At the intersections and turning points in the cycles, there were phases of “hegemonic transition” in which there were massive transfers of technology and capital toward low-cost production regions, often cloaked by the ascending mobility of new political hegemons.

沃勒斯坦认为，“资本主义世界经济”诞生于16世纪欧洲封建制度的废墟之上，这得益于新大陆的发现以及远距离贸易将奢侈品转化为生活必需品。随后，它不断扩张，将其他先前被组织成“帝国世界”或“世界微型体系”的地区纳入其运作。蒙古帝国和拜占庭帝国的衰落、天主教会的衰落、领主收入的危机，以及谷物、木材和贵金属全球市场的建立，推动了欧洲货币的大量流通和中央集权国家的发展。这些国家拥有足够的实力控制贸易路线，从而保证其企业家能够理性地选择劳动制度，进而确保远距​​离贸易的盈利能力（边缘地区实行奴隶制和农奴制，半边缘地区实行分成制，核心地区实行租赁和受薪就业）。国家的强盛最终源于其生产过程在其领土上的集中，需要资本和技术才能在垄断市场上销售产品；而较弱的国家则主要依靠劳动力和耕地进行生产，并将产品出口到竞争性市场上销售。这种差异导致了地区间服务通过贸易的转移。

According to Wallerstein, the “capitalist world-economy” was born in sixteenth-century Europe on the ruins of feudalism, thanks to the discovery of the New World and the transformation of distant commerce in luxury goods into necessities. It then spread and incorporated other regions into its operation, previously organized into “empire-worlds” or “world mini-systems.” The weakening of the Mongol and Byzantine empires, the decline of the Catholic Church, the crisis in seignorial revenues, and the establishment of a global market in cereals, wood, and precious metals drove the circulation of large flows of money in Europe and the development of centralized states. These were sufficiently powerful to control trade routes and thus guarantee their entrepreneurs a rational choice of labor regimes, thereby ensuring the profitability of distant commerce (slavery and serfdom on the peripheries, sharecropping in the semi-periphery; leasing and salaried employment in the core). The power of the states ultimately derived from the concentration on their territory of the production process, requiring capital and technology to sell goods on monopolistic markets, while weaker states housed production processes relying primarily on labor and arable land to export goods sold on competitive markets. This differential gave rise to the transfer of services between regions through trade.

第一卷的重要性在于它为社会科学中的一股新思潮——世界体系分析——奠定了基础。这一路径既拒绝自由主义的现代化理论，也拒绝正统的马克思主义。沃勒斯坦反对前者，他质疑每个国家都可以通过自由主义的公共政策经历增长和发展的各个阶段。他批评后者对资本主义的理解过于狭隘，局限于工业民族国家的概念。通过提出世界经济作为分析单位，沃勒斯坦揭示了这两种路径无法理解和阐释的内容。在前者中，事实是，世界贸易仍然是一场零和博弈，在经济增长的同时，极其显著的不平等和贫困地区在世界各地移动，并在全球范围内重新配置。在第二种情况下，事实是，受薪就业和奴隶制与资本积累相辅相成，而这两个地区在预期寿命、生活水平、政治体制和商业生产形式方面都截然不同。因此，城市工人的报酬取决于边缘地区提供的低成本食物和服装纤维，而这些边缘地区的奴隶在种植园受到剥削。

The importance of this first volume lies in the foundations it establishes for a new current in the social sciences: world-system analysis. This approach rejects both the liberal theory of modernization and orthodox Marxism. Against the former, Wallerstein disputes that each state may move through the stages of growth and development by liberal public policy. And he reproaches the latter with having too narrow a vision of capitalism, restricted to the concept of industrial nation-states. By proposing the world-economy as the unit of analysis, Wallerstein brings out what these two approaches are unable to apprehend and render intelligible. In the first case, the fact is that world trade remains a zero-sum game in which, in tandem with growth, zones of very marked inequality and poverty move about the world and are reconfigured at a planetary scale. In the second case, the fact is that salaried employment and slavery are complementary to the accumulation of capital, each in regions where life expectancy, standard of living, political regimes, and forms of merchant production differ entirely from each other. The remuneration of workers in cities thus depended on the provision of low-cost food and clothing fiber by the peripheries, where slaves were exploited on plantations.

沃勒斯坦的书引发了诸多争论，例如，引发了关于国际贸易和殖民化在欧洲快速工业发展中相对重要性的研究。一些人批评其整体决定论，认为其忽视了参与体系（或失）机能的社会主体的主动性。许多历史学家还重新审视了劳动体制的性质及其在不同地区互补分工的现实。最后，他的分析框架已被应用于其他大洲和更早的时期：非洲-欧亚世界体系的构成已被确认，尤其是菲利普·博雅尔在其著作《印度洋的世界》 （Les mondes de l'océan Indien）中提出的，涵盖了从西亚青铜时代的城市革命到自我们时代开始以来影响中国和地中海地区并持续超过十五个世纪的长达数个世纪的周期同步。

Wallerstein’s book sparked much debate, triggering research, for instance, on the relative importance of international trade and colonization in Europe’s rapid industrial development. Some criticized its holistic determinism, arguing that it neglected the capacity for initiative by social agents involved in the (dis)functioning of the system. Many historians have additionally reexamined the nature of labor regimes and the reality of their complementary division in different regions. Lastly, his analytical framework has been applied to other continents and earlier periods: The constitution of an Afro-Eurasian world-system has been identified, particularly by Philippe Beaujard in Les mondes de l’océan Indien (The Worlds of the Indian Ocean), from the urban revolution of the Bronze Age in western Asia through to the synchronization of centuries-long cycles affecting China and the Mediterranean since the beginning of our era and running over more than fifteen centuries.

如果像沃勒斯坦所言，我们的世纪是资本主义世界体系停滞和解体的世纪，这是由于它已经达到了生态极限，并且缺乏对其扩张至关重要的新的外部舞台，那么这意味着当代的危机类似于标志着封建主义解体的危机，当前的过渡时期很可能会带来一个新的世界体系，在未来的几个世纪里，如果我们要理解它的全部复杂性，就需要社会科学中新的认识论。

If, as Wallerstein argues, our century is that of stagnation and the decomposition of the capitalist world-system, owing to its having reached ecological limits and to the absence of new external arenas that are essential to its expansion, then that means that the contemporary crisis is similar to that which marked the disintegration of feudalism, and that the current period of transition is likely to bring about a new world-system that, for the coming centuries, will require new epistemologies in the social sciences if we are to apprehend it in all its complexity.

埃里克·米兰茨

Eric Mielants

伊曼纽尔·沃勒斯坦，《现代世界体系》，第 1 卷，资本主义农业与 16 世纪欧洲世界经济的起源（纽约：Academic Press，1974 年）。

Immanuel Wallerstein, The Modern World-System, vol. 1, Capitalist Agriculture and the Origins of the European World-Economy in the Sixteenth Century (New York: Academic Press, 1974).

1975

1975

少女、食物和金钱：梅亚苏与亲属关系的消化结构

Maidens, Meals, and Money: Meillassoux and the Alimentary Structures of Kinship
