They may also be linked back to earlier attempts to account for common usages, such as the sociology of the Chicago school, the works of Erving Goffman, Henri Lefebvre’s critiques of everyday life (1958), and especially the dazzling interpretation of the English working class’s cultural practices put forward by Richard Hoggart in The Uses of Literacy (1957). But the late 1970s crystallized the themes that Michel de Certeau’s analysis then bound together. His ideas fed into the spectacular development of cultural studies (and “studies” in general) in the English-speaking world, seeped into the imaginary of alternative movements, as well as fueling the attention paid more generally to the form, style, and issues of cultural practices by historians, sociologists, anthropologists, and philosophers, for whom everyday life ceased being something silent and self-evident and instead became an object for investigation into the meaning of ordinary practice.

雅克·雷维尔

Jacques Revel

米歇尔·德塞托，《日常生活的发明》，卷。 1，Arts de faire（巴黎：Union générale d'éditions [“10-18”]，1980）。由伽利玛 (“Folio”) 重新出版，1990 年。史蒂文·F·伦德尔 (Steven F. Rendall) 将其翻译成英文，名为《日常生活的实践》 (伯克利：加州大学出版社，1984 年)。

Michel de Certeau, L’invention du quotidien, vol. 1, Arts de faire (Paris: Union générale d’éditions [“10–18”], 1980). Republished by Gallimard (“Folio”), 1990. Translated into English by Steven F. Rendall as The Practice of Everyday Life (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1984).

1981

1981

国王的肖像:马林和代表权

Portrait of the King: Marin and the Power of Representation

在路易·马兰的《国王肖像》 （Le Portrait du Roi）首次出版三十五年后重读，令人感悟良多：书中的一些假设对当今关于图像与权力关系的思考至关重要，而另一些假设尽管具有启发性，却仍被部分误解。其中一个误解源于他对术语的选择。马兰（1931-1992）使用了“肖像”一词，甚至更频繁地使用了“再现”（representation），而如今人们通常认为这些术语指的是“图像”和“能动性”。一旦意识到这本书并非关于绘画，而是关于一系列文本，人们或许会觉得“肖像”一词有些出人意料。这些文本涵盖了从佩利松（Pelisson）1670年的国王史规划图到路易十四统治时期的金属史，从贡布斯特（Gomboust）1652年的巴黎规划图到费利比安（Félibien）的两篇文章——一篇是凡尔赛宫指南，另一篇则描述了国王1674年征服弗朗什孔泰后归来的一次宴会。马林所谓的“国王肖像”由所有这些话语、仪式和视觉形式构成，国王通过这些形式被描绘成一个人物，而他的肉身却缺席了。在这种“多媒体”结构的核心，马林提出了一个虽然简单却意义深远的理念：国王只是在表象中才是真正的国王。换句话说，王权并不先于表象中的话语、表演和仪式形式而存在。马林的符号学是替代性的：表象用一个在场的符号取代了缺席的国王。同时，它也充满活力：国王的出现并不仅限于取代缺席的君主，因为它还赋予了他一种不仅强大而且迷人的存在感，因此很可能引发他的臣民既充满恐惧又充满爱，但同时也是公正的，并具有法律的价值。在《国王的肖像》出版前一年写的一段文字中，马林总结了他所说的“国王的权力就是他的代表”的含义，这段文字被收录在2005年《代表政治》的文本集中。

Rereading Louis Marin’s Le portrait du roi (Portrait of the King) more than thirty-five years after it was first published is a revealing experience: Some of its hypotheses are central to present-day thought on how images relate to power, while others have remained partially misunderstood despite their heuristic potency. One such misunderstanding arises from his choice of terminology. Marin (1931–1992) uses the term “portrait,” and even more frequently “representation,” where one would today expect to see “image” and “agency.” The term “portrait” may seem surprising once one realizes the book is not about painting but about a set of texts ranging from Pelisson’s plans for a history of the king (1670) to the history of metal during the reign of Louis, from Gomboust’s plans for Paris (1652) to two texts by Félibien, one a guide to Versailles and the other a description of a party held by the king on returning from conquering Franche-Comté in 1674. What Marin calls the “portrait of the king” is composed of all these discursive, ritual, and visual forms by which the king is represented as a figure while his physical body is absent. At the heart of this “multimedia” construction, Marin places an idea that, while simple, has endless consequences: The king is only king in representation. In other words, royal power does not preexist the discursive, performative, and ritual forms representing it. Marin’s semiotic is substitutive: Representation substitutes a present sign for the absent king. At the same time, it is also energetic: The operation presenting the king is not limited to replacing the absent monarch, for it also confers him with a presence that is not only powerful and fascinating, hence likely to induce terror and love in his subjects, but also just and having the value of law. In a passage written a year before the publication of Portrait du roi and reprinted in the texts collected in Politiques de la représentation in 2005, Marin sums up what he means in stating that the power of the king is his representation.

那么，权力是什么？权力是能够对某人或某物采取行动的能力；不是行动或做事，而是拥有权力，拥有做事或行动的力量。权力在其最普遍的意义上，是指能够施加力量，拥有一种不消耗但能够消耗的力量储备。人们甚至可能想知道，一种不显现的力量会是什么。因此，权力首先意味着拥有权力，但它也尤其重视这种权力作为一种强制性的约束，产生法律般的义务。在这个意义上，权力将权力确立为法律，而法律本身则被视为力量的可能性和能力。而这正是代表制发挥作用的地方，因为它既是权力的手段，也是权力的基础。换句话说，我的工作假设是，代表制机制将力量转化为权力，首先是通过保留力量，这相当于权力；其次是通过赋予这种权力一种合法的义务状态，通过为权力辩护。1

So, what is power? Power is being capable of performing an action on someone or something; not acting or doing, but having the power, having the strength to do or to act. Power is, in its most general sense, being capable of force, having a reserve of force that is not spent but is capable of being spent. One may even wonder what a force that does not manifest itself might be. Power thus means first having power, but it is also and especially valuing this power as an obligatory constraint, generating duty as law. In this meaning, power is instituting power as law, with the former itself conceived as the possibility and capacity for force. And this is where representation will play its role, because it will be both a means of power and its underpinning. In other words, my working hypothesis is that representative mechanisms transform force into power, first by holding force in reserve, which amounts to power, and second by valuing this power as a legitimate obligatory state, by justifying power.1

《国王的肖像》结合对多种图像和文本的分析，展现了表征如何在符号中保留力量，以及如何在法律话语中象征力量。马林为社会科学提供了一套决定性的启发式工具。首先，他将符号/表征视为能量，阐明了形式与力量之间的关系；这种关系对于分析“图像的运作”及其效应至关重要，却又规避了研究形式与意义之间关系的方法。其次，通过激发对符号/表征的表演维度的反思，马林重建了图像与人类学，甚至与神学之间的联系。

Combining analyses of many sorts of images and texts, Le portrait du roi shows how representation holds force in reserve in signs and how it signifies force in discourse on law. Marin provided the social sciences with a set of decisive heuristic tools. First, his conception of the sign/representation as energy throws light on how forms relate to forces; this relationship, which is crucial for analyzing the “work of images” and their effects, eludes approaches investigating how forms relate to meanings. Second, in galvanizing reflection on the performative dimension of the sign/representation, Marin reestablishes links between the image and anthropology, and with theology even.

马林所运用的代表理念包含双重运作：代表无疑具有拟态或及物性的目的，代表某种事物——国王。同时，它还具有反身性和实用维度。由于这种表面维度的自然化，它以更大的力量呈现他并强加他的存在。如果我们移除表征的概念，即“呈现自我”的实用性和反身性维度，而只考虑其及物性和模仿性维度，我们很快就会迷失在“表征批判”中，这种批判发展至今，例如，在源于对抽象艺术的肯定的现代主义视角中，或在考察特定于非西方文化或所谓古典时期之外的非模仿性符号学的作品中。人们对马林将表征与权力联系起来的方式的兴趣无疑受到了这种“表征批判”的影响。马林的思想不仅与此类批判格格不入，而且可以用来更好地阐述这种批判，远远超出了视觉研究，后者与马林一样，都关注将图像置于它们所处的权力关系之中。马林绝不会仅仅谴责隐藏在艺术精美外表之下的“真面目”。他通过一种非常特殊的分析性描述形式，深入研究每个主题的底层，并用精确、丰富、灵活的语言传达文本的内涵。

The idea of representation as wielded by Marin involves a dual operation: Representation admittedly had a mimetic or transitive purpose, representing something—the king. At the same time, it had a reflexive and pragmatic dimension. It presents him and imposes his presence with even greater force since this ostensible dimension is naturalized. If we remove the idea of representation, the pragmatic and reflexive dimension of “presenting oneself,” and instead consider only its transitive and mimetic dimension, we soon lose our way in the “critique of representation” as this developed, for example, in the modernist perspective issuing from the affirmation of abstract art or in works examining nonmimetic semiotics specific to non-Western cultures or lying outside the so-called classical period. The interest in the way Marin links the idea of representation to that of power has no doubt suffered from this “critique of representation.” Not only is Marin’s thought foreign to such critique, but it may also be used to better elaborate it, going far beyond visual studies with which it shares a concern for situating images within the power relations in which they are caught. Marin never just denounces the “true face” lying beneath the fine appearances of art. He penetrates to the bottom of each of the subjects studied through a very particular form of analytical description conveyed in a precise, rich, and agile language enacting the play of the text.

乔瓦尼·卡雷里

Giovanni Careri

路易斯·马林，《Le Portrait du roi》（巴黎：Éditions de Minuit [“Le Sens commun”]，1981）。玛莎·M·霍尔 (Martha M. Houle) 将《国王的肖像》翻译成英文（伦敦：麦克米伦，1988 年）。

Louis Marin, Le portrait du roi (Paris: Éditions de Minuit [“Le Sens commun”], 1981). Translated into English by Martha M. Houle as Portrait of the King (London: Macmillan, 1988).

1 Louis Marin，“Le pouvoir et ses statements”（1980 年），《政治代表》，编辑。阿兰·坎蒂隆（Alain Cantillon）（巴黎：国际哲学学院，Kimé，2005），73-74。

1 Louis Marin, “Le pouvoir et ses representations” (1980), in Politiques de la représentation, ed. Alain Cantillon (Paris: Collège International de Philosophie, Kimé, 2005), 73–74.

1981

1981

父母的实践：继承统一了亲属关系领域

L’exercice de la parenté: Héritier Unifies the Field of Kinship

《亲属关系的实践》（L'exercice de la parenté）的命运颇为奇特。它一经出版，便被公认为亲属关系研究的重要里程碑：其理论雄心、所呈现结果的重要性、清晰简洁的风格——所有这些都注定了它在当代读者眼中将成为经典。然而，五年过去了，却没有任何深入的评论文章强调其贡献或讨论其分析前提。如果说这部重要著作最初未能产生应有的影响，那是因为在不断发展的亲属关系研究领域，它既超越了时代，回答了迄今为止悬而未决的问题，又落后于时代，拥护了日渐式微的结构主义范式。

L’exercice de la parenté (The exercise of kinship) had a curious fate. As soon as it was published, it was recognized as a major landmark in kinship studies: Its theoretical ambition, the importance of the results presented, its limpid and concise style—all predestined it, in the eyes of contemporary readers, to becoming a classic. However, five years elapsed before the publication of any in-depth reviews emphasizing its contributions or discussing its analytical premises. If this major book did not initially have the impact it deserved, it was because, within the evolving field of kinship studies, it was both ahead of its time, answering a question hitherto left pending, and behind its time, in espousing the structuralist paradigm which was losing ground.

从表面上看，这本书似乎是结构主义亲属理论的补充，扩展了《亲属基本结构》 （Structures élémentaires de la parenté）首先提出的分析。弗朗索瓦丝·埃里蒂埃（Françoise Héritier，生于 1933 年）着手分析一种被列维-斯特劳斯称为“半复杂”和“复杂”但因缺乏了解这些系统如何运作所需的统计分析工具而推迟研究的系统。它们的特点是，婚姻远非遵循规定模型（如所谓的基本系统），而是完全受禁令的约束，显然会导致个人的任意选择。《亲属基本结构》为这些系统引起的难题提供了一个有力的解决方案，它借鉴了一种对大量实际婚姻进行计算机数据分析的新方法。以布基纳法索的萨莫人为例，埃里蒂埃指出了两个迄今未被注意到的特征。首先，她指出，禁令不能仅仅用单系血缘关系来解释，因为它们超越了宗族框架，并在几代之后被废除（这与永久宗族的逻辑背道而驰）；此外，它们并非统一适用于一个宗族内的所有支系。其次，也是最重要的，她指出，这些禁令的影响因受影响的个体是同性（父子、兄弟等）还是异性（兄弟姐妹、母子等）而存在巨大差异。这种差异至关重要，因为它使得在不违反既定禁令的情况下，交换姐妹和重复先前的联盟成为可能，而这些惯例与限制性或扩展性交换的基本系统的运作相关。对萨莫婚姻的统计处理证实了这一论证思路。它们远非受历史随机性和个人策略的影响，而是由一种机制精心构建的，这种机制将它们指向婚姻领域的精确区域：配偶的选择尽可能地逼近禁令所设定的界限。换句话说，半复杂系统特有的禁令隐含地勾勒出婚姻的“规则”，这些规则与所谓的规定性联盟系统的规则一样（如果不是更严格的话）。“复杂”系统（尤其存在于欧洲社会）是否也是如此？在这些系统中，禁令与谱系位置有关，而不是按亲子关系划分的单位，并且允许配偶的范围似乎更加开放？尽管当时很少有大量的婚姻定量数据集，但Héritier能够检测到这些系统中的复制、重复和联盟序列，从而勾勒出随着时间的推移优先内婚的区域。她推断出存在与半复杂系统中运行的结构相同的下层结构，同样导致婚姻被相当精确地引导，同时与非血统划分社会领域的方式相关联。

On the face of it, the book looks like a supplement to the structuralist theory of kinship, expanding on analysis first put forward by Structures élémentaires de la parenté (The Elementary Structures of Kinship). Françoise Héritier (born 1933) sets out to analyze a type of system that Lévi-Strauss had called “semi-complex” and “complex” but had deferred studying for want of the statistical analytical tools needed to understand how these systems functioned. They are characterized by the fact that marriage, far from following a prescriptive model (as is the case in so-called elementary systems), is governed solely by prohibitions, apparently leading to arbitrary individual choices. L’exercice de la parenté provides a powerfully argued solution to the puzzle these systems raised, drawing on a novel method of computerized data analysis of a large set of actual marriages. Using the example of the Samo of Burkina Faso, Héritier draws out two hitherto unnoticed features. First, she shows that prohibitions cannot be explained solely in terms of unilineal filiation since they exceed the lineage framework and are dropped after several generations (running counter to the logic of permanent lineage); additionally, they do not apply uniformly to all lines within a lineage. Second, and above all, she shows that the effect of these prohibitions differs widely depending on whether the individuals impacted by two successive marriages in the same line are of the same sex (father and son, brothers, etc.) or the opposite sex (brother/sister, mother/son, etc.). This difference is crucial, for it makes it possible, without violating established prohibitions, to exchange sisters and repeat previous alliances, formulas associated with the functioning of elementary systems of restricted or expanded exchange. Statistical processing of Samo marriages confirms what this line of arguing suggests. Far from being exposed to the randomness of history and individual strategies, they are well and truly structured by a mechanism pointing them toward precise zones in the matrimonial field: The choice of spouse pushes up as closely as possible against the limits set out by prohibitions. In other words, the prohibitions specific to semi-complex systems implicitly sketch “rules” for marriage that are just as (if not more) restrictive than those governing so-called prescriptive alliance systems. Is the same true of “complex” systems (found particularly in European societies), where prohibitions relate to genealogical positions rather than units divided up by filiation and where the field of permissible spouses would appear to be even more open? Large quantitative datasets of marriage, though rare at the period, allowed Héritier to detect replications, duplications, and sequences of alliance in these systems, sketching out zones of preferential endogamy over time. She deduced the existence of subjacent structures identical to those operating in semi-complex systems, likewise resulting in marriages being channeled fairly precisely while being linked to non-lineage ways of dividing up the social field.

通过揭示基本系统联盟公式与隐藏在半复杂和复杂系统核心中的公式之间的连续性，埃里蒂埃统一了亲属关系领域。然而，无论这一贡献多么具有决定性，她的理论抱负远不止于此。她希望通过重新定义该领域的“基本”来巩固其基础。“法律”。这就是她第一章的目的，她在其中提出了两个强有力的论点。第一，每当要建立差异或身份关系时，“平行”关系（例如兄弟之间的关系）总是比“交叉”关系（兄弟姐妹之间的关系）更受青睐。第二，与“性别的差异价”有关，这导致了亲属称谓术语在男性和女性视角之间的系统性不对称，前者总是主导后者。

In bringing to light the continuities between the alliance formulas of elementary systems and those that lie hidden at the heart of semi-complex and complex systems, Héritier unified the field of kinship. Yet however decisive this contribution was, her theoretical ambition was even greater. She wanted to consolidate the foundations of this field by redefining its “fundamental laws.” That is the purpose of her first chapter, where she advances two strong theses. The first is that whenever it is a matter of positing a relation of difference or identity, a “parallel” relationship (such as that between brothers) will always be preferred over a “crossed” relationship (between a brother and sister). The second relates to the “differential valence of the sexes,” giving rise to systematic asymmetry in kinship terminologies between the masculine and feminine points of view, with the former always dominating the latter.

这些原则被赋予了近乎超越的性质，引发了争议：根据赫里特的观点，它们属于“可行领域”，而其他批评则集中在亲属关系形式的分类上，他们更倾向于将所研究的案例视为特定的联盟结构机制，而非独特的“体系”。赫里特也被指责在术语和婚姻公式之间设定了过于简单的关系。最后，以亲属关系概念为中心的建构主义理论家们提出了更为激进的批评，他们针对她对亲属关系生物学基础的概念化，认为其带有民族中心主义色彩。尽管如此，她的著作仍然令人瞩目地展现了结构主义方法的丰富性，并对理解基于禁令的婚姻形式做出了重要贡献。

The virtually transcendental nature granted to these principles has sparked debate: According to Hériter, they belong to the “realm of the feasible,” while other criticisms have focused on the categorization of forms of kinship, preferring to see in the examples studied particular regimes of alliance structures rather than distinct “systems.” Héritier has also been accused of positing too simple a relationship between terminologies and marriage formulas. Lastly, more radical criticisms from constructivist-type theorizations centered on notions of relatedness have targeted her conceptualization of the biological substrate of kinship, deemed ethnocentric. Nevertheless, her book remains a dazzling demonstration of the fertility of the structuralist approach and a key contribution to understanding marriage forms based on prohibitions.

安妮·克里斯汀·泰勒

Anne-Christine Taylor

Françoise Héritier，L'exercice de la Parenté（巴黎：Gallimard-Le Seuil-Éditions de l'EHESS [“Hautes études”]，1981）。

Françoise Héritier, L’exercice de la parenté (Paris: Gallimard-Le Seuil-Éditions de l’EHESS [“Hautes études”], 1981).

1982

1982

奴隶制与社会死亡：帕特森将奴隶制定义为社会死亡

Slavery and Social Death: Patterson Defines Slavery as Social Death

什么是奴隶制？在美国，奴隶制被错误地称为“特殊制度”，但它在各大洲的各个时期都以各种形式存在。我们是否有可能提出一个具有启发意义的、普适性的、超越历史的定义？毫无疑问，这是可能的，它提供了一种分析这一现象内在运作方式的方法，同时将奴隶制与农奴制等其他统治关系区分开来。定义奴隶制并由此理解它对奴隶的影响并非纯粹的学术问题：尽管如今奴隶制在世界各地都被法律禁止，但它在当今世界仍然存在，这也使其成为一个重大的政治问题。

What is slavery? Inaccurately called the “peculiar institution” in the United States, it has existed in various forms on all continents at all periods. Is it possible, and heuristically useful, to propose a universal transhistorical definition? No doubt it is possible, and it provides a way of analyzing the intrinsic functioning of the phenomenon while differentiating slavery from other relations of domination such as serfdom. Defining slavery and thus understanding what it does to slaves is not purely an academic problem: despite now being legally forbidden everywhere, slavery persists throughout today’s world, making it a major political issue as well.

奥兰多·帕特森（生于 1940 年）于 1973 年开始研究奴隶制与社会死亡时，他才在哈佛大学社会学系担任教授两年，也是第二位在艺术与科学研究生院获得永久职位的黑人教授。他是一名牙买加社会学家，曾在西印度群岛大学学院和伦敦经济学院学习。他的博士学位论文《奴隶制社会学》于 1967 年出版。除西里尔·LR·詹姆斯的《黑雅各宾派》外，这是第一部从奴隶角度关注加勒比奴隶制的研究论文。受斯坦利·埃尔金斯的影响，帕特森坚持认为牙买加奴隶制度具有破坏性和失范性。他认为，废除奴隶制后，这种最初的混乱不是催生单一的克里奥尔文化，而是催生了两种截然不同的文化，一种是欧洲文化，一种是非裔牙买加文化。希望更好地理解仍然塑造牙买加社会的原始制度，当时牙买加社会正经历着独立后，他开始对世界各地的奴隶制进行比较历史社会学研究。

When Orlando Patterson (born 1940) started working on Slavery and Social Death in 1973, he had been a professor at Harvard’s department of sociology for just two years and was only the second Black professor to obtain a permanent position within the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences. He was a Jamaican sociologist who had studied at the University College of the West Indies and then the London School of Economics. His doctorate, The Sociology of Slavery, was published in 1967. With the exception of Cyril L. R. James’s The Black Jacobins, it was the first study to focus on Caribbean slavery from the slaves’ point of view. Influenced by Stanley Elkins, Patterson insisted on the destructive and anomic effects of the Jamaican slavery system. He argued that after the abolition of slavery, this original chaos gave birth not to a single Creole culture but to two distinct cultures, one European and one Afro-Jamaican. Wishing to better understand the primordial institution that still shaped Jamaican society, which was then going through the challenges of independence, he launched himself into a comparative historical sociology of slavery throughout the world.

早在“全球转向”之前，帕特森就致力于摆脱奴隶研究中以西方为中心的偏见，因此他对所有奴隶制制度一视同仁。他从人类学家乔治·默多克提出的196个文化样本中，选取了66个曾经实行奴隶制的社会，从公元前1750年左右的巴比伦，到20世纪上半叶中国西南部大凉山地区的倮倮人。历史和人种学文献帮助他完成了这项定量和定性数据收集工作。因此，他的数据集涵盖了大量采用各种奴役形式的社会，这些社会的主人出于从社会声望到经济利益等多种动机做出回应，奴隶的人口比例和开放程度各不相同，这取决于获得解放的相对难易程度以及获得解放者及其后代的地位。

Working well before the “global turn,” Patterson sought to throw off the Western-centric bias in slave studies, and so he considered all systems of slavery equally. From the sample of 196 cultures drawn up by the anthropologist George Murdock, he selected sixty-six societies having practiced slavery, from Babylon around 1750 BCE through to the Lolo people in the Taliang Shan mountains in southwestern China in the first half of the twentieth century. The historical and ethnographic literature allowed him to complete this quantitative and qualitative data. Hence his dataset included a large set of societies employing various forms of enslavement, whose masters responded to plural motivations ranging from social prestige to economic profit, with different demographic proportions of slaves and varying degrees of openness, depending on the relative ease of obtaining manumission and the status of the freed and their descendants.

基于此比较，帕特森对奴隶制进行了独到的定义，强调其社会影响：“奴隶制是对天生被异化且普遍不名誉的人实施的永久暴力统治。” 天生被异化源于奴隶被从被奴役前所处的所有社会纽带中抽离出来，主人认为他们没有独立的社会存在。奴隶无根无据，孤立无援，最终沦为社会死亡状态。这种观念没有法律（财产）或经济（劳动）的余地，这与历史学家的经典定义或1926年在国际联盟主持下签署的《禁止奴隶贸易及奴隶制公约》中的定义不同。

On the basis of this comparison, Patterson derived an original definition of slavery emphasizing its social effects: “Slavery is the permanent, violent domination of natally alienated and generally dishonored persons.” Natal alienation stems from slaves being snatched from all social ties in which they were placed before enslavement, with masters recognizing them as having no independent social existence. Rootless and isolated, slaves are reduced to a condition of social death. Such a conception leaves no room for law (property) or economy (labor), unlike the classical definitions of historians or those in the Convention to Suppress the Slave Trade and Slavery signed under the auspices of the League of Nations in 1926.

将奴隶制定义为社会性死亡，与一种将奴隶制与解放联系起来的动态视角息息相关。在此，帕特森不再将奴隶制现象视为一种个人关系，而将其视为一种制度化过程。几乎所有奴隶制度都允许解放的可能性，而自由的承诺构成了一种社会控制的工具：为了使奴隶制得以延续，就需要对其加以否定。正如被奴役被认为是暴力死亡的替代品，并以奴役地位作为补偿一样，解放被比作一种召唤反赠的礼物，并且并未终结主人与前奴隶之间的依赖关系。然而，主人对奴隶的依赖程度丝毫不亚于奴隶对主人的依赖程度。事实上，奴隶制很容易演变成一种寄生关系。因此，其结果是自由也就不足为奇了。这一观点出现在《奴隶制与社会死亡》的结尾，帕特森在其1991年出版的另一部巨著《西方文化形成中的自由》中对此进行了探讨。

This definition of slavery as social death is associated with a dynamic perspective linking slavery and manumission. Here, Patterson no longer views the phenomenon as a personal relationship but as an institutional process. Nearly all systems of slavery allow for the possibility of manumission, with the promise of freedom constituting an instrument of social control: To perpetuate itself, slavery needs its negation. Just as being enslaved is thought of as a substitute for violent death, compensated by servile status, manumission is assimilated to a gift calling forth a counter-gift and does not put an end to the relationship of dependency between master and former slave. Still, masters are no less dependent on their slaves than slaves are on their masters. In fact, slavery may easily transform into a parasitical relationship. It is thus not surprising that the outcome is freedom. This idea, which emerges at the end of Slavery and Social Death, was explored by Patterson in his other great book, Freedom in the Making of Western Culture, published in 1991.

《奴隶制与社会死亡》问世近三十年后，所有对奴隶制感兴趣的研究人员至今仍会阅读的首部参考书。这是一本跨学科著作，社会学家、人类学家和历史学家都曾使用过它。此后，再没有其他类似的全球规模的比较著作问世。此外，“社会死亡”的概念也已被许多不同领域的专家所采用。然而，这部著作也引发了诸多争议。帕特森定义的三个要素——权力、与生俱来的异化和耻辱——都受到了批评。最重要的是，他被指责专注于主奴关系，并且仅仅从主人的意识形态角度来思考。诚然，帕特森确实强调了奴隶对其去社会化和堕落的抵抗，但他并没有将主奴关系中固有的冲突置于分析的核心，尽管奴隶自主的范式自20世纪60年代以来一直主导着学术研究。一些研究人员拒绝接受它的定义，另一些人则试图修改它，但所有人仍然与帕特森保持联系。他的研究从未停止引发关于什么是最极端的支配形式之一的争论。

Nearly thirty years after it first came out, Slavery and Social Death is the first reference to which all researchers interested in slavery still turn. It is a transdisciplinary book, used by sociologists and anthropologists as much as by historians. No other comparative work of similar global scale has been produced since. Additionally, the concept of “social death” has been taken up by specialists working in many different fields. Nevertheless, the work has been much debated. Each of the three components of Patterson’s definition—power, natal alienation, and dishonor—has been criticized. Above all, he is accused of focusing on the master-slave relationship and considering it solely from the angle of the ideology of masters. It is true that while Patterson does emphasize slave resistance to their desocialization and degradation, he does not place the conflict inherent to the master-slave relationship at the heart of his analysis, despite the paradigm of slave agency having dominated scholarship since the 1960s. Some researchers have rejected its definition, others have sought to revise it, but all still position themselves in relation to Patterson. His work has never ceased to inspire debate on what constitutes one of the most extreme forms of domination.

塞西尔·维达尔

Cécile Vidal

奥兰多·帕特森，《奴隶制与社会死亡：一项比较研究》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1982 年）。

Orlando Patterson, Slavery and Social Death: A Comparative Study (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1982).

1982

1982

艺术世界：贝克尔将艺术变成了一份像其他工作一样的工作

Art Worlds: Becker Turns Art into a Job Like Any Other

霍华德·贝克尔（生于1928年）自由地改编了哲学家阿瑟·丹托首次提出的艺术世界概念，并将其转化为一种社会学工具，并最终成为典范，从而将艺术纳入了合法的社会学研究对象之列。然而，《艺术世界》一书引发的巨变，其最显著的影响之一，是将艺术社会学重新定位于劳动社会学之中，从此以后，艺术社会学只不过是劳动社会学的一种特殊形式。承认艺术社会学的对象似乎剥夺了它的特殊性。经常有人对贝克尔提出异议，认为他的社会学并未探讨艺术本身，而是探讨了审美对象生产和分销过程中的工作和合作形式。贝克尔从未回避这个问题：在他的序言中，他指出自己将艺术视为“人们所做的工作”，并补充说，他“更关心创作作品的人之间的合作模式，而不是作品本身或那些传统意义上的创作者”。

In freely adapting the idea of an art world, first put forward by the philosopher Arthur Danto, and turning it into a sociological tool that went on to become paradigmatic, Howard Becker (born 1928) brought art into the circle of legitimate sociological objects. Yet one of the most significant effects of the upheaval that the book Art Worlds triggered was repositioning the sociology of art within the sociology of work, of which it was henceforth but a particularized form. Recognizing the object seemed to strip it of its exceptional character. One of the objections frequently made against Becker has been that his sociology did not address art as such but rather the jobs and forms of cooperation by which aesthetic objects were produced and distributed. Becker has never dodged this issue: in his preface, he states that he has treated art as “the work people do,” adding that he was “more concerned with patterns of cooperation among the people who make the works than in the works themselves or with those conventionally defined as their creators.”

正是这种转变赋予了这部作品社会学的特质。贝克尔对艺术的宗教性并不感冒，因为这种宗教性传达的是现代人所发展出来的那种没有神性的神圣感。他曾在芝加哥附近的酒吧弹钢琴，深知观众很少会被正统主义的冲动所激起。他早年在芝加哥的生活以及在职的音乐学徒生涯，让他养成了所谓的“先天性反精英主义”，这催生了他“将艺术视为与其他类型的工作并无太大区别，并将被定义为艺术家的人视为也无太大区别”的通货紧缩观点。来自其他类型的工人，特别是参与艺术作品制作的其他工人。”

It is this shift that lends the work its sociological quality. Becker is not impressed by the religion of art, which issues the feeling of the sacred without divinity as developed by the moderns. He had played piano in bars around Chicago and was well placed to know that audiences were rarely stirred by legitimist impulses. His early years in Chicago and musical apprenticeship on the job left him with what he calls a “congenital antielitism,” giving rise to his deflationary vision “treating art as not so very different from other kinds of work, and treating people defined as artists as not so very different from other kinds of workers, especially the other workers who participate in the making of art works.”

本书的强大之处在于它完全围绕一个简单而有效的理念展开：一个“世界”。贝克尔从丹托的定义中保留了艺术的语境、制度和人工维度。但他在此基础上，又融入了20世纪50年代他在芝加哥大学学习的互动主义社会学，这得益于埃弗里特·休斯和赫伯特·布鲁默的思想。社会生活发生在个体间互动特有的动态中；主体受其世界中客体所承载的意义所引导；他们在社会空间中的穿梭基于与其他主体互动所提供的信息，以及由解读情境所驱动的复杂游戏。在艺术领域，如同在社会生活的所有其他领域一样，行动者感受到合作的必要性，这是构成互动的有限常规程序的功能。虽然这些联系的可塑性使得重新安排和部分改写惯例成为可能，但不应因此就断定这些惯例转瞬即逝，或将其简化为艺术世界中的当下互动——相反，艺术世界展现出令人惊讶的持久性。

The book’s great strength is that it is entirely centered around a simple and effective idea: that of a “world.” From Danto’s definition, Becker retained the contextual, institutional, and artifactual dimension of art. But to this he added what the interactionist sociology he had learned in Chicago in the 1950s owed to the ideas of Everett Hughes and Herbert Blumer. Social life took place in the dynamic specific to interactions between individuals; agents are guided by the meanings borne by the objects peopling their world; their passage through social space is based on information provided by interactions with other agents and on the complex play fueled by interpreting situations. In the domain of art, as in all other sectors of social life, actors feel the need to cooperate as a function of a limited number of conventional procedures framing the interaction. While the plasticity of these links makes it possible to rearrange and partially rewrite conventions, one should not conclude that they are thereby ephemeral or reduce to the here and now interaction in art worlds—which display, on the contrary, surprising durability.

贝克尔的模型在很大程度上抵制了结构主义对其的传统指责。结构主义将互动论简化为短暂的面对面接触，掩盖了传统机制所发挥的重要作用。贝克尔从未忘记艺术有着悠久的历史。他将艺术世界定义为“人们组成的网络，他们通过对传统做事方式的共同认知，开展合作活动，创造出艺术世界赖以成名的艺术作品。”“工艺美术”一章提供了一种理解贝克尔方法的方式，这种方法既精巧又朴实。工艺美术与艺术的区别主要源于对生产活动的命名方式。一件物品可能被视为艺术家或工匠的作品，这取决于人们如何看待它，而这种看待方式源于某种传统的安排和社会关系：从这个角度来看，艺术世界理论是贝克尔在其第一部重要著作《局外人》（1963）中提出的标签理论的延伸。在本章中，贝克尔提出了一个关于审美变迁的真正理论，该理论解释了用于将不同的状态连续分配给表格制作的过程。

Becker’s model largely resists the conventional charge brought against it by structuralism, which reduces interactionism to brief face-to-face encounters, occulting the considerable part played by conventional mechanisms. Becker never forgets that the arts have a long history. He defines the art world as “the network of people whose cooperative activity, organized via their joint knowledge of conventional means of doing things, produces the kind of art works that art world is noted for.” The chapter on “Arts and Crafts” provides a way of grasping Becker’s approach, which is both elaborate and homespun. The distinction between arts and crafts derives primarily from a way of naming productive activities. A given object may be considered as the product of an artist or a craftsman depending on how it is viewed, which results from a certain state of conventional arrangements and social relations: The theory of art worlds is from this point of view an extension of the labeling theory that Becker had propounded in his first major book, Outsiders (1963). In this chapter, Becker sets out a veritable theory of aesthetic change, accounting for the processes by which different statuses are assigned successively to the production of forms.

“世界”的概念获得了巨大的成功，同时也引发了一些误解，一些使用者认为它放松了通常被归咎于皮埃尔·布迪厄场域理论的结构性限制，并被视为一种方法论上的无政府状态。但贝克尔所使用的“约定”概念实际上非常严谨。对合作互动的强调常常使人们认为贝克尔忽视了艺术竞争的对抗性方向。该著作出版三十多年后，它仍然被用来支持艺术分析，并且仍然引发争议。在法国，皮埃尔-米歇尔·门格尔（Pierre-Michel Menger）为其法文译本撰写了著名的序言，他将艺术作为作品的问题从互动论的框架中剥离出来，探索了新的途径。而且，正如场域、舞台和网络等概念一样，“世界”的概念仍在塑造着各种各样的经验分析。

The idea of a “world” met with great success, while also giving rise to some misunderstandings, with certain users seeing it as relaxing the structural constraints ordinarily imputed to Pierre Bourdieu’s field theory and as a form of methodological anarchy. But the idea of “convention” as used by Becker is in fact very rigorous. The emphasis on cooperative interplay has often led people to think that Becker neglected the agonistic direction of artistic competition. Over thirty years after the work was published, it is still used to support art analysis, and it still feeds controversy. In France, Pierre-Michel Menger, who wrote a noted foreword to the French translation, removed the issue of art as work from its interactionist envelope to explore new avenues. And, just like the concepts of field, stage, and network, that of a world continues to shape a wide variety of empirical analyses.

让-路易·法比亚尼

Jean-Louis Fabiani

霍华德·S·贝克尔，《艺术世界》（伯克利：加州大学出版社，1982 年）。

Howard S. Becker, Art Worlds (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1982).

1982

1982

污秽与芬芳：科尔宾赋予我们感官历史

The Foul and the Fragrant: Corbin Endows Our Senses with a History

阿兰·科尔宾（生于1936年）于1982年出版《瘴气与水仙花》（Le miasme et la jonquille）时，已年届46岁，是图尔大学的教授，专攻19世纪法国史。他获得了法国利穆赞地区的博士学位，之后又于1978年出版了一本关于妓女的书，这本书被认为是对米歇尔·福柯（Michel Foucault）所研究的偏差行为类型进行历史性探讨的成果，并因此成为当时颇为热门的研究课题。然而，他的研究远不止于此。

When Alain Corbin (born 1936) published Le miasme et la jonquille (The miasma and the daffodil) in 1982, he was forty-six years old and a professor at the Université de Tours specializing in nineteenth-century French history. A doctorate on the Limousin region of France had been followed by a book on prostitutes, published in 1978 and received as a historical approach to the types of deviance that Michel Foucault had made into a fashionable research topic. But it was already more than just that.

他现在又出版了一本书，探讨的是一个表面上看似最令人意外的主题：气味的历史。历史学家此前从未想过这个问题。科尔宾注意到人们对“雇佣女性”的气味以及豪华妓院中最早的浴室的存在进行了大量的讨论，于是萌生了这个想法。但他仍然保持谨慎。他并未声称自己就此问题撰写了一部全面的著作，更没有宣称自己是历史研究的转折点。或许这是常识，但在如此多的转折点被宣告数十年后的今天，这却显得罕见的谦逊。

He now published another book on what, on the face of it, seemed a most surprising subject: the history of smell. Historians had not thought of that before. The idea came to Corbin on noting how much was said about the smell of “women for hire” and the existence of the first bathrooms in luxury brothels. But he remained prudent. He did not claim to have produced a comprehensive work on the matter, even less to announce a turning point in historical scholarship. Perhaps this was a matter of common sense, but nowadays, decades after the proclamation of so many turning points, it comes across as an act of rare modesty.

科尔宾向读者保证，他只是为一段尚未书写的历史收集素材，仅仅暗示嗅觉曾有一段历史。事实上，他所做的远不止于此。《瘴气与长寿》分析了18世纪中期至19世纪末期，以及香水业的同期发明——那场伟大的除臭运动。麝香、琥珀和麝香猫的香气逐渐被淡淡的花香所取代。或许这场运动只影响了特定的社会精英，但这在……本身：工人阶级一直对强烈的气味念念不忘，并相信身体散发出的恶臭和排泄物具有治疗功效，如今他们身上的恶臭越来越成为人们的识别依据。探访穷人的人越来越坚定地指出，穷人就是那些身上散发着恶臭的人——他们确实是“最肮脏的人”。

Corbin assures his readers that he has simply gathered material for a history as yet unwritten, merely suggesting that the sense of smell had a history. In fact, he did far more than this. Le miasme et la jonquille analyzes the great undertaking to deodorize bodies between the mid-eighteenth and the late nineteenth century, together with the parallel invention of the perfumery industry. Musk, amber, and civet gave way to subtle floral scents. Perhaps the movement only affected a certain social elite, but that is significant in itself: The working classes, who had remained attached to strong smells and their belief in the therapeutic virtues of bodily effluvia and excrement, were increasingly identified by their foul smells. Those visiting the poor noted with ever-greater insistence that the poor were those who smelled bad—they truly were the “great unwashed.”

科尔宾强调了新希波克拉底主义在当时社会的影响力。然而，体液理论日渐式微，医生们认为疾病是由瘴气引起的，瘴气是由于空气和水缺乏流动而产生的，可以通过难闻的气味察觉出来。人们努力消除这些导致疾病的环境因素：下水道网络就是直接后果之一。从士兵的帐篷到船舱，从监狱牢房到病房，密闭空间里弥漫着可疑的气味，需要密切关注。人们从建筑物的一楼搬到二楼居住。对于那些抱怨生病的人，医生们给出了新的建议：换换空气。 （科尔宾以此作为他下一本书的起点，该书探讨了海水浴的起源和发展。）直到十九世纪末的巴斯德革命，人们才可以用保罗·布鲁阿德尔博士的话来说，“一切发臭的东西不会杀人，一切杀人的东西不会发臭”——这导致了对人类各种活动的重新评价。

Corbin emphasizes the hold of neo-Hippocratism over society of the period. However, the theory of humors was on the wane, and doctors said illness was caused by miasma, which was generated by the lack of movement of air and water, detectable by bad smells. Efforts were made to eliminate these environmental causes of illness: Sewer networks were one direct consequence. From the soldier’s tent to the ship’s cabin, from prison cells to hospital rooms, confined spaces with their suspect odors came in for close attention. People moved out from the first floor of buildings to settle on the second floor. To those who complained of illness, doctors responded with a new injunction: a change of air. (Corbin took this as the starting point for his next book, on the origins and development of sea bathing.) It was not until the Pasteurian revolution at the end of the nineteenth century that one could state, in the words of Dr. Paul Brouardel, that “everything which stinks does not kill, and everything which kills does not stink”—leading to a reappraisal of various swathes of human activity.

在“新史学”时代，科尔宾的研究受到了广泛好评，报刊杂志对他大加赞扬，他的研究成果被翻译成多种语言。德文译本的一个意外结果是帕特里克·聚斯金德于 1985 年出版的畅销书《香水》，这本书的部分灵感来源于他阅读的《瘴气与水》。1988 年，科尔宾刚刚当选为巴黎第一大学的教授，雅克·勒戈夫称这本关于气味的书与让·德吕莫的《西方的狗》和皮埃尔·维达尔-纳凯的《黑色猎人》一起，是“表征史的发展”的近期标志之一。当时这个术语尚未稳定：很快人们就开始谈论表征史。

In the days of “new history,” Corbin’s investigation was very well received, attracting eulogiums in newspapers and journals and being translated into many languages. One unexpected consequence of the German translation was Patrick Süskind’s best seller, Das Parfum, published in 1985 and partly inspired by his reading Le miasme et la jonquille. In 1988, when Corbin had just been elected to a chair at Université Paris 1, Jacques Le Goff referred to the book on smells as one of the recent pointers, together with Jean Delumeau’s La peur en Occident and Pierre Vidal-Naquet’s Le chasseur noir, of “the development of histories of representations.” The terminology was not yet stabilized: soon one spoke of the history of representations.

事实上，科尔宾以他自己的方式延续了吕西安·费弗尔（Lucien Febvre）提出的对过去时代“情感生活”的长期探究。费弗尔谈到了“感性”；这一课题后来被“心态”史学家所接手。科尔宾通过定义一种独创的方法来探究如何科学和医学信条、意识形态信仰、道德和宗教规范、美学和文学准则以及感官的运用塑造了人们在社会中的生活。研究表征系统及其表达的人物是这本“感性史”的核心。科尔宾在其所有著作中都运用了流畅的笔触，将他的研究范围拓展到视觉、触觉和听觉的历史。这本1982年出版的书是“感性人类学”的开端，因此它具有真正的新意。近期关于身体、阳刚之气和情感历史的综合著作也属于其分支。

In his own way, Corbin was in fact continuing the long inquiry Lucien Febvre had suggested into the “affective life” of times gone by. Febvre spoke of “sensibility”; this project had been taken up by historians of “mentalities.” Corbin transformed it by defining an original method for investigating how scientific and medical creeds, ideological beliefs, moral and religious norms, aesthetic and literary codes, and the uses of the senses shaped the life of people in society. Studying systems of representations and the figures expressing them lies at the heart of this “history of sensibilities,” written in the flowing style Corbin employed in all his books, expanding his research program to embrace the history of sight, touch, and hearing. The 1982 book, the starting point of “sensorial anthropology,” was thus something truly new. Recent comprehensive works on the history of bodies, virility, and the emotions are among its offshoots.

《瘴气与水仙》邀请读者研究“社会想象”，暗示了我们社会中存在着无数的表征系统。这种直觉使科尔宾成为他本人及其学生取之不尽、用之不竭的新课题源泉。每一次，他所遵循的规则都源于他对气味的研究。科尔宾在1982年写道，关于客体的论述、行为社会学及其学者的解读、个人期望以及当局实施的策略，构成了“一个碎片化的研究领域，其中真实与想象混杂在一起，以至于想要不惜一切代价、随时将它们分开都显得过于简单。” 这也是一种创新：科尔宾要求历史学家继续在当时的文献中追踪社会现实，但前提是，他们必须将这种现实视为实践和表征的杂糅，而非一组与虚构相对立的力量——这是我们今天仍然可以汲取的有益教训。

In inviting its readers to study the “social imaginary,” Le miasme et la jonquille suggested the existence of countless systems of representation at work in our societies, an intuition that led Corbin to become an inexhaustible source of new subjects, both for him and his pupils. Each time, the rule remains the one established by his study of smell. Writing in 1982, Corbin stated that discourse on the object, the sociology of behaviors and their interpretation by scholars, individual expectations, and strategies implemented by authorities formed “a fragmented field of study within which the real and imaginary are mixed to the point that it would be simplistic to wish to divide them at all costs and at any moment.” That too was new: Corbin was asking historians to carry on tracking down social reality in documents of the period, but with the proviso that they think of this reality as a jumble of practices and representations and certainly not as a set of forces opposing fiction—a lesson we may still usefully learn from today.

西尔万·维奈尔

Sylvain Venayre

阿兰·科尔宾 (Alain Corbin)，《Le miasme et la jonquille: L'odorat et l'imaginaire Social , XVIII e – XIX e siècles》（巴黎：Aubier [“Collection historique”]，1982）。由 Flammarion（“Champs”）再版，2016 年。由 Miriam L. Kochan、Roy Porter 博士和 Christopher Prendergast 翻译成英文，名为《恶臭与芬芳：气味与法国社会想象力》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1986 年）。

Alain Corbin, Le miasme et la jonquille: L’odorat et l’imaginaire social, XVIII e–XIX e siècles (Paris: Aubier [“Collection historique”], 1982). Republished by Flammarion (“Champs”), 2016. Translated into English by Miriam L. Kochan, Dr. Roy Porter, and Christopher Prendergast as The Foul and the Fragrant: Odor and the French Social Imagination (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1986).

1982

1982

伟人的诞生:戈德利尔与多种形式的统治

The Making of Great Men: Godelier and the Multiple Forms of Domination

新几内亚的巴鲁亚人约有2000人，居住在海拔1500至2000米的村落中，他们种植作物、饲养猪，并用植物制盐。在第一位民族学家莫里斯·戈德利尔（生于1934年）的首次实地考察之后，他们首次出现在人类学文献中。

The Baruya people of New Guinea, with a population of about 2,000, live in villages and hamlets at altitudes between 1500 and 2000 meters, where they grow crops, rear pigs, and produce salt from plants. They made their first appearance in the anthropological literature after the first field trip by their first ethnologist, Maurice Godelier (born 1934).

《伟人的诞生》 （La production des Grands Hommes）无疑是当时最成功的专著之一，它塑造了后来的大洋洲人类学。它至今仍备受关注，因为它探讨了一些基本问题。让我们来看看它探讨的两个最普遍的问题：首先，社会区分和支配关系，在特定的人类群体中，这些关系使行为体能够构想和履行各种形式的归属感、角色和社会地位；其次，支配权力关系的原则，尽管（甚至正因为）权力关系存在多样性，这些原则使社会再生产合法化。

La production des Grands Hommes (The Making of Great Men) is no doubt one of the most accomplished monographs of its period that shaped subsequent anthropology of Oceania. It is still of interest today because it addresses fundamental questions. Let us look at two of the most general issues it tackles: first, the relations of social distinction and domination, which within a given human group, allow actors to conceive of and perform various forms of belonging, roles, and social statuses; and second, the principles governing power relations, which despite (and even because of) their diversity, legitimize social reproduction.

戈德利尔处理这些问题的方式，其主要亮点之一在于他颠覆了主流的分析思路。他的作品并非将社会视为一个客体，一个既定事实，或仅仅是一个待研究的场所。社会被理解为基于各种表征形式而达成共识的权力关系的结果，这些表征形式也为这些权力关系提供了正当性。巴鲁亚社会远非永恒不朽，而是漫长迁徙、冲突和征服历史的产物，其根基在于一系列共同的信仰，这些信仰在仪式活动中得以重现，将各种形式的社会差异和统治联系在一起。

One of the main points of interest of Godelier’s way of tackling these issues is that he inverts the dominant lines of analysis. His work does not approach society as an object as such, as a given fact, or simply as a locus to be studied. It is understood as the consequence of consented power relationships based on forms of representation that justify them. Far from being lasting and timeless, Baruya society is discussed as the product of a long history of migrations, conflicts, and conquests, underpinned by a body of shared beliefs that are reproduced in ritual activity, connecting various forms of social distinctions and domination.

这些信仰体现在三个方面：首先，巴鲁亚氏族到来后，其部落等级制度下的统治。巴鲁亚氏族被驱逐出其领土后，通过征服和联盟在当地强行建立统治，最终以巴鲁亚氏族的名字命名了整个社会。其次，男性对女性统治的固有规范；第三，男性之间的统治形式，其中存在着将伟人（伟大的萨满、战士和伟大的猎人）与其他男性区分开来的等级制度。巴鲁亚社会建立在这三种统治形式及其繁衍之间的关系之上。

These beliefs take three forms: The first is domination in relation to the hierarchy of clans that followed the arrival of the Baruya clan, which, on being evicted from its territory, imposed itself locally through conquest and alliance, eventually giving its name to the entire society. Second are the norms inherent to the domination of men over women, and third, the forms of domination among males with a hierarchy distinguishing Great Men (great shamans, warriors, and great hunters) from the other men. Baruya society is based on the relationship between these three forms of domination and their reproduction.

男性统治至关重要。尽管女性拥有自己的仪式、神话和社会空间，但她们却不被允许制造或拥有工具、武器、乐器或圣物。她们被排除在土地所有权之外，也无法参与旨在重塑社会凝聚力的大型成年礼；她们被赋予了不洁和危险的属性，而这些属性本应由男性世界掌控。然而，戈德利尔再次颠倒了因果关系。他与女性主义人类学的观点相悖，确立了男性统治与女性从属之间的相互作用：使用身体和象征性暴力需要被统治者的同意。这种同意确保了统治地位的长期再生产，男性和女性的成年礼将所传达的意识形态根植于社会大众的思想和身体之中。青春期女孩只需两周即可成为潜在的母亲，而男孩则必须在成年礼之家生活十二年，在此期间，他们要经历四个漫长的仪式周期，才能结婚生子。女性入会仪式强调定期吞咽丈夫精子的重要性，而男性入会仪式的秘密则侧重于年轻入会者必须为尚未接触阴道的年长同伴进行口交。据推测，这种定期吞咽会使他们在隐居期间变得更加强壮，甚至比女性更有力量。对男性统治的认同源于共享相同的宇宙观，认为女性拥有有限的行动能力，而将主要的自主权赋予太阳——生命起源的起源——以及太阳的合法代表——男性。太阳能量的力量应该体现在精子中，而母乳据说就是从精子中产生的。这种仪式性的同性恋仅限于入会者之家进行。赋予男性想象中的力量，让他们可以在母亲子宫外第二次生育男孩，但男孩因此被剥夺了生育能力。

Male domination is pivotal. Although women have their own rituals, myths, and social spaces, they are not allowed to make or own tools, weapons, musical instruments, or sacred objects. They are excluded from landownership and from the great initiatory cycles whose purpose is to reproduce social cohesion; they bear the attributes of impurity and of danger, which the male world is supposed to control. But once again, Godelier inverts the causality. Going against feminist anthropology, he establishes an interplay between male domination and female subordination: The wielding of physical and symbolic violence includes the consent of those who are dominated. This consent ensures the reproduction of domination over time, with male and female initiation rites anchoring the conveyed ideology in the minds and bodies of the society. While it only takes two weeks to transform a pubescent girl into a potential mother, boys have to live for twelve years in the house of initiates, a time during which they endure four long ritual cycles before they are allowed to marry and procreate. While female initiations explain the importance of regularly swallowing their husband’s sperm, male initiatory secrets focus on the obligation for young novices to perform fellatio on their older co-initiates, who have not yet come into any contact with a vagina. This regular ingestion is presumed to make them grow stronger during their reclusion and more powerful than women. Consent to male domination is rooted in sharing the same cosmology, attributing a limited capacity for action to women and major agency to the sun, which is at the origin of living beings, as well as to the sun’s legitimate representatives—men. The power of the sun’s energy is meant to be embodied in sperm, from which maternal milk is said to derive. This ritual homosexuality limited to the house of initiates gives men the imaginary power to give birth to boys a second time, outside their mother’s womb, who are thus stripped of their procreative capacity.

第一组区分和支配关系将各个氏族联系起来，并在其历史动态中重新定位社会结构，而第二组区分和支配关系则是横向的，将两性关系中的支配与服从问题联系起来。至于第三组区分和支配关系，它与政治权力产生和行使的条件有关。在1963年一篇后来成为经典的文章《穷人、富人、大人物、酋长》中，马歇尔·萨林斯区分了大洋洲两种理想的典型权力类型：波利尼西亚酋长和美拉尼西亚大人物。前者通过其世系地位继承权力，而后者则通过积累和重新分配财富、承担债务以及建立相互依存的网络来获得名望和权力。戈德利尔发现了大洋洲第三种理想的政治权力类型：伟人，他们与大人物的显著区别在于，他们的名望和权力源于个人的技能和功绩，与财富及其分配无关。

While the first set of distinctions and dominations connects the various clans and repositions social structures in its historical dynamics, this second set is transversal, linking the question of dominance and subordination within relations between the sexes. As for the third, it relates to the conditions in which political power emerges and is wielded. In a 1963 article that has become a classic (“Poor Man, Rich Man, Big Man, Chief”), Marshall Sahlins distinguished between two ideal-typical types of power in Oceania: Polynesian chiefs and Melanesian Big Men. While the former inherited power through their genealogical position, the latter acquired fame and power by accumulating and redistributing goods, by contracting debts, and by setting up networks of interdependence. Godelier discovered a third ideal-type of political power in Oceania: that of Great Men, who differ markedly from Big Men in that their fame and power derive from their individual skills and exploits, independent of wealth and its distribution.

Baruya 专著提供了丰富的民族志和理论分析，可以从中解决仍然存在的基本人类学问题。

The Baruya monograph provides an ethnographically and theoretically rich analysis from which fundamental anthropological questions that are still at stake may be addressed.

洛朗·杜塞特

Laurent Dousset

莫里斯·戈德利尔 (Maurice Godelier)，《La Production des Grands Hommes: Pouvoir et domination masculine chez les Baruya de Nouvelle-Guinée》（巴黎：Fayard [“L'espace du politique”]，1982）。 Flammarion（“Champs”）再版，2003 年。由 Rupert Swyer 翻译成英文，名为《伟人的形成：新几内亚巴鲁亚人的男性统治和权力》（剑桥：剑桥大学出版社，1986 年）。

Maurice Godelier, La production des Grands Hommes: Pouvoir et domination masculine chez les Baruya de Nouvelle-Guinée (Paris: Fayard [“L’espace du politique”], 1982). Republished by Flammarion (“Champs”), 2003. Translated into English by Rupert Swyer as The Making of Great Men: Male Domination and Power among the New Guinea Baruya (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1986).

1983

1983

殖民地印度农民起义的基本方面：古哈恢复了下属的政治意识

Elementary Aspects of Peasant Insurgency in Colonial India: Guha Rehabilitates the Political Consciousness of Subalterns

《殖民地印度农民起义的基本面》是拉纳吉特·古哈（生于1923年）的代表作，他是印度底层史学派的创始人。本书于1983年出版，当时古哈刚刚推出名为《底层研究》的论文集系列，这套史学思潮也因此得名。但他此前已为此研究了十年，正是在这段酝酿时期，以及与他并肩工作的年轻研究团队的讨论中，底层研究的初步理论和方法框架逐渐成型。古哈是一位热衷政治的孟加拉历史学家，二战期间加入印度共产党，并从 1947 年起担任了六年的全职党员。1953 年，他回到加尔各答大学继续学习和教授历史，1956 年退出印度共产党，1960 年最终定居英国。他熟悉英国激进历史学家团体的工作，该团体由一批才华横溢的批判马克思主义学者组成，深受葛兰西思想的影响（如爱德华·P·汤普森、埃里克·霍布斯鲍姆等人），他们采用被称为“自下而上的历史”的历史写作模式。在印度的背景下，他（和当地亲华的异见共产党人一样）反对印度共产党对执政的民族资产阶级的支持，指责其背叛了在争取独立斗争期间做出的社会承诺。 1970 年和 1971 年，在印度进行学习访问时，他遇到了一些刚刚参与 1967 年在北孟加拉发动的纳萨尔派（毛派）叛乱的学生。他认同这种民粹主义为被剥夺继承权的农村群众的解放而斗争的极左翼组织的理想主义，将焦点转向印度农民起义的历史。

Elementary Aspects of Peasant Insurgency in Colonial India is the major work by Ranajit Guha (born 1923), the founding father of the Indian subaltern school of historiography. When this book came out in 1983, Guha had just launched the series of volumes of collected papers entitled Subaltern Studies that gave its name to this current of historical scholarship. But he had previously been working on it for ten years, and it was during this period of gestation, accompanied by debates with a team of young researchers working alongside him, that the initial theoretical and methodological framework of Subaltern Studies took shape. Guha, a politically committed Bengali historian, had joined the Communist Party of India (CPI) as a student during the Second World War and served six years as a full-time party worker from 1947. He returned to university studies and history teaching in Calcutta in 1953, resigned from the CPI in 1956, and eventually settled in Britain in 1960. He was familiar with the work of the British radical historians’ group, a brilliant collective of critical Marxist scholars significantly influenced by Gramsci’s thought (such as Edward P. Thompson, Eric Hobsbawm, and others), and with their mode of history-writing known as “history from below.” In the Indian context, he rejected (as did the local pro-Chinese dissident communists) the CPI’s support for the ruling national bourgeoisie, accused of having betrayed the social promises made during the struggle for independence. When on a study visit to India in 1970 and 1971, he met students who had recently been involved in the Naxalite (Maoist) insurgency launched in northern Bengal in 1967. He identified with this populist idealism of an ultra-left-wing organization fighting for the emancipation of the disinherited rural masses and switched focus to the history of Indian peasant uprisings.

《基本方面》旨在重塑农民的政治意识，这与马克思将农民比作“一袋土豆”的著名比喻截然相反，后者表达了农民作为陷入虚假意识的群体，无法进行任何形式的有组织的、自主的集体反抗。古哈巧妙地摒弃了任何试图将农民的主体性本质化的表现，而是专注于他们具体的反抗实践。通过建立一系列反复出现的反抗动员和行动形式（即书名中提到的“抵抗的基本形式”），他试图揭示所谓的“农民反抗意识的逻辑”。他的研究始于1783年殖民地档案中记录的第一次反抗，结束于1900年，旨在理解这种反抗意识在民族主义政治渗透到农村之前的原始“纯粹性”。他在六个主题章节中详细介绍了农民起义实践，这六个章节分别为“否定”（流行的抵抗概念）、“模糊性”（犯罪与起义之间的模糊界限）、“模态”（集体行动和组织的形式）、“团结”（起义中的团结与不和）、“传播”（起义作为交流）和“领土性”（起义的空间范围）。

The purpose of Elementary Aspects is to rehabilitate the political consciousness of the peasantry, going against Marx’s famous metaphor comparing it to a “sack of potatoes” expressing its inaptitude, as a multitude plunged into false consciousness, for any form of organized autonomous collective resistance. In a smart move, Guha banishes any essentializing attempt to represent the subjectivity of the peasants, instead focusing on their concrete rebellious practices. In establishing a repertoire of recurrent forms of insurgent mobilization and action (the “elementary forms of resistance” announced in the book’s title), he seeks to reveal what he calls the “logic of peasant rebel consciousness.” His investigation opens in 1783 with the first rebellion mentioned in the colonial archives and closes in 1900, so as to apprehend this rebel consciousness in its original “purity,” before nationalist politics penetrated the countryside. He details peasant insurgency practices in six thematic chapters entitled “Negation” (the popular conception of resistance), “Ambiguity” (the fuzzy boundary between crime and insurgency), “Modality” (the forms of collective action and organization), “Solidarity” (unity and discord within the rebellion), “Transmission” (rebellion as communication), and “Territoriality” (the spatial horizon of the rebellions).

这本书论证有力，文笔清晰优雅，因其严谨性和丰富的实证研究成果而备受赞誉。但其方法论选择和对人民的理想化也引发了广泛讨论。由于了解这些事件的唯一途径是通过国家镇压档案的扭曲视角，古哈不得不“逆潮流而动”地阅读官方资料，以解读起义者的经历，但这种解读永远无法弥补这些记录的诸多缺失。对这场运动的社会学分析存在缺陷，因为“农民起义”这一通用标签涵盖了山区森林地区等级森严的部落群体的起义，也涵盖了大平原地区古老且分化丰富的农民群体的起义。同样，“农民”这一通用术语也没有区分土地所有者、佃农和农业劳动者，而他们的客观利益和能力因为抵抗的方式可能有所不同。最后，优先考虑反抗行为的形式，不利于探究其原因，也不利于对事件进程进行线性叙述。然而，古哈在此的方法预示了政治危机社会学专家米歇尔·多布里所说的“病因学错觉”，这种错觉倾向于将危机的实际原因简化为其潜在决定因素，从而暗示对人类行为进行机械化的解释。古哈对起义的去语境化源于他对经济主义和“自发”农民起义幼稚化寓言的彻底拒绝。通过剥离起义的历史独特性以提取共同特征，并按主题对这些特征进行分组，他反而试图在某种结构性的非时间性中，展示一种连贯而自主的从属政治文化的存在，使我们能够听到他后来所说的“历史的细小声音”。

The book, strongly argued and written in a lucid and elegant style, was praised for its rigor and for the wealth of empirical work accomplished. But its methodological options and idealization of the people were much discussed. Because the only way to gain access to the events was through the distorting lens of the archives of state repression, Guha had to read his official sources “against the grain” to decipher the experience of the insurgents, but this decoding could never make up for the many silences of these records. The sociological analysis of the movements is deficient, for the generic label “peasant rebellions” encompasses revolts of weakly stratified tribal groups in mountainous forest zones as well as uprisings occurring among ancient and richly differentiated peasantries of the great plains. Similarly, the general term “peasant” makes no distinction between landowning farmers, tenants, and agricultural laborers, whose objective interests and capacities for resistance could differ. Finally, the priority given to the forms of rebel behavior works to the detriment of exploring their causes and of a linear narrative of the course of events. Yet, Guha’s approach here prefigured what Michel Dobry, a specialist of the sociology of political crises, has called “the etiological illusion,” which tends to reduce the actual causes of a crisis to its potential determinants, thus implying a mechanistic explanation of human behavior. Guha’s decontextualizing of the uprisings arose from his radical rejection of economism and of the infantilizing fable of “spontaneous” peasant revolts. By stripping the rebellions of their historical singularity in order to extract common characteristics and grouping these thematically, he was on the contrary seeking to demonstrate the existence, in a sort of structural atemporality, of a coherent and autonomous political culture of subalternity, enabling us to hear what he later called “the small voice of history.”

这本杰作虽然建立在如此有争议的前提上，但却是如何成为一部标志性文本的？它值得充分赞扬的是，它把“底层”这一概念（借用自葛兰西）引入了主流历史话语，这一概念暗示了权力的概念，从而将“自下而上的历史”的重点从经济和社会批判转移到了对统治的政治批判。自 20 世纪 90 年代以来，底层研究在全球的流行推动了该术语在整个社会科学中的适应性。但最重要的是，恢复人民政治的计划使《底层研究》成为一个象征性的指称。《底层研究》在此基础上进行了扩展，开辟了第一条从前殖民地世界发端的具有全球影响力的社会科学研究路线，引发了许多南方国家的效仿。随着底层学派在学术界的崛起，它不可否认地转向了后现代主义，偏离了最初的轨迹。但古哈的《基本方面》在社会科学研究中脱颖而出，成为这一学术探索最初质疑的最成功成果。

How did this brilliant book, although built on such disputed premises, become an emblematic text? It deserves full credit for importing into mainstream historical discourse the category (borrowed from Gramsci) of the subaltern, which connotes a notion of power, thus shifting the focus of “history from below” from economic and social critique to the political critique of domination. The acclimatization of the term within the social sciences as a whole was then carried forward by the planetary vogue of subaltern studies as of the 1990s. But it is above all the project of rehabilitating the politics of the people that made Elementary Aspects a symbolic reference. Subaltern Studies, which expanded on it, initiated the first line of social science research with a global outreach to have issued from the formerly colonized world, engendering emulation in many countries of the South. As the subaltern school rose to academic prominence, it undeniably took a postmodernist turn, which made it deviate from its initial trajectory. But Guha’s Elementary Aspects stands out among social science research as the most accomplished outcome of the initial questionings of this intellectual venture.

雅克·普什帕达斯

Jacques Pouchepadass

拉纳吉特·古哈（Ranajit Guha），《殖民地印度农民起义的基本方面》（德里：牛津大学出版社，1983 年）。

Ranajit Guha, Elementary Aspects of Peasant Insurgency in Colonial India (Delhi: Oxford University Press, 1983).

1983

1983

个人主义论文集:杜蒙特对西方例外的透视

Essays on Individualism: Dumont Places Western Exception in Perspective

路易·杜蒙（Louis Dumont，1911-1998）的《个人主义论文集》 （ Essais sur l'individualisme）收录了七篇看似迥然不同的文本。目录将现代意识形态研究与“比较原则”研究区分开来，却并未揭示出本书的统一性。然而，尽管本书的参考文献和主题之繁杂可能会令读者感到困惑，但它始终遵循着一个总体目标。

Essais sur l’individualisme (Essays on Individualism) by Louis Dumont (1911–1998) is a collection of seven seemingly very disparate texts. The table of contents, in distinguishing between studies about modern ideology and those on the “comparative principle,” gives no indication of what lends the volume its unity. Yet, while the book may disconcert readers with its diverse references and topics, it follows an overall purpose.

这个想法是，社会人类学——换句话说，人类社会的比较研究——可能有助于我们思考现代社会面临的两个“主要政治问题”。

The idea is that social anthropology—in other words, the comparative study of human societies—may contribute to our way thinking about two “major political problems” facing modern societies.

这两个问题是什么？第一个问题源于我们的世界正变得越来越多元文化。“非现代文化将在世界共同文明的形成中发挥越来越重要的作用。”杜蒙特所说的文化互动，指的是尚未被称为全球化的现象，其影响（例如，个人主义中反个人主义主张的出现，例如“少数人权利”的主张）既体现在主导（个人主义）文化中，也体现在被主导（整体主义）文化中。第二个问题是“民主的弊病”。极权主义虽然看似与民主对立，但它并非某种前现代意识形态的复苏，而是民主“一旦忽视其局限性，力求完美实现，并经受住事实的检验，最终陷入自我分裂”时所呈现的一种矛盾形式。这些难题显然一如既往地具有现实意义。

What are the two problems? The first stems from the fact that our world is becoming ever more intercultural. “Non-modern cultures are going to weigh more and more heavily in the making of the world’s common civilization.” By cultural interaction, Dumont was designating the phenomenon not yet called globalization, whose effect (the emergence of anti-individualist claims within individualism, such as the assertion of “minority rights,” for instance) transpires both in the dominant (individualist) culture and in dominated (holistic) cultures. The second problem is the “diseases of democracy.” Totalitarianism, though seemingly opposed to democracy, is not the resurgence of some premodern ideology, but a contradictory form assumed by democracy “once it loses sight of its limitations, strives to perfect realization, and, checked by the facts, ends up divided against itself.” These aporia are clearly as topical as ever.

人类学视角如何看待这些问题？杜蒙特表示，他的所有研究都受益于马塞尔·杜蒙特从莫斯那里汲取了两点教训。首先，人类学需要成为一门社会学，因此它必须将研究现象与特定的全球化社会联系起来（而不是与人性或心灵联系起来）。其次，正因为人类学是社会学，它才遵循“比较原则”。说人类学是比较性的，并不意味着它需要通过检测不同社会中的可比特征来进行研究，因为这将导致失去对具体社会的参照。它需要进行一种更为彻底的比较，质疑研究者本人。杜蒙特引用了莫斯的名言：“一旦了解了人们相信什么、思考什么，以及相信和思考这些的人是谁，社会学的解释就完成了。”为了忠实于莫斯的观点，杜蒙特认为，“相信和思考这些的人是谁”这一问题需要加上“与我们这些相信这一点的人相比”来补充。

What might an anthropological perspective on these problems be? Dumont states that all his research is indebted to the thought of Marcel Mauss, from whom he takes two lessons. First, anthropology needs to be a sociology, and hence it must relate the phenomena studied to a particular englobing society (rather than to human nature or the mind). Second, anthropology, precisely because it is social, works on the “comparative principle.” Saying anthropology is comparative does not mean it needs to proceed by detecting comparable features in different societies, which would entail losing reference to concrete societies. It needs to conduct a more radical kind of comparison, calling into question the researcher in person. Dumont cites Mauss’s precept: “Sociological explanation is completed once one has seen what people believe and think, and who the people believing and thinking that are.” To be faithful to Mauss, Dumont argues that “who the people believing and thinking that are” needs to be completed by adding “in comparison to us who believe this.”

如果人类学家能够进行中肯的比较——这里指的是我们西方人和印度人之间的比较——那么我们就可以从全球视角来看待我们的思想，从而展现出它们的构成。这个词需要从结构主义或格式塔主义的角度来理解：所研究的思想和价值观并非我们可以彼此孤立出来的语义原子，而是从它们在整体中的位置中获取内容，而整体需要被如此理解。

If the anthropologist comes up with a pertinent comparison—here, between us Westerners and India—this makes it possible to adopt a global perspective on our ideas and so bring out their configuration. This word needs to be taken in the structuralist or Gestaltist meaning of the term: the ideas and values to be studied are not semantic atoms that we may isolate from one another, but they derive their content from their position in a whole, which needs to be apprehended as such.

杜蒙特认为，他以此回应了人类学家必须研究实践、物质事实而非表象的反对意见。在能够探讨现代意识形态所忽略的物质事实之前，我们首先需要批判其用于描述和构想这些事实的范畴。前述两大问题的难点在于，我们的范畴——经济、政治、宗教等等——的不足，恰恰是因为它们融入了定义我们意识形态的个人主义构型；而我们面临的问题则表明，属于相反构型的价值观和经验的持续存在或正在积聚力量：即一种将社群置于核心价值之上的整体主义意识形态。

Dumont reckons that he has thereby responded to the objection that an anthropologist must study practices, material facts, rather than representations. Before being able to address material facts escaping our modern ideology, we first need to critique its categories for describing and conceiving of them. And the difficulty of the two major problems mentioned earlier stems from the fact that our categories—economics, politics, religion, and so on—are inadequate, precisely because they partake in the individualist configuration defining our ideology, whereas the problems facing us signal the persistence or gathering strength of values and experiences belonging to the opposed configuration: that of a holistic ideology placing cardinal value on community.

因此，杜蒙特的目标是用从人类学角度更令人满意的概念来取代我们的常识性观念，因为它们更具社会学性，而更具社会学性，因为它们是通过比较。因此，第一部分的研究提供了规范意义上的个体以及政治、国家、社会主义和极权主义范畴的比较定义。

Dumont’s goal is thus to replace our commonsense ideas with concepts that are more satisfying from an anthropological point of view because they are more sociological, and more sociological because they are reached via comparison. Hence the studies in the first part provide comparative definitions of the individual, in the normative sense, and of the category of politics, of the nation, of socialism, and of totalitarianism.

现代性人类学表明，个人主义文化是普遍历史中的一个例外。理解这一例外的一种方式是揭示其产生的原因，杜蒙特在其前两章中正是如此。在许多思想史著作中，中世纪并不存在，未能在古代与现代之间找到自己的位置。但在杜蒙特所勾勒的回顾性画像中，不仅在古典时代与现代之间有一个中间时期，而且这一时期起着决定性的作用。人们经常提出一个问题：中世纪是否存在个人？杜蒙特在第一章中描述了“游离于世界之外的个人”（早期基督徒）如何转变为“在世之中的个人”（现代自然法中的个人），以此来回答这个问题。另一个经典的争论与现代政治思想的定义有关。杜蒙特通过回顾现代国家——其秩序中终极政治价值的承载者——继承了中世纪教会所拥有的主权职能这一转变过程来回答这个问题。

An anthropology of modernity shows that individualist culture is an exception within universal history. One way of understanding this exception is to expose how it came about, which Dumont does in his first two chapters. In many histories of ideas, the Middle Ages do not really exist, failing to find their place between the ancients and the moderns. But in the retrospective portrait sketched by Dumont, not only is there a middle period between classical antiquity and modernity, but this period plays a decisive role. The question has often been raised whether the individual existed in the Middle Ages. Dumont answers by describing in his first chapter how the individual-out-of-the-world (the early Christians) metamorphosed into an individual-in-the-world (the persons of modern natural law). Another classic debate relates to what defines modern political thought. Dumont answers by going over the transition in which the modern state, the bearer of ultimate political values in their order, inherited the sovereign function held by the Church in the Middle Ages.

文森特·德孔布

Vincent Descombes

路易斯·杜蒙，《个人主义随笔：现代意识形态的人类学视角》（巴黎：Éditions du Seuil [“Esprit”]，1983）。由 Éditions du Seuil 重新出版，1993 年。译为英文《个人主义论文：人类学视角下的现代意识形态》（芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，1986 年）。

Louis Dumont, Essais sur l’individualisme: Une perspective anthropologique sur l’idéologie moderne (Paris: Éditions du Seuil [“Esprit”], 1983). Republished by Éditions du Seuil, 1993. Translated into English as Essays on Individualism: Modern Ideology in Anthropological Perspective (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1986).

1983

1983

想象的共同体：安德森揭示国家虚构的基础

Imagined Communities: Anderson Unveils Nations’ Fictional Underpinnings

很难想出一个比《想象的共同体：民族主义起源与传播的思考》更引人注目的书名。如果说它对本书的成功起到了实质性的贡献，那是因为这个书名预示了一篇短小易懂的文章，明确了内容，并将论点凝聚成一个经久不衰的理念——“想象的共同体”。显而易见，当代民族是文化的产物，因此本质上具有偶然性。

It would be hard to come up with a more arresting title than Imagined Communities: Reflections on the Origin and Spread of Nationalism. If it contributed substantially to the book’s success, it was because the title announced a short, accessible essay, specified the content, and gathered the thesis into a lastingly successful idea, an “imagined community.” It is immediately clear that contemporary nations are cultural creations, hence contingent by nature.

本尼迪克特·安德森（1936-2015）的著作，非但没有掀起“身份创造”的昙花一现，反而从根本上改变了民族主义研究领域。《想象的共同体》一书驳斥了所有那些将民族起源于族群、习俗、语言或历史与身份的缓慢沉淀的人们。民族所宣称的特殊主义，最终沦为一种想象的建构、一种虚构、一种宏大的叙事，最终被具体化于社会实践之中；尽管每个民族都声称自己独一无二且根植于历史，但这掩盖了一个与商业资本主义世界历史息息相关的共同进程。然而，这本书在世界范围内的接受与其说源于这一原创理论，不如说源于安德森在关于民族的大辩论中简洁而优雅地捍卫了其清晰的立场。这场辩论在20世纪80年代和90年代的社会科学中具有根本性的意义，并以欧内斯特·盖尔纳、安东尼·史密斯、帕萨·查特吉和埃里克·霍布斯鲍姆等人的重要著作为标志。

The book by Benedict Anderson (1936–2015), rather than sparking a passing vogue for “identity creation,” fundamentally altered the field of nationalism studies. Imagined Communities argues against all those who seek the origin of nations in an ethnic group, custom, language, or the slow sedimentation of history and identity. The particularism to which nations lay claim becomes an imaginary construct, a fiction, a great narrative that has ended up being embodied in social practices; though each nation claims to be exceptional and historically grounded, this conceals a common process linked to the history of the merchant capitalist world. Yet the book’s reception worldwide stemmed less from this original theory than from Anderson’s elegant and concise defense of a clear stance in the great debate about nations, which was of fundamental importance in the social sciences of the 1980s and 1990s and marked by major texts by Ernest Gellner, Anthony Smith, Partha Chatterjee, and Eric Hobsbawm, among others.

安德森的论点借鉴了英国马克思主义（他是该派最杰出的支持者之一），以及年鉴学派、瓦尔特·本雅明和法兰克福学派。他将民族主义视为印刷资本主义的化身，深入探究了近代早期，包括古腾堡的发明、出版和图书市场的发展以及报纸的出现。这产生了两个分水岭：首先，由于技术发明和资本主义的扩张，文化产品可复制和大规模传播的时代的开始；其次，某些精英（对其的描述超出了本书的讨论范围）建立了诠释共同体，摆脱了先前教派在制定真理方面的垄断。例如，通过“民族”文学，白话语言凌驾于神圣语言之上。它们标志着并传达了想象的领土化及其撤出边界和民族内部的趋势。因此，国家以前所未有的图像、符号和文字的形式出现，反对“传统”宇宙观，产生一种理解时间、空间和记忆的新方式：这种可理解性主要是想象的和文本的，由于技术和不断扩大的公众，它成为一种跨越几个世纪的自我实现的预言。

Anderson’s argument draws on British Marxism, of which he was one of the most brilliant proponents, as well as on the Annales school together with Walter Benjamin and the Frankfurt school. It takes nationalism as one of the avatars of print capitalism, inquiring at length into the early modern period, with the Gutenberg invention, the development of a publishing and book market, and the appearance of newspapers. This engendered two watersheds: first, the beginning of the era of reproducibility and mass diffusion of cultural products, thanks to technical inventions and the expansion of capitalism; second, the foundation by certain elites (whose description falls outside the book’s remit) of communities of interpretation untrammeled by the former denominational monopolies on laying down truth. The vernacular languages asserted themselves over sacred languages, through “national” literature, for instance. They signaled and conveyed a territorialization of the imaginary and its withdrawal behind borders and within a people. The nation thus appears as an unprecedented set of images, symbols, and words opposing “traditional” cosmologies, producing a new way of understanding time, space, and memory: this intelligibility was primarily imaginary and textual, becoming established as a self-realizing prophecy, spanning the centuries, thanks to techniques and expanding publics.

考虑到安德森的初衷， 《想象的共同体》的成功令人意外。他声称自己写作此书是为了理解社会主义阵营国家之间爆发战争的可能性；幸运的是，那些很快将这一抱负抛诸脑后的事件也见证了这本书的成功。柏林墙的倒塌、苏联的解体，以及随之而来的欧洲和亚洲主权争端与冲突的加剧，似乎表明了民族心态的胜利，将民族问题与种族问题联系在一起，就像前南斯拉夫战争期间那样。

The success of Imagined Communities is surprising, given Anderson’s original intention. He said he had written it to understand the possibility of war between countries in the socialist bloc; luckily, the events that soon consigned this ambition to the past also saw the book triumph. The fall of the Berlin Wall, collapse of the Soviet Union, and correlating increase in sovereignties and conflicts in Europe and Asia seemed to indicate the victory of the nationality mindset, yoking the national question to issues of ethnicity, as during the wars in the former Yugoslavia.

在当今这个特定世界历史盛行、流通盛行的时代，这个主题或许显得有些过时。既然历史学家们的兴趣已经转向全球、帝国和大西洋的视角，那么在全球化时代，“国家”的概念还剩下什么呢？本书主要论点的传播论也显得过时：最近的学术研究不再推崇想象的毛细血管效应，即从“顶层”向“底层”通过技术和市场将“精英文化”传播给民族化的大众。

The theme might appear old-fashioned in these days of histories of specific worlds and the vogue for matters of circulation. What remains of the concept of nation in these globalized times, now that historians have shifted their interest to global, imperial, and Atlantic perspectives? The diffusionism governing the book’s main thesis also looks outdated: recent scholarship no longer privileges the hypothesis of the capillarity of the imaginary running from the “top” toward the “bottom,” spreading “elite culture” to the nationalized masses through techniques and the market.

但任何这样的批评都忽略了这本书的原创性。鉴于社会科学界目前对身份概念持谨慎态度，《想象》 《共同体》提供了一个有益的概念工具包，可以帮助我们避免本质主义的陷阱。但主要的独创性在于安德森的方法，因为他以一种“去中心化”的专长来探讨政治学和历史学中一个经典的主题。正是因为他是一位东南亚专家，他才能够提出一个看似矛盾却本质上正确的论点。民族主义的内在本质或许最好远离那些与欧洲相关的伟大经典模型来理解，因为我们必须转向拉丁美洲才能理解它的起源。安德森认为，17世纪的改革催生了一个由大都市行政官员组成的封闭群体，他们的团队精神是在他们游历帝国各地的过程中建立起来的。这种身份认同将他们与地方精英对立起来，并从地方精英手中夺取了帝国的统治权。由于被排除在权力之外，白人克里奥尔人发展出了一种早期的民族思想，并在新兴的媒体中传播开来。尽管这种解释后来被另一种对独立性的解读所推翻，但这些社会仍然以众多人类贡献、地位和色彩为标志，而这些贡献、地位和色彩原本纯粹是虚构的，无法被任何种族或历史单位所支撑。安德森的独创性恰恰在于他大胆地将欧洲抛诸脑后，将其地方化，以便更好地理解它。鉴于历史和社会科学在很大程度上仍然固守着那些无论对错都被认为起源于欧洲或西方的概念矩阵和模型，这一举动至今仍富有成果。

But any such criticism would miss the source of the book’s originality. With the social sciences currently wary of the concept of identity, Imagined Communities provides a salutary conceptual toolkit to avoid the snares of essentialism. But the principal originality lies in Anderson’s approach, for he tackles a canonical subject in political science and history from a “decentered” specialism. It was precisely because he was a specialist of Southeast Asia that he could advance a thesis that, though seeming so paradoxical, was fundamentally right. The intimate nature of nationalism may best be understood far from the great canonical models relating to Europe, for it is to Latin America that we must turn to understand its origins. Anderson argues that seventeenth-century reforms gave rise to a closed group of metropolitan administrators whose esprit de corps was built up over the course of their peregrinations around the empire. This identity opposed them to local elites, from whom they confiscated imperial government. And on being thus excluded from power, white Creoles developed an early form of national thought, diffused in the nascent press. Although this interpretation has since been disproved by a different interpretation of independences, these societies were nevertheless marked by the many human contributions, statuses, and colors that were originally pure fabrications that could not be underpinned by any ethnic or historical unit. Anderson’s originality lies precisely in this bold move to leave Europe behind and provincialize it, the better to apprehend it. The move remains as fertile as ever, given the extent to which history and the social sciences are still wedded to the idea of conceptual matrices and models supposed, rightly or wrongly, to have originated in Europe or the West.

克莱芒·蒂博

Clément Thibaud

本尼迪克特·安德森，《想象的共同体：对民族主义起源和传播的思考》（伦敦：Verso，1983 年）。

Benedict Anderson, Imagined Communities: Reflections on the Origin and Spread of Nationalism (London: Verso, 1983).

1984

1984

法国的巴氏杀菌法：拉图尔为非人类开辟了空间

The Pasteurization of France: Latour Makes Room for the Nonhuman

《法国的巴斯德灭菌法》是一部史诗般的传奇，充满了权力斗争、看不见的敌人、磨难、背叛、战役、胜利、决斗、长篇大论、结盟和对土地的控制。1984 年，年轻的人类学家布鲁诺·拉图尔（生于 1947 年）用法语出版了他的第一本书。当时，他已经（与史蒂夫·伍尔加合著）撰写了一部重要的民族志研究著作《实验室生活》（1979 年），将生命科学、田野调查、科学社会学和人类学相结合。像巴斯德（他称巴斯德从一个学科“横向移动”到另一个学科）一样，拉图尔将从非洲学家以及随后在加利福尼亚微生物实验室学到的东西转移到历史和哲学领域。

With its power struggles, invisible enemies, ordeals, betrayals, battles, victories, duels, harangues, alliances, and control of the land, Les microbes: Guerre et paix (The Pasteurization of France) is an epic saga. By the time Bruno Latour (born 1947), a young anthropologist, published his first book in French in 1984, he had already written (with Steve Woolgar) an important ethnographic study, Laboratory Life (1979), combining life sciences, fieldwork, sociology of science, and anthropology. Like Pasteur (whose “sideways movement” from one discipline to another he describes), Latour transposes what he learned from Africanists, and then in microbiology laboratories in California, to a historical and philosophical domain.

本书公开批判了所有简化论证：那些用革命、认识论断裂和伟人来解释科学史事件的宏大历史叙述，以及因此选择巴斯德这一人物和一个标志性事件——微生物的发现（“科学史上最不容置疑的事件”）——来构建更有力的论证。巴斯德似乎是“不受妥协、修补和争论影响的科学说服方式”的完美典范。拉图尔并没有拆解这位伟人，而是以不同的方式解读他，展现他的流离失所，指出他的盟友，从而讲述了一段与这位孤独学者截然不同的历史。巴斯德的直接成功与其说是源于他非凡的天赋，不如说是源于他作为一场早已存在的运动的代言人和推动者的地位。这场运动融合了卫生、城市规划、道德化和生活条件的倡导，当时被称为卫生主义。这是行动者网络理论 (ANT) 最早的表述之一：“一个想法，即使是天才的想法，即使是可以拯救数百万人的想法，也从来不会自行移动。它需要一种力量来获取它，为了自己的目的而抓住它，移动它；并且经常改变它。” 运动是拉图尔分析的核心：巴斯德从晶体学到微生物学的“横向运动”，使他能够将在其他学科学到的知识应用到新学科中，从而成为所有学科的先驱；巴斯德的追随者将传染病问题带入实验室，即使这个问题看起来并不属于他们的职权范围；这个实验室搬到了塞纳-马恩省乡村的普伊勒福尔，炭疽病疫情在那里肆虐，在那里进行了至关重要的实验，真实地证明了巴斯德的假设是正确的；然后他重返乌尔姆街，这次是为了传播疫苗和新的巴氏杀菌法。拉图尔认为，巴斯德无疑是个天才——只是原因并非我们所想的那样。

The work is an open attack on all reductions: the great macro-historical accounts explaining episodes in the history of science in terms of revolutions, epistemological ruptures, and great men, and hence the choice of one figure, Pasteur, and one emblematic event, the discovery of microbes (“the least questionable episode in the history of science”) to build an a fortiori argument. Pasteur seems to be the perfect example of a “scientific manner of convincing untouched by compromise, tinkering, and dispute.” Latour does not dismantle the great figure, but approaches him differently, showing his displacements, pointing out his allies, thereby telling a history wholly different to that of the solitary scholar. Pasteur’s immediate success was less due to his singular genius than to his position as spokesman and amplifier for a movement that already existed, a combination of sanitation, urban planning, moralization, and advocacy of living conditions, known at the time as hygienism. This is one of the earliest formulations in Actor Network Theory (ANT): “An idea, even one of genius, even an idea that is to save millions of people, never moves of its own accord. It requires a force to fetch it, seize upon it for its own purposes, move it; and often transform it.” Movement lies at the heart of Latour’s analysis: the “sideways movement” that led Pasteur from crystallography to microbiology, allowing him to apply what he had learned in other disciplines to new ones, thus becoming a pioneer in all; the move in which Pasteur’s acolytes took the question of infectious disease into the laboratory, even though the problem did not look like it fell within their remit; the moving of this laboratory to Pouilly-le-Fort, in the Seine-et-Marne countryside, where the anthrax epidemic was raging and the crucial experiment was conducted that gave real-scale proof that Pasteur’s hypotheses were right; then the return to Rue d’Ulm, this time to disseminate vaccines and spread new pasteurization practices. No doubt Pasteur was a genius, Latour argues—just not for the reasons we think.

拉图尔一年前发表的一篇文章的标题是“给我一个实验室，我将改造世界”（Donnez-moi un laboratoire et je soulèverai le monde），它清晰地概括了他对实验室的思考方式：实验室是一个颠覆力量的场所，在那里，人类可以掌控非人类，因为非人类可以被隔离、培养和测量。有了实验室，人们可以对现实的某个组成部分进行采样，将其移至一个全新且有利的环境中，在那里，没有任何其他事物遮挡视线。乌尔姆街的实验室是“使行动者可见的东西”，而普伊勒福尔的农场则是对“隐形敌人”前所未有的掌控的炫目公开展示，如今，这种掌控终于被揭开了面纱。位于实验室和农田之间的普伊勒福尔，是阿基米德原理得以实践的临界点。他的设备必须与巴黎实验室足够相似，以便能够通过疫苗接种来控制微生物，但又必须足够不同，以避免有人指责巴斯德正在研究“实验室微生物”——这说明实验室内的微小动作可能会对实验室外产生巨大影响。

The title of an article Latour published a year earlier, “Donnez-moi un laboratoire et je soulèverai le monde” (“Give me a laboratory and I will raise the world”) clearly resumes his way of thinking of the laboratory as a place for inverting forces, where humanity can master the nonhuman because it may be isolated, cultivated, and measured there. With a laboratory it is possible to sample a component of reality, to move it to a new yet favorable environment, where nothing else obscures the view. The laboratory on Rue d’Ulm is “what makes agents visible,” while the farm at Pouilly-le-Fort is the dazzling public display of this unprecedented mastery of the “invisible enemy,” now finally unmasked. Pouilly-le-Fort, lying between the laboratory and the peasants’ field, is the tipping point where the Archimedes principle may be performed. His apparatus needed to be similar enough to the Paris laboratory to make it possible to control microbes by vaccination, yet different enough to prevent any accusations that Pasteur was working with “laboratory microbes”—illustrating how small gestures in the laboratory may have immense impacts outside it.

什么是微生物？它是叙事中的行动者。微生物迫使我们“以不同的方式重构社会”，抛弃单纯的人际关系，为这些无形的实体腾出空间，它们作为力量，系统地偏离了我们认为的轨迹。巴斯德学家及其卫生学家盟友不得不将社会联系置于新的基石之上，以将微生物纳入其中，正如科学人类学家被迫重新思考他们的学科，将其向非人类开放一样。行动者、主体、行为者、角色——没有比这更清晰的例证表明，主体的概念首先是一个符号学概念，暗示着自然行动者和社会行动者之间的对称性。1984年，新兴的科学研究主要关注人类，而不是生态学和自然存在。正是拉图尔和他的《微生物学》将科学研究与生态学联系起来，导致了我们在过去三十多年里所熟悉的哲学和人类学思想的发展。

What is a microbe? It is an actant within a narrative. Microbes force us to “recompose society differently,” to leave solely human relations behind and make room for these invisible entities acting as forces, systematically deviating trajectories we believed straightforward. Pasteurians and their hygienist allies had to place social links on a new footing to include microbes, just as anthropologists of science were forced to rethink their discipline to open it up to the nonhuman. Actors, agents, actants, characters—there is no clearer illustration of how the idea of agency is primarily a semiotic concept, implying symmetry between natural and social actors. In 1984, nascent science studies focused mainly on humans, not on ecology and natural beings. It was Latour and his Microbes that brought science studies into contact with ecology, leading to the developments with which we are familiar in philosophical and anthropological thought over the past thirty-odd years.

这本书将经验论证与哲学文本相结合，产生了相当大的影响，与他 1987 年的《科学在行动》一起，引发了研究和理解科学实践的重大转变。《微生物》和《非还原》捍卫了一种不接受自然与社会区分的形而上学，邀请我们抛弃任何超越科学的概念，认为科学是唯一一个事实的无可辩驳的确定性使我们能够摆脱政治的烦人修修补补的领域。这些著作因此启动了一个研究计划，拉图尔在三十多年中继续发展这个计划，在对当代思想至关重要的著作中，从《我们从未现代过》到《面对盖亚》。

Combining an empirical argument with a philosophical text, the book had a considerable impact, and in conjunction with his 1987 Science in Action, it initiated a major shift in studying and understanding scientific practice. Les microbes and Irréductions defend a metaphysics that does not accept a distinction between nature and society, inviting us to leave behind any transcendent conception of science as the only field where the irrefutable certainty of facts allows us to escape the bothersome tinkering of politics. These works thus launched a research program that Latour has continued to develop over thirty years in books of key importance in contemporary thought, from Nous n’avons jamais été modernes (We Have Never Been Modern) to Face à Gaïa (Facing Gaia).

弗雷德里克·艾特图阿蒂

Frédérique Aït-Touati

Bruno Latour，《微生物：Guerre et paix》，随后是《Irréductions》（巴黎：Métailié [“Pandore”]，1984）。由 La Découverte 重新出版，2011 年，标题为巴斯德：微生物的战争与和平。艾伦·谢里丹 (Alan Sheridan) 和约翰·劳 (John Law) 将其翻译成英文，名为《法国的巴氏杀菌》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1988 年）。

Bruno Latour, Les microbes: Guerre et paix, followed by Irréductions (Paris: Métailié [“Pandore”], 1984). Republished by La Découverte, 2011, under the title Pasteur: Guerre et paix des microbes. Translated into English by Alan Sheridan and John Law as The Pasteurization of France (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1988).

1985

1985
