But specialists were unwilling to admit that monotheistic religions be deciphered on the basis of a distinction that introduced a new violence necessarily unknown to polytheistic cultures, or further, that this engendered a poor arrangement between the religious and the political domain, from whose deadly effects we still suffer. Further still, the controversy took a scandalous turn in accusing the founder of the Jewish people—a people who thus provided in advance the matrix of all the persecutions to which they were subsequently victim.

显然，阿斯曼的思想早已流传甚广。 2003年出版的《马赛克拼图》（Die Mosaiche Unterscheidung）之所以具有影响力，正是因为它吸收了前作中所有批评，并借此强化了最初的论点。阿斯曼以一种弗洛伊德或许能察觉到的延缓行动，揭示了他此前仅仅触及的领域，这与2001年9月11日事件的后果产生了强烈的共鸣。学术争议因其在时事中的投射而被放大，并促使进一步的阐释。

As is clear, Assmann’s ideas had already traveled a long way. The power of Die Mosaiche Unterscheidung, published in 2003, stems from its taking on board all the criticisms of the earlier book and using them to strengthen the initial thesis. In a sort of deferred act that Freud would have recognized, and which echoed dramatically with the aftermath of the events of September 11, 2001, Assmann brought to light what he had previously only touched on. The scholarly controversy was magnified by its projection into current affairs, imposing further clarification.

人们可以承认一位神，但这并不妨碍对其他神的崇拜。为了达到一神论的独特性论题，需要一种否定。上帝必须与世界的各个维度——无论是宇宙、社会还是国家——分离，并且必须只与人类建立一种特权关系。为了反对多神教和异教，他被尊为真神，其限定性术语意味着排除任何其他形式的服从，因为这些服从必然带有虚假性。正是在这一举措中，新的宗教激情机制应运而生，并助长了激进的政治：对上帝的忠诚，上帝的嫉妒和愤怒，以及它们的正面（而非反面），上帝只赐予那些选择他和他所选择之人的慈悲和爱。只有到了这个阶段，宗教才能掌控政治。因此，“政治神学”的历史始于犹太一神论，这在以前是不可想象的，无论是在基督教还是伊斯兰教的幌子下，我们都会定期体验到其后期影响。

One may recognize a single god without thereby debarring veneration of any other one. To reach the monotheist thesis of uniqueness, a negation was needed. God had to be separated from the world in all its dimensions—be it the cosmos, society, or the state—and had to enter into a privileged relation with humankind alone. Against polytheism and paganism, he was erected as the true God, with the qualifying term implying the exclusion of any other form of obedience as necessarily marked by falsity. This is the move by which the new regime of religious passion was invented that fuels radical politics: fidelity to God, the jealousy and anger of God, together with their obverses (not their opposites), the misericord and love that God grants exclusively to those who have chosen him and whom he has chosen. It is only at this stage that religion takes control over politics. The history of “political theology,” being previously unthinkable, thus started with Jewish monotheism, a history whose late ramifications we periodically experience, be it under Christian or Islamic guise.

但这正是阿斯曼比以往更为精准之处。形容词“真”应用于宗教，获得了一种特殊的含义。因为它是一种道德真理，而非认知真理。真等同于正义和解放，符合法律。假等同于压迫、奴役和不公。认识到这一点，我们便得出了一个富有成效的悖论，有助于我们更好地诊断我们的政治暴力。一神论的反宗教，只有在宣称这种暴力是一种解放之后，才为这种暴力奠定了基础。在出埃及记中，它反对一种在国家掌控下的生活，而国家自认为充满了神化的力量。它通过与作为世俗权力的政治决裂而建立，在这种权力中，神灵以各种方式介入其中，以神灵的形式存在，人们召唤神灵来捕获、分配或垄断他们的生命力，操纵和征召他们。对阿斯曼来说，尽管他的事业存在某些误解，但他的使命绝不是颂扬这异教背景中那些被遗忘的美德，并宣扬它不太可能的回归。相反，这是为了更好地理解我们与它决裂后所陷入的命运。因为这种决裂发生了惊人的转变，它脱离了国家政策——权力的焦点，脱离了世俗政治的主导——并宣称只有一位存在于世外的神才是正义的源泉。它因此，我们被推上了一个坎：无论好坏，我们都是一神论者，我们需要懂得如何在完全属于我们的传统中，让好的东西与坏的东西对抗。

But this is where Assmann is more precise than previously. The adjective “true” applied to religion acquires a particular meaning. For it is a moral truth, not a cognitive one. True equates to that which is just and liberating, in accordance with the law. False equates to oppression, servitude, and injustice. Recognizing this leads us to a fruitful paradox, which helps us better diagnose our political violence. The monotheist counter-religion lay the foundation for this violence only after having asserted that it was a liberation. In and by exodus, it opposed a life conducted in the hold of a state that thought of itself as impregnated with divinized powers. It was established by breaking with politics as terrestrial power, in which the gods were involved in myriad ways, in the form of divinities that people evoked to capture and distribute or monopolize their vital forces, to manipulate and enlist them. For Assmann, despite certain misconceptions of his undertaking, it was never a matter of celebrating the forgotten virtues of this pagan backdrop and recommending its improbable return. Rather, it was a matter of better understanding the fate in which we became entangled on breaking with it. For this break took a surprising turn, consisting in removing itself from state policy, the focal point of power where terrestrial politics was conducted, to assert that only a single god, outside the world, was the source of justice. It thus projected us onto a ridge: we are monotheists, for better or for worse, and we need to understand how to play the better off against the worst, within a tradition that is wholly ours.

我们必须接受一个悖论：我们政治所呈现的最暴力形式，是维护我们自由的次生产物，是我们从严格的世俗政治中解放出来，以及随之而来的不公和压迫。一神论是对这种暴力的反应，这种暴力纯粹是主权暴力，是世俗权力的产物，是纯粹的统治。然而，这又引发了另一种暴力的可能性——我们自身的暴力。因为这种反应必须通过将主权专制移交给上帝的力量来实现——因此，上帝的力量本质上是公正的，绝对有理，必须绝对服从，并且远超任何可能的主权。我们必须接受这一点，并用这样的标准来衡量日益增多的宗教冲突：我们的政治宏伟，我们追求民主的源泉，也是，并且不可分割地，依然存在的危险的根源。它带有内在的神学政治代价，即“一神论的代价”（der Preis des Monotheismus），一个暴力的蓄水池。下令终结这种暴力是痴人说梦。相反，我们应该认清它的本质，并控制它的爆发。

There is a paradox we need to accept: The most violent forms our politics assume are a secondary derivative of asserting our freedom, our emancipation from a strictly terrestrial politics, with the injustice and oppression that come bound up with it. Monotheism was the reaction to this violence, which was purely sovereign violence, the emanation of a worldly power, pure domination. Yet this gave rise to the possibility of a different type of violence—our own. For the reaction had to take place by transferring sovereign despotism to the power of God—hence intrinsically just, absolutely founded, to be absolutely obeyed, and infinitely greater than any possible sovereign. We must resign ourselves to this and gauge the increasing number of religious conflicts by this yardstick: Our political grandeur, the longest-standing wellspring of our vocation for democracy, is also, and inseparably, the source of still present perils. It comes with an in-built theologico-political price, der Preis des Monotheismus, a reservoir of violence. It would be illusory to decree the end to this violence. Instead, we should identify its nature and control its outbreaks.

布鲁诺·卡森蒂

Bruno Karsenti

Jan Assmann，《Die Mosaische Unterscheidung：Oder der Preis des Monotheismus》（慕尼黑：Carl Hanser Verlag，2003 年）。罗伯特·萨维奇 (Robert Savage) 将其翻译为英文《一神论的代价》（加利福尼亚州斯坦福：斯坦福大学出版社，2009 年）。

Jan Assmann, Die Mosaische Unterscheidung: Oder der Preis des Monotheismus (Munich: Carl Hanser Verlag, 2003). Translated into English by Robert Savage as The Price of Monotheism (Stanford, CA: Stanford University Press, 2009).

2003

2003

法律与革命:伯曼与西方法律的革命

Law and Revolution: Berman and the Revolutions of Western Law

哈罗德·伯曼（Harold Berman，1918-2007）在《法律与革命》第一卷出版二十年后才出版了第二卷。他于2007年去世，享年八十九岁，却未能完成本应成为他巅峰之作的第三卷。然而，即使尚未完成，这部两卷本的综合性著作，与其书名相呼应，也如同一枚革命性的炸弹，在法律史的死寂中轰动一时。

It was not until twenty years after publishing the first volume of Law and Revolution that Harold Berman (1918–2007) published the second volume. He died in 2007, when he was eighty-nine, before having the time to complete the third volume, which ought to have been his crowning achievement. And yet even incomplete, the two volumes of this comprehensive survey, echoing its title, resounded like a revolutionary bomb in the backwaters of legal history.

第一卷出版于1983年，主要探讨西方法律的起源。伯曼将其置于格里高利时代伟大的“教皇革命”给欧洲社会带来的根本性变革之中。基于此，新教改革被视为西方法律的第二次革命，紧随其后的是第三次革命——英国内战。第二卷出版于2003年，探讨了16世纪至17世纪之间欧洲法律的两次变革。第三卷则聚焦于这一绵延一千年的弧线中的最后三个阶段：美国革命、法国革命，以及1917年的俄国革命。

The first volume, published in 1983, was all about the origins of law in the West, which Berman situates in the radical change imposed on European society by the great “papal revolution” of the Gregorian age. On this basis, the Protestant Reformation is considered as the second revolution in Western law, followed shortly after by the third, the English Civil War. The second volume, published in 2003, is about two transformations to European law that occurred between the sixteenth and the seventeenth centuries. The third volume was to focus on the three final stages in this arc stretching over a thousand years: the American and French Revolutions, finishing with the Russian Revolution in 1917.

因此，他认为将现代时代的开端置于16世纪是错误的。就法律而言，欧洲现代性始于格里高利时代，当时教会强制推行两种“司法权”的分离，指定法律来规范权力关系和经济冲突。因此，我们需要追溯11世纪的教皇革命，以寻找西方法律传统的真正起源。正是这场革命同样解释了为什么我们时代的第二个千年在其法律结构上呈现出如此的统一性。诚然，这个千年充满了重大的不连续性——革命——但这些革命要么巩固了法律现代性（第一次革命），要么改变了它的方向（随后的五次革命），同时保持了其基本身份。因此，奠基性的创新并非罗马法的创造，甚至也并非它在十一世纪的重新发现。西方法律是罗马天主教会的创造，它在1075年至1122年间成为“第一个现代国家”。如果罗马法当然发挥了主导作用，那不是因为重新发现的《文摘》文本有能力复兴古老的法律思维，而是因为它们在一个全新的框架内被重新部署，并经历了一场前所未有的革新。

He thus argues that it is wrong to place the beginning of the modern age in the sixteenth century. For law, European modernity got underway in the Gregorian age, when the Church imposed separation of the two “jurisdictions,” designating law to regulate power relations and economic conflicts. We thus need to look to the papal revolution of the eleventh century for the true origin of the Western legal tradition. It is this revolution that likewise explains why the second millennium of our era presents such unity in its legal structures. Admittedly, this millennium was marked by major discontinuities—revolutions—but these either underpinned legal modernity (the first revolution) or else redirected it (the five following revolutions) while maintaining its fundamental identity. Thus, the founding innovation was not the creation of Roman law, or even its rediscovery in the eleventh century. Western law is a creation of the Roman Catholic Church, which between 1075 and 1122 became “the first modern state.” If Roman law of course played a leading role, it is not because the rediscovered texts of the Digest had the capacity to revive an ancient legal mindset, but because they were redeployed within a completely new framework and subjected to an unparalleled project of renewal.

伯尔曼基于西方社会对自身的看法，构建了一部长期的历史。鉴于其起点是教皇革命，这些看法主要与教会学的变革相吻合：首先是基督教社会（societas christiana）在整个欧洲的出现，然后是新教教派强加的革新。在他的论证过程中，他提供了一种西方的宪法史，其中革命并非推翻法律秩序，而是倾向于对其进行更新。每一次，法律的变革都与新的教会学意识相吻合，从而导致以宗教为基础的新社会契约的形成。如果说法律与宗教之间的这种联系在伯尔曼在其两卷书中分析的三次革命（教皇革命、路德宗革命和英国革命）中显而易见，那么在他看来，在他计划在最后一卷中研究的三次革命中，这种联系也同样显而易见。毕竟，开国元勋们仰望上帝，法国大革命尽管带有反教权主义色彩，却也是在“至高无上的存在”的庇护下孕育而生的。对伯曼而言，即使是1917年的俄国革命，尽管其崇尚唯物主义，也保留了理想的基督教共同体，这一理想由加尔文教重新倡导，并最终通过将经济的全面控制权交给法律来实现。在这一点上，伯曼意识到他的解读挑战了马克思主义的历史观，尤其是韦伯关于资本主义精神起源的著名理论。但这一挑战指向的是欧洲的法律史学研究，而伯曼的思想仍然深受民族主义母体的影响，拒绝将宗教与法律领域融合。

Berman builds up a long-term history based on the perceptions Western societies have had of themselves. Given that the starting point is the papal revolution, these perceptions mainly coincide with transformations in ecclesiology: first the advent of the societas christiana across all Europe, then the renewals imposed by new Protestant denominations. Over the course of his argument, he provides a sort of constitutional history of the West, in which revolutions do not overthrow the legal order but tend rather to renew it. Each time, the transformation in law coincided with a new ecclesiological awareness, leading to the formulation of a new social pact grounded in a religious basis. If this link between law and religion is clear for the three revolutions that Berman analyzes in his two volumes (the papal, Lutheran, and English revolutions), it was, to his mind, equally clear for those he planned to study in the final volume. After all, the Founding Fathers looked to God, and the French Revolution, despite its anticlericalism, was conceived under the auspices of a “supreme being.” For Berman, even the Russian Revolution of 1917, despite its materialism, preserved the ideal Christian community, relaunched by Calvinism then realized by handing total control over the economy to the law. On this point, Berman was aware that his interpretation challenged the Marxist interpretation of history and especially Weber’s famous theory on the origins of the capitalist spirit. But the challenge is laid down to European historical scholarship on the law, to his mind still too marked by its nationalist matrix and refusal to integrate the religious and legal spheres.

不出所料，《法律与革命》一书获得了截然相反的评价。诚然，由于研究规模庞大，伯尔曼不得不依赖二手文献，而这些文献并非总是最新的，并且仅限于英文著作。一些中世纪法律史专家认为，第一卷中使用的一些历史和语文学数据已经过时（尤其是彼得·兰道1984年在《芝加哥法律评论》上的评论）。但欧洲研究人员很快就意识到了这位美国同事著作的创新优势。第一卷于1991年被翻译成德文；第二卷出版十年后，法律史和现代罗马法领域对他的作品进行了广泛的专业讨论（刊登在《Rechtsgeschichte》杂志上），以此向他致敬。在意大利，Il Mulino出版社于1998年出版了第一卷，并于2010年出版了第二卷，由迭戈·夸廖尼作了详尽的序言。第一卷于 2002 年由普罗旺斯地区艾克斯大学图书馆以法语出版，第二卷于 2010 年由法亚德出版。

As was to be expected, Law and Revolution received contrasting views. It is true that the scale of its research had obliged Berman to rely on secondary literature, which was not always up to date, and limit himself to works in English. Several specialists in medieval legal history felt that some of the historical and philological data used in the first volume were out of date (particularly Peter Landau in the Chicago Law Review in 1984). But European researchers soon recognized the innovative strengths of their American colleague’s work. The first volume was translated into German in 1991; ten years after the publication of the second, the land of the history of law and modern Roman law honored him with an extensive specialist discussion of his work (in the journal Rechtsgeschichte). In Italy, Il Mulino brought out the first volume in 1998 and the second in 2010, with an extensive introduction by Diego Quaglioni. The first volume was published in French in 2002 by the Librairie universitaire d’Aix-en-Provence and the second by Fayard in 2010.

埃马努埃莱·孔蒂

Emanuele Conte

Harold J. Berman，《法律与革命》，第一卷，《西方法律传统的形成》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1983年）；第二卷，《新教改革对西方法律传统的影响》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，2003年）。

Harold J. Berman, Law and Revolution, vol. 1, The Formation of the Western Legal Tradition (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1983); vol. 2, The Impact of the Protestant Reformations on the Western Legal Tradition (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 2003).

2003

2003

历史性的体制:哈托格与当代的经验

Regimes of Historicity: Hartog and Experience of the Present

如果用马克·布洛赫的话来说，历史是“关于人在时间中的科学”，那么人类存在的时间性也拥有其历史。这一点通过研究“历史性体制”得以展现，该体制与社会连接过去、现在和未来的独特方式相关。弗朗索瓦·哈托格（生于1946年）奠定了这些体制的历史的基础，它必然具有反身性，因为它的对象是时间的集体表征，而它在自身所处的时代，是时间的一种特殊表达。

If history is “the science of men in time,” in Marc Bloch’s words, the temporality of human existence also has its history. This is brought out by studying “regimes of historicity,” relating to the singular ways in which societies link up the past, present, and future. The history of these regimes, for which François Hartog (born 1946) laid the groundwork, is necessarily reflexive, since its object is the collective representations of time, of which it is, for its own period, a privileged expression.

《历史性体制》 （ Régimes d'historicité ）的出版，参与了一场可追溯至20世纪80年代的历史学研究运动。表征史的兴起引发了人们对历史知识文化基础的新兴趣，并启发了哈托格早期关于希罗多德和富斯特尔·德·库朗日的著作。然而，历史性体制史的研究项目抱有更大的抱负，因为它超越了单纯的历史科学研究，借鉴了更多元化的资料，尤其是文献，提出了对影响历史时间体验的巨大变异的描述。

The publication of Régimes d’historicité (Regimes of Historicity) partook in a movement in historical scholarship dating back to 1980s. The emergence of the history of representations triggered new interest in the cultural foundations of historical knowledge, inspiring Hartog’s early works on Herodotus and on Fustel de Coulanges. Yet the research program for the history of regimes of historicity had greater ambitions, since it left behind the study of solely historical science and, drawing on more diverse sources, particularly literature, put forward a description of the great mutations affecting the experience of historical time.

然而，哈托格的著作并非提出一种新的普遍历史，即以某种特定的时代连接方式为主导来划分各个时期。相反，它以韦伯式的理解，将历史性体制视为理想类型。这些概念是通过比较而构建的，源于一个研究问题。他的分析以考察当代历史意识的特殊性为指导，在他看来，这种意识的独特之处在于聚焦于当下，而只有当下才能阐明过去，并未来。这种“现在主义”可以与两种早期的时间观形成对比。旧的“历史大师”体制将现在与过去的模式进行比较，而出现于十八世纪并由法国大革命所确立的现代体制，则在过去和现在中辨别出一个充满希望的未来。哈托格扩展了莱因哈特·科塞莱克对这种对比的描述，探讨了影响二十世纪的“未来危机”及其与现代历史性体制的决裂。

Yet Hartog’s book does not put forward a new universal history, dividing up periods distinguished by the predominance of a particular way of linking up times. Rather, it presents regimes of historicity as ideal-types, in the Weberian meaning of the term. They are concepts built through comparison, starting from a research problem. His analysis is guided by examination of the specificity of present-day historical consciousness, which, to his mind, stands out by focusing on a present that alone sheds light on the past and future. This “presentism” may be seen in contrast to two earlier ways of relating to time. Whereas the old regime of historia magistra vitae compared the present to models from the past, the modern regime, appearing in the eighteenth century and consecrated by the French Revolution, discerned in the past and in the present the premises of a hoped-for future. Expanding on Reinhart Koselleck’s description of this contrast, Hartog examines the “crisis of the future” affecting the twentieth century and the resulting break with the modern regime of historicity.

但对历史性体制的研究不应局限于西方社会。借鉴马歇尔·萨林斯关于毛利人和波利尼西亚社会的研究，哈托格得以识别出一种英雄式的历史性体制，它仅凭神话般的过去来解读现在和未来。萨林斯的人类学视角也提供了一种将历史性体制设想为经验结构的方式，它制约着个体之间的相互理解。从这个视角出发，哈托格力求超越对不同体制的理想类型建构，转而通过影响主观经验的张力和变化来理解它，尤其是在时间性危机时期。这正是他在解读夏多布里昂作品时所探讨的，他的作品夹在古代和现代体制之间。

But studying regimes of historicity should not be limited to Western societies. Drawing on the work of Marshall Sahlins on Maori and Polynesian societies allows Hartog to identify a heroic regime of historicity that deciphers the present and future solely in the light of a mythical past. Sahlins’s anthropological viewpoint also provides a way of envisioning regimes of historicity as structures of experience, conditioning individuals’ reciprocal understanding. From this perspective, Hartog seeks to move beyond the ideal-type construction of different regimes to instead apprehend subjective experience through the tensions and variations affecting it, particularly during crises of temporality. This is the aspect he examines in his reading of Chateaubriand, caught between the old and modern regimes.

因此，历史与人类学的比较有助于勾勒当代“现在主义”的轮廓。“现在”并非唯一令人感兴趣的对象，而是理解力的主要来源。因此，哈托格将处理过去的新形式解读为逃避“现在”的努力，但实际上，这些努力反而使“现在”投下了更长的阴影。集体记忆和回忆的价值被纳入身份认同考量和关于“现在”的道德思考之中。至于日益迫切的保护遗产的禁令，它标志着我们承认与过去不可挽回的决裂，而不是积极地去把握它。因此，对“现在主义”的描述并非引导我们怀旧或道德地谴责我们如何遗忘过去或忽视未来，因为它表明，此类批评最终会重现它们试图批判的东西。

Historical and anthropological comparison thus helps sketch the portrait of contemporary presentism. The present is not the sole object of interest but the main source of intelligibility. Thus, Hartog interprets new forms of addressing the past as efforts to escape the present, but which in fact cause the present to cast longer shadows. The value placed on collective memory and remembrance are caught up in identity considerations and moral thought about the present. As for the ever more imperious injunction to safeguard heritage, it signals recognition of an irremediable break with the past, rather than our actively laying hold of it. The description of presentism does not therefore invite us to some nostalgic or moralizing denunciation of how we forget the past or neglect the future, for it shows that such criticisms end up reproducing what they seek to combat.

然而，我们应该将现在主义视为一种成熟的历史性体制，还是现代体制的一种病态形式？无论如何，它都无法与其他体制完全相提并论。而外部光源，源于过去或未来，被用来阐释当下，当下主义的当下试图阐明自身，从而引发了本书所揭示的矛盾。我们的当下似乎既永恒又受制于短暂，反复地向前和向后看，却从未真正摆脱自身。声称仅仅基于当下本身来理解当下，就等于屈服于当下主义，正因如此，《历史制度》避免对这个问题提供任何明确的答案。

Yet should we consider presentism as a fully-fledged regime of historicity, or as a pathological form of the modern regime? In either case, it is not wholly comparable to other regimes. Whereas an external source of light, issuing from the past or the future, was used to elucidate the present, the presentist present seeks to cast light on itself, triggering the contradictions brought out in the book. Our present seems both eternal and governed by the ephemeral, repeatedly looking forward and backward without ever managing to leave itself behind. Claiming to apprehend our present solely on its own basis would amount to giving in to presentism, and that is why Régimes d’historicité avoids providing any definitive answer to this question.

这种思路激发了许多研究我们现在与时间关系的特殊性的作品，这些作品要么关注现代性的概念——例如克里斯托夫·查尔斯的《时间的不和谐》——要么关注当代，比如亨利·鲁索的《最新的灾难》。还需要进一步思考，以确定现在主义是一场危机，还是一种与时间相关的可行方式，无论时间是短暂的还是持久的。这将需要研究它所源自的社会形式，并更广泛地考察时间体验与社会生活的关系。扩展这项关于我们如何体验时间的话语表现的创新研究，还将涉及构建这些历史性机制的社会历史，这是理解我们现在的重要一步。

This line of thought has stimulated many works on the specificity characterizing how our present relates to time, focusing on the idea of modernity—for instance, Christophe Charle’s Discordance des temps (Discordance of times)—or on the contemporary period, as in the work of Henry Rousso, La dernière catastrophe (The Latest Catastrophe). Further thought is also needed to determine whether presentism is a crisis or a viable way of relating to time, if it is transitory or lasting. This would entail studying the social forms whence it emanates, for instance, and more generally examining how experience of time relates to social life. Expanding on this innovative study of the discursive manifestations of how we experience time would also involve building a social history of these regimes of historicity, an essential step for understanding our present.

弗洛伦斯·胡拉克

Florence Hulak

弗朗索瓦·哈托格（François Hartog），《Régimes d'historicité：Présentisme et expérience du temps》（巴黎：Éditions du Seuil [“La Librairie du XXI e siècle”]，2003）。由 Points（“Histoire”）重新出版，2012 年。萨斯基亚·布朗（Saskia Brown）将其翻译成英文，名为“历史性制度：当下主义与时间经验”（纽约：哥伦比亚大学出版社，2015 年）。

François Hartog, Régimes d’historicité: Présentisme et expérience du temps (Paris: Éditions du Seuil [“La Librairie du XXIe siècle”], 2003). Republished by Points (“Histoire”), 2012. Translated into English by Saskia Brown as Regimes of Historicity: Presentism and Experiences of Time (New York: Columbia University Press, 2015).

2004

2004

自愿奴役:泰斯塔特、不平等的起源和国家的出现

La servitude volontaire: Testart, the Genesis of Inequalities and the Emergence of the State

2004年，阿兰·特斯塔特（Alain Testart，1945-2013）大胆尝试，在其人类学著作中重新使用了拉博埃蒂400多年前关于臣服、依赖和专制的论文标题。这本两卷本的新作《自愿奴役》（La servitude volontaire）旨在阐述权力和国家起源的理论。他的出发点是墓葬遗址中存在考古学家所称的“陪葬死者”——即在有人（通常具有一定社会地位）去世时被故意杀害的男女。这种习俗在考古学、民族学和历史学中均有证实。它曾存在于各大洲，包括没有任何国家组织的社会。它并非如人们长期以来所认为的那样，只存在于皇室成员之间，但在建制国家中也并未盛行，因此被禁止。直到十九世纪末，在撒哈拉以南非洲某些未受一神教影响的地区，仍然有送葬的习俗。

In 2004, Alain Testart (1945–2013) took the bold move of reusing, for a work of anthropology, the title of an essay by La Boétie on subjection, dependence, and despotism, written over 400 years earlier. The purpose of the two volumes of this new La servitude volontaire (Voluntary servitude) is to set out a theory of the origins of power and of the state. His starting point is the presence at burial sites of what archaeologists call “accompanying dead”—that is, men and women who were intentionally killed when a person (normally of a certain social standing) died. This custom is attested in archaeology, in ethnology, and in history. It once existed across all continents, including in societies without any form of state organization. It was not specific to royalties, as was long believed, yet was not practiced in constituted states, which banished it. Until the late nineteenth century, the use of accompanying dead was still practiced in certain regions of sub-Saharan Africa uninfluenced by monotheism.

我们该如何解读这些习俗？根据泰斯塔特的说法，用祭祀来描述它们（就像历史学家、人类学家以及后来的考古学家所做的那样）是过于简化的：下令处死其追随者、奴隶或妾的人，恰恰相反，是为了在死后让他们继续为自己服务。此外，没有任何祭品的概念，也没有任何迹象表明陪葬的家臣是为了超自然力量或神灵而葬的。

How are we to interpret such practices? According to Testart, describing them in terms of sacrifice (as historians, anthropologists, and subsequently archaeologists have done) is reductive: The person who ordered the death of his followers, slaves, or concubines sought, on the contrary, to retain them in his service after death. There is also no idea of an offering, no indication that accompanying retainers in the grave were intended for a supernatural power or a god.

这种埋葬习俗主要是一种政治现象，而不是宗教现象：它表明了个人忠诚关系的存在（自愿或在社会中，忠诚是非自愿的。它证明一个人身边有其他人愿意为他做任何事，包括为他牺牲生命。因此，这种做法表明了特定的社会关系，这种关系在没有国家的社会中已经牢固确立：领导人、酋长和国王依靠一定数量的追随者，追随者的数量赋予了政治权力和权威。在民族志和历史资料中，这些追随者是奴隶、皇家俘虏、顾客、难民、雇佣兵、债务人和妾。无论如何，在古代社会，他们是行使政治权力的最常见基础之一。在前殖民时期非洲，有许多君主或美洲西北海岸的荣誉酋长的例子，他们受到这种个人忠诚纽带的支持。这些纽带可以产生个人权力的集中，并有助于国家（至少是专制国家）的出现。

This burial practice is primarily a political, not a religious phenomenon: It indicates rather the existence of ties of personal loyalty (voluntary or involuntary) within a society. It proves that a man had at hand other human beings ready to do anything for him, including die for him. This practice thus indicates specific social relations, already firmly in place in societies without a state: leaders, chiefs, and kings relied on a certain number of followers, whose number conferred political power and authority. In the ethnographic and historical sources, these followers were slaves, royal captives, clients, refugees, mercenaries, debtors, and concubines. In any case, in ancient societies, they were one of the most frequent bases for wielding political power. There are many examples of sovereigns in precolonial Africa or honorary chieftains on the northwest coast of America who were supported by such ties of personal loyalty. These ties could engender the personalized centralization of power and contribute to the emergence of a state, at least in its despotic form.

因此，个人忠诚先于国家。然而，事实是，尽管个人忠诚促成了国家的兴起，但国家一旦建立，却又压制了这些忠诚。随着国家官僚化，国家倾向于推崇另一种形式的忠诚——忠于原则，从而压制个人忠诚，并不可避免地取消了陪葬——这是其最显著的体现。在公元前五世纪和四世纪的中国，在经历了近一千年的集体陪葬之后，就发生了这样的事情。

Accordingly, personal loyalties preceded the state. Yet the fact remains that while personal loyalties helped give rise to the state, this state, once constituted, helped suppress these same loyalties. Insofar as it becomes bureaucratized, the state tends to promote another form of loyalty—namely, loyalty to principles, consequently suppressing personal loyalties and, inevitably, canceling accompanying dead, its most spectacular illustration. This is what happened in China in the fifth and fourth centuries before our era, after nearly 1,000 years of mass accompanying dead.

本书扩展了特斯塔特对不平等起源的考察，他的其他著作也探讨了这些考察：《狩猎采集者或不平等的起源》（Les chasseurs-cueilleurs ou l'origine des inégalités，1982年）；《论礼物与神》（ Des dons et des dieux，1993年），探讨了施礼华社会；《论货币的起源》（Aux origines de la monnaie，2001年）；以及《奴隶、债务与权力》（ L'esclave, la dette et le pouvoir，2001年），探讨了奴隶制。特斯塔特指出，在澳大利亚原住民中，或者说在旧石器时代，似乎不存在个人忠诚。这些忠诚的起源或许可以用财富的诞生来解释：在古代的“财富”社会——即那些拥有最低限度粮食储存技术并拥有“用地基金”所有权的社会——其中耕种土地即可确保其所有权——领导者致富并非通过控制生产资料，而是通过某些经济上依赖他的个人的效忠。鉴于标准化商品在集体生活的关键时刻（出生、结婚、葬礼、疾病、节庆和解决冲突），有价值的物品是必不可少的，相关的物品支付是由法律或习俗规定的（血钱、聘礼、罚款等）。在欠有影响力或权力的人的债时，经济依赖者在某种程度上成为了权力的附属物。

This book expands on Testart’s examination of the origin of inequalities, addressed in his other works: Les chasseurs-cueilleurs ou l’origine des inégalités (Hunter-gatherers or the origin of inequalities, 1982); Des dons et des dieux (On gifts and gods, 1993) on chremastic societies; Aux origines de la monnaie (At the origins of money, 2001); and L’esclave, la dette et le pouvoir (Slaves, debts, and power, 2001) on the institution of slavery. Testart notes that personal loyalties are not to be found among the aborigines of Australia or, apparently, during the Paleolithic period. The origin of these loyalties may be explained by the birth of wealth: In the ancient “wealth” societies—that is, those with a minimum level of techniques for storing food and with a “usufund” property, in which cultivating land ensures its ownership—a leader becomes rich not by controlling the means of production but by the allegiance of certain individuals who are economically dependent on him. Wealth was even more necessary for followers, given that standardized goods of value were indispensable during key moments in collective life (birth, marriage, funerals, illness, festivities, and conflict resolution) and that the associated payment in goods was stipulated by law or custom (blood money, bride prices, fines, etc.). In being indebted to an influential or powerful man, the economic dependent became, to an extent, an auxiliary of power.

在提供债务人和受抚养人的制度中——例如奴隶制和裙带关系——债务奴役制最有可能在专制政治权力的出现中发挥关键作用。

Among the institutions providing debtors and dependents—such as slavery and clientelism, for instance—it is slavery for debts that is most likely to play a key role in the emergence of a despotic type of political power.

特斯塔特的著作意义重大，原因多种多样。它成功地摒弃了对陪葬的宗教和社会心理解读的过度强调。它充分重视集体墓葬的不对称性及其建造过程中固有的等级制度。除了经常被高估的亲属关系的作用之外，它还表明，个人忠诚在研究古代社会时具有决定性的作用，并且也是不平等发展，乃至国家兴起的根源。

Testart’s book is important for various reasons. It managed to set aside the excessive insistence on the religious and psychosocial interpretation of accompanying dead. It attributed full importance to the asymmetric nature of collective burial tombs and the hierarchy inherent to their being built. It shows, beyond the often-overestimated role played by kinship ties, the extent to which personal loyalties are decisive when studying ancient societies, and that they also lie at the origin of the development of inequalities and, probably, the emergence of the state.

瓦莱丽·勒克里万

Valérie Lécrivain

阿兰·泰斯塔特，《自愿奴役》，第一卷。 1，伴奏之死，卷。 2、L'origin de l'État（巴黎：Errance，2004）。

Alain Testart, La servitude volontaire, vol. 1, Les morts d’accompagnement, vol. 2, L’origine de l’État (Paris: Errance, 2004).

2005

2005

互联历史探索：Subrahmanyam 连接欧亚世界

Explorations in Connected History: Subrahmanyam Connects the Euro-Asian Worlds

两卷本的《关联历史探索》分别以《从塔霍河到恒河》和《莫卧儿人和法兰克人》为副标题，显然参与了印度历史学家桑杰·苏布拉马尼亚姆（生于 1961 年）1997 年在《现代亚洲研究》上发表的一篇论文中提出的方案。在这篇论文中，他批评了缅甸历史学家维克多·利伯曼提出的方案，该方案主张系统地比较欧亚大陆六个不同地区的国家形式和文化形成。苏布拉马尼亚姆提出了另一种选择，他称之为“关联历史”，其基础是寻找某些特定时刻不同地区之间的有效联系。关联历史与全球史有着复杂的关系。两者都受到超越民族国家界限的愿望的驱动，而民族国家是最近才形成的。然而，虽然大多数全球史实践者通过比较不同的二手资料来寻求长期的综合，但关联历史项目侧重于在较短的时间内比较原始语言的一手资料。

The two volumes of Explorations in Connected History, subtitled, respectively, From the Tagus to the Ganges and Mughals and Franks, clearly partake in a program set out in a paper published in 1997 in Modern Asian Studies by the Indian historian Sanjay Subrahmanyam (born 1961). In this paper, he criticized the program put forward by the historian of Burma, Victor Lieberman, advocating systematic comparison of state forms and cultural formations in six different areas in Eurasia. Subrahmanyam suggested an alternative, which he called “connected histories,” based on looking for effective connections between different areas at certain privileged moments. Connected history has a complex relation to global history. Both are motivated by a desire to move beyond the boundaries of nation-states, a recent formation. Yet while most practitioners of global history look for often long-term syntheses, by comparing diverse secondary sources, the connected histories program focuses on comparing primary sources in original languages over a shorter period.

这源于苏布拉马尼亚姆的个人经历。作为南印度经济史和葡萄牙在亚洲帝国的专家，他拓展视野，将印度洋的全球史纳入其中，借鉴法国东方学家让·奥班（他的灵感来源之一）的风格，将葡萄牙语资料与其他语言（主要是波斯语）的资料进行比较，并在其著作中赋予文化、宗教和政治维度更大的空间。此外，在1995年至2002年担任巴黎高等社会科学学院（EHESS）教授期间，他与其他地区的历史学家建立了联系，特别是研究拉丁美洲的塞尔日·格鲁津斯基 (Serge Gruzinski)，他们对拓宽视野也产生了影响。

This stemmed from Subrahmanyam’s personal trajectory. A specialist in the economic history of southern India and the Portuguese empire in Asia, he expanded his horizons to embrace a global history of the Indian Ocean, comparing Portuguese sources with those in other languages, primarily Persian, in the manner of the French Orientalist Jean Aubin (one of his sources of inspiration), and granting greater room to the cultural, religious, and political dimension in his works. Furthermore, as a professor at the École des hautes études en sciences sociales (EHESS) from 1995 to 2002, he had built up contacts with historians of other areas, particularly Serge Gruzinski studying Latin America, who were also influential in this broadening of perspective.

这两卷书包含大约十五篇文章。总的来说，它们提供了方法论方面的实物教学。从方法论角度来看，“连通历史”项目面临的最大挑战在于，历史学家需要突破自身能力范围，突破“文化区域”（Subrahmanyam 将其比作“盒子”），去寻找“连接全球的有时脆弱的线索”。第一个障碍当然是语言，因为每个文化区域都有其各自的文本和档案语言（这些语言并不总是相同的，例如在南亚），而掌握多个区域的语言并非人人都能做到。他以能够阅读多种东方和西方语言的资料而著称，这两卷书中的一些文章就体现了这一点，他比较了葡萄牙语、荷兰语、法语和波斯语的资料。当他对比特定事件的多种记载时，这种比较的启发式优势显而易见，他以印葡历史上的两段事件为例，这两段事件是他在题为《论印度人对亚洲葡萄牙人的看法》的文章中提到的。或许有人会反驳说，比较不同的资料来源是所有历史学家都会做的事情。然而，在这两个案例中，这种做法此前从未被采用过，部分原因是研究“葡萄牙扩张”的历史学家经常忽略波斯语资料的存在，而研究莫卧儿帝国的历史学家则认为葡萄牙人的观点过于偏颇。

The two volumes contain fifteen or so articles. Taken as a whole, they provide an object lesson in method. Methodologically, the greatest challenge in the project for “connected histories” is the need for historians to venture outside their zone of competence, defined in terms of a “cultural area,” which Subrahmanyam likens to a “box,” to seek out “at times fragile threads that connected the globe.” The first obstacle is of course linguistic, for each cultural area has its own language(s) for texts and archives (which are not always the same, as in southern Asia), and mastering the languages for several areas is not within everyone’s grasp. He stands out for being able to read the sources in many Oriental and Western languages, as demonstrated in a certain number of articles in these two collections, in which he compares sources in Portuguese, Dutch, French, and Persian. The heuristic advantage of such comparison is clear when he contrasts several accounts of a given event, using two episodes in Indo-Portuguese history that he mentioned in the article called “On Indian Views of the Portuguese in Asia.” It may be objected that comparing diverse sources is something all historians do. Still, in these two cases, it had never been done before, partly because historians of the “Portuguese expansion” often ignore the existence of sources in Persian while historians of the Mughal Empire consider the Portuguese point of view to be overly biased.

最能体现关联历史方法优势的例子，无疑是他对十六世纪全球千禧年形势的分析。当时，控制着欧亚大陆大部分地区的几个帝国相互接触。这一现象在他1997年的文章中仅作了简要概述，并在此文（《从塔霍河到恒河的十六世纪千禧年主义》）中得到了充分阐述。苏布拉马尼亚姆以1581年莫卧儿皇帝阿克巴与侍奉其宫廷的加泰罗尼亚耶稣会士安东尼奥·蒙塞拉特之间关于“最后审判”的对话为出发点，揭示了一种时代精神，这种精神包含着末世论的期望，而这种期望在很大程度上被伊比利亚天主教君主国及其在奥地利的哈布斯堡王朝的表亲——逊尼派苏丹国所共有。奥斯曼帝国、伊朗萨法维王朝的什叶派实质神权政治，以及以非正统逊尼派为特征的阿克巴政权，其政权也深受什叶派影响。有人可能会反驳说，苏布拉马尼亚姆的“全球”形势严重偏向天主教和伊斯兰世界，而忽视了新教、印度教和儒教世界，尽管莫卧儿王朝的千禧年主义显然融入了某些印度教传统。然而，这种分析为西方某种目的论话语提供了宝贵的反驳，这种话语将欧洲人的航行描述为“大发现”（忽略了中国穆斯林海军上将郑和在1400-1430年的航行），是迈向资本主义全球化的第一步。苏布拉马尼亚姆以自己的方式推动了欧洲的“地方化”。

The most telling example of the advantages of the connected history approach is no doubt his analysis of the global millenarian conjuncture in the sixteenth century in which the several empires controlling most of Eurasia were brought into contact, an aspect only briefly sketched in his 1997 article and fully developed here (“Sixteenth-Century Millenarism from the Tagus to the Ganges”). Taking as his starting point a 1581 dialogue about the Final Judgment between the Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Catalan Jesuit attending his court, Antonio Monserrate, Subrahmanyam unravels a thread that brings to light a Zeitgeist comprising eschatological expectations, largely shared by such varied political and religious worlds as the Iberian Catholic monarchy and its Habsburg cousin in Austria, the Sunni Sultanate of the Ottomans, the Shiite virtual theocracy of the Safavids in Iran, and Akbar’s regime marked by a largely unorthodox Sunnism not exempt of Shiite influences. It could be objected that Subrahmanyam’s “global” conjuncture is heavily slanted toward the Catholic and Islamic worlds, neglecting the Protestant, Hindu, and Confucian worlds, even though Mughal millenarianism apparently incorporated certain Hindu traditions. Nevertheless, this analysis provides a valuable counterpoint to a certain strain of teleological Western discourse that views voyages by Europeans, described as “great discoveries” (neglecting the navigations by the Muslim Chinese admiral Zheng He in the years 1400–1430), as the initial steps toward capitalist globalization. In his own way, Subrahmanyam thus helped “provincialize” Europe.

这本书产生了巨大的影响，并在一定程度上在学术界建立了一条贯穿历史的脉络。苏布拉马尼亚姆继续探索这一脉络，正如他最近的几部作品所展现的那样。他对游牧民、异乡人以及那些跨越政治、知识或精神界限的人的形象日益增长的兴趣，回应了我们这个饱受折磨的时代所提出的一个重大问题。

The book made a great impact and, to an extent, established connected history in the scholarly landscape. Subrahmanyam has continued to explore this vein, as illustrated by several recent works. His growing interest in the figure of the nomad, the foreigner, those who cross political, intellectual, or spiritual boundaries, responds to one of the great questions raised by a period as tormented as ours.

克劳德·马尔科维茨

Claude Markovits

Sanjay Subrahmanyam，《关联历史探索：莫卧儿王朝和法兰克人：从塔霍河到恒河》（新德里：牛津大学出版社，2005 年）。

Sanjay Subrahmanyam, Explorations in Connected History: Mughals and Franks: From the Tagus to the Ganges (New Delhi: Oxford University Press, 2005).

2005

2005

超越自然与文化:德斯科拉将自然引入社会科学

Beyond Nature and Culture: Descola Steers Nature into the Social Sciences

法国结构人类学的遗产似乎被三个主要领域和不同问题所共享：弗朗索瓦丝·埃里蒂埃 (Françoise Héritier) 探讨的性别差异，莫里斯·戈德利尔 (Maurice Godelier) 探讨的阶级差异，以及菲利普·德科拉 (Philippe Descola，生于 1949 年) 探讨的自然与文化差异，尤其是在他最值得注意的著作《超越自然与文化》 ( Par-delà nature et culture ) 中。这三个研究项目都是通过挖掘列维-斯特劳斯结构主义的盲点而发展起来的，表明他的作品中出现的一组抽象组合变量实际上是社会动态结晶的点。从这个角度来看，德科拉与埃里蒂埃和戈德利尔有着相同的抱负，继续他们共同导师的工作，但在政治层面上，因为生态学是德科拉的批判视野，正如他的同行人类学家也质疑性别不平等和支配一样。

The legacy of structural anthropology in France seems to be shared between three main domains and distinct problems: the difference between the sexes, taken up by Françoise Héritier, the difference between classes, taking up by Maurice Godelier, and the difference between nature and culture, taken up by Philippe Descola (born 1949), especially in his most noteworthy book, Par-delà nature et culture (Beyond Nature and Culture). Each of these three research programs developed by mining a blind spot in Lévi-Strauss’s structuralism, suggesting that what transpires in his work as a set of abstractly combined variables are, in fact, points around which the social dynamic crystallizes. From this point of view, Descola shares the same stated ambition as Héritier and Godelier, continuing the work of their common master but on political ground, since ecology is Descola’s critical horizon, just as the inequality of the sexes and domination were likewise questioned by his fellow anthropologists.

这本书采用了一种在21世纪初社会人类学家中已不再使用的理论风格——大规模比较综合。它由此完成了构成人类学生涯经典的三部曲。1986年，德斯科拉出版了一部基于亚马逊阿丘尔人田野调查的专著《自然社会》 （La nature domestique），随后在1993年出版了第一人称的民族志记述《暮光之矛》 （Les lances du crepuscule）。因此，从科学机构的历史来看，他是一位在后现代民族学权威之争中迷失的经典人物。然而，他也显得更合拍。与当时盛行的认识论相悖，因为这本书牢牢地定位于布鲁诺·拉图尔和唐娜·哈拉维发起的科学社会学对自然-偶偶关系的重新阐释。它通过引入本体论概念的人类学用法，在当时的知识领域中脱颖而出，而本体论概念后来产生了重要而又充满争议的后世影响。

The book took up a theoretical style that had fallen into disuse among social anthropologists by the early 2000s—namely, large-scale comparative synthesis. It thus completed the trilogy comprising the canon of an anthropological career, for in 1986 Descola published a monograph based on fieldwork among the Achuar in Amazonia, La nature domestique (In the Society of Nature), followed in 1993 by a first-person ethnographic account, Les lances du crepuscule (The Spears of Twilight). When viewed in the light of the history of scientific institutions, he thus cuts a classical figure, lost amid postmodern disputes over ethnological authority. Yet he also comes across as more in tune with the prevalent epistemology, for the book is firmly situated within the reworkings to the nature-couple pair initiated by the sociology of science as conducted by Bruno Latour and Donna Haraway. And it stood out within the intellectual landscape of the moment by introducing the anthropological usage of the concept of ontology, which went on to have an important yet disputed posterity.

本书的灵感源于阿丘阿尔人（Achuar）——他自20世纪70年代起研究的安第斯山麓希瓦罗人群体——对我们直觉地将人与受盲目物理决定约束的自然物区分开来所表现出的完全漠不关心。阿丘阿尔人的象征生态学比现代语境下对人格属性的分配更为自由，例如，女性在花园中栽培的植物和男性捕猎的猎物与其人类“另一个自我”（altern ego）之间存在着亲属关系，或掠夺性和好战性的互惠关系。德斯科拉选择了爱德华·泰勒（Edward Tylor）的“万物有灵论”概念来描述这种关系体系。亚马逊泛灵论的启发力量源自它对现代（德斯科拉称之为自然主义）组织世界关系方式的颠覆：我们认为被赋予思想的生物标志着物理连续体中的差异，而泛灵论团体则认为身体的物质性对不同群体进行了区分，所有群体都具有相同的人格地位。

The source of this book is the total indifference displayed by the Achuar—the Jivaroan group from the Andean foothills he studied as of the 1970s—for the intuitive division we make between, on the one hand, people capable of symbolic interaction and, on the other, natural things bound by blind physical determination. The symbolic ecology of the Achuar distributes the properties of personhood more liberally than in the modern context, since, for example, plants cultivated by women in gardens and prey hunted by men have a relation of kinship or of predatory and warlike reciprocity to their human alter egos. Descola chooses the concept of animism, taken from Edward Tylor, to characterize this system of relations. The heuristic power of Amazonian animism derives from the inversion it brings about to the modern (which Descola calls naturalist) way of organizing relations to the world: whereas we think of beings endowed with minds as marking a difference within a physical continuum, animist groups consider the materiality of bodies as operating a differentiation between different groups, all of which share the same status of personhood.

《自然与文化剖析》通过描述另外两种本体论公式——即两种构建世界秩序和管理差异与连续性的方式——类比论和图腾崇拜，充实并系统化了万物有灵论的颠覆性潜力。尽管许多读者将此举视为一种分类行为，将每个人类社会都封闭在一种由人类学家自上而下定义的文化风格中，但至少有两种方法可以回应这种批评。首先，每一种认同模式，或本体论，都只是一种变体，源于比较，多样性由此显现。作者所谓的“关系模式”指的是赋予特定本体论特定取向的制度建构。因此，万物有灵论的特点是掠夺或互惠，视具体情况而定，而自然主义则以生产或保护为主。关系模式在本体论中带来了变化和历史，而本体论又是共时性描述的。其次，这个四项比较框架彻底改变了现代自然主义的地域化，它并非仅仅作为一种独特的本体论替代方案的对应物（如爱德华多·维韦罗斯·德·卡斯特罗的视角主义），而是作为众多社会、政治和生态安排中的一种。因此，它避免了将非现代理想化为简单的反模型的陷阱，转而开始思考我们从过去继承下来的宇宙结构的转变。

Par-delà nature et culture fleshes out and then systematizes the subversive potential of animism by describing two other ontological formulas—that is, two other ways of ordering the world and of managing differences and continuities—namely, analogism and totemism. Though many readers saw this move as a classificatory undertaking enclosing each human society in a cultural style defined from above by anthropologists, there are at least two ways of responding to this criticism. First, each mode of identification, or ontology, is only a variant, derived by comparison, within which diversity appears. What the author calls “modes of relation” designates institutional formations giving a specific orientation to a given ontology. Thus, animism is marked by predation or reciprocity, depending on the case, while naturalism occurs in versions in which production or protection may dominate. The modes of relation are what bring about change, history, within ontologies that are, furthermore, described synchronically. Second, this four-term comparative framework radicalizes the provincialization of modern naturalism, transpiring not as a mere counterpart to a unique ontological alternative (as in Eduardo Viveiros de Castro’s perspectivism) but as one social, political, and ecological arrangement among many others. It thus avoids the pitfall of idealizing the non-modern as a simple counter-model to instead start thinking about transformations to our cosmological structures inherited from the past.

从社会科学的角度来看，《自然与文化之分析》的主要贡献无疑在于它从根本上重新定义了我们所说的“社会”。尽管其经验和概念基础似乎构成了对这一概念的直接批判，但鉴于人与人之间建立的互动领域已不足以产生社会科学的研究对象，这本书实际上应该被视为回归涂尔干探究社会起源的课题。德斯科拉邀请人类学家、社会学家、历史学家和哲学家优先考察人与自然环境关系的结构，因为群体形成的过程本质上依赖于这些关系。这部著作的遗产（除了其对亚马逊民族学的深远影响外）体现在目前正在开展的研究中，这些研究旨在将生态学视为一个核心的人类学和社会学问题，而非某种直接的规定性或规范性形式。

From the point of view of the social sciences, the main contribution of Par-delà nature et culture has no doubt been its capacity to fundamentally redefine what we mean by “society.” While its empirical and conceptual underpinnings seem to constitute a straightforward critique of this concept, insofar as the sphere of interactions instituted between humans no longer suffices to give rise to the very object of social science, the book should in fact be seen as returning to Durkheim’s project of inquiring into the genesis of the social. Descola invites anthropologists, as well as sociologists, historians, and philosophers, to examine, as a priority, how relations to the natural environment are structured, because the process of group formation depends essentially on these relations. The legacy of this work (other than its profound impact on Amazonian ethnology) is to be found in work currently being conducted to conceive of ecology not as some immediately prescriptive or normative form but as a central anthropological and sociological problem.

皮埃尔·沙博尼耶

Pierre Charbonnier

菲利普·德斯科拉，《超越自然与文化》（巴黎：伽利玛出版社，2005年）。伽利玛出版社（“Folio”）于2015年再版。珍妮特·劳埃德将其译为英文版，题为《超越自然与文化》（芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，2013年）。

Philippe Descola, Par-delà nature et culture (Paris: Gallimard [“Bibliothèque des sciences humaines”], 2005). Republished by Gallimard (“Folio”), 2015. Translated into English by Janet Lloyd as Beyond Nature and Culture (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 2013).

2006

2006

Charonne，1962 年 8 月：Dewerpe 尸检国家暴力

Charonne, 8 février 1962: Dewerpe Autopsies State Violence

鉴于民主政权的警察部队在日常工作中越来越少使用武力，为什么警察暴力事件会定期爆发，并且持续不断？我们该如何解释真正的国家屠杀竟然发生在民主国家内部？假设社会科学研究人员不想仅仅重复后者已经说过的话，或者不想受到自上而下的整体视角的诱惑，他们又该如何解释这些行动者的行为呢？阿兰·德韦普（1952-2015）在《查罗纳》（Charonne）一书中为这些问题提供了富有启发性和根本性的答案。

Given that democratic regimes’ police forces make ever less use of force in their daily activity, why do paroxysmic episodes of police violence break out at regular intervals and so clearly persist? How are we to explain that genuine state massacres occur within the bosom of democratic states? And how are social science researchers to account for what the actors do, assuming they wish to go beyond merely repeating what the latter have already said or wish to avoid the temptation of adopting an overarching top-down vision? Alain Dewerpe (1952–2015) provides illuminating and fundamental answers to these questions in Charonne.

本书以对一个事件的全面分析呈现：1962年2月8日，在巴黎沙罗讷区爆发的反对秘密武装组织（OAS）的示威活动。如果说这是持续数月的反“秘密武装组织”运动的一部分，那么它有两个特点：它是被动的，因为它是对极右翼组织一系列暗杀和爆炸事件的回应；而且，尽管政府部门对此表示含糊其辞，但它还是被禁止了。这场示威活动导致九人被派去维持秩序的警察部队屠杀（伤者人数不计）。

The book is presented as the total analysis of an event: the February 8, 1962, demonstration in the Charonne district of Paris against the Organisation armée secrète (OAS). If this was part of an anti-OAS dynamic in full swing for several months, it had two particularities: It was reactive, since it was a response to a series of assassinations and bombings by the far-right organization; and it was banned, albeit equivocally, by the public authorities. The demonstration resulted in the massacre of nine people (without counting the very many injured) by the police units sent to maintain order.

德韦普的探索始于本书第一部分，他细致地重现了警察在夏龙街/伏尔泰大道十字路口发起的25分钟冲锋。随后，他探讨了被派去维持秩序的警察部队的雇佣条件、他们职业惯例的起源、他们惯习的形成，以及他们认知框架的构建，尤其是通过他们与警察的接触。殖民经验。德韦普强调了允许甚至鼓励这场暴行爆发的警察和政治决策。他的重构堪称典范。没有留下任何偶然因素，没有遗漏任何细节，他避免将任何单一原因视为核心原因，从而将其他诸多原因视为寄生虫。他避开了所有陷阱，例如将警察视为国家武装力量，暗示警察部队是国中之国，将夏洛纳事件视为极其罕见但极其严重的事故，或将某种潜在现实与警察机构联系起来。如果德韦普正确地将这场突发性暴力爆发的先决条件视为规范化暴力的延续，那么他并没有将前者视为后者的逻辑结果，而是将它们视为相互依存的关系。这种方法使他能够勾勒出这场国家大屠杀的人类学历史。

Dewerpe’s exploration starts, in the first part of the book, by meticulously reconstructing the twenty-five minutes of the police charge at the rue de Charonne/boulevard Voltaire crossroads. It then goes over the employment conditions of the police units dispatched to maintain order, the origins of their professional routines, the formation of their habitus, and the fabrication of their cognitive frameworks, particularly through their contact with the colonial experience. Dewerpe emphasizes the police and political decisions that allowed and even encouraged this outburst of brutality. His reconstruction is exemplary. Nothing is left to chance, nothing is overlooked, and he avoids reckoning any single reason as central and, hence, the many others as parasitical. He steers clear of all the pitfalls that would view the police solely as the armed wing of the state, that would imply the police force is a state within the state, that would hold Charonne to be an exceedingly rare but exceptionally serious accident, or that would detect an indication of some subjacent reality to the police institution. And if Dewerpe quite rightly views the preconditions for this explosion of paroxysmic violence as following on from routines of codified violence, he does not thereby take the former as the logical consequence of the latter but rather thinks of them interdependently. This approach allows him to sketch an anthropological history of this state massacre.

毕竟，国家屠杀不仅仅是死亡人数的问题。为了彻底探究事件，德韦普试图理解围绕沙罗纳事件的真相。这主要体现在三个方面。第一个方面，他称之为“公民丑闻”，与事件的直接反应有关，从谴责屠杀的动员，到事后看来毫无疑问是国家谎言的、精心炮制的捏造：示威者被指控对屠杀负有责任，因为他们在共和国试图行使示威权利，行为大胆。警察高层也被免除了责任，导致对死亡直接原因的虚假陈述持续存在。 Dewerpe 对 Charonne 事件作为社会事实的调查包括政治当局故意将司法程序引入死胡同，以及主导记忆形成的条件，从 2 月 13 日的葬礼的庄严仪式到镇压行为的政治和工会记忆的形成。

After all, state massacre is not just a matter of the number of dead. In order to exhaustively examine the event, Dewerpe seeks to make sense of the affair surrounding Charonne. This had three main dimensions. The first, which he calls the “civic scandal,” relates to immediate reactions to the event, from the mobilization denouncing the murders through to the patient and solid fabrication of what would retrospectively be seen, without the slightest doubt, as a state lie: The demonstrators were said to be responsible for the massacre because of their audacious behavior in wishing to exert their right to demonstrate in a republic. The police hierarchy was also relieved of its responsibility, giving rise to a persistent false account of the immediate causes of death. Dewerpe’s investigation of Charonne as a social fact includes the dead ends to which the judicial proceedings were deliberately led by the political authorities and the conditions presiding over the creation of a memory, from the somber ceremony of the funerals on February 13 through to the formation of a political and trade union memory of the act of repression.

德韦普的著作为社会科学提供了一堂普遍方法论的课。如今，谴责事件与结构之间所谓的人为区分颇为流行。但这种谴责很少伴随着任何试图去解决其后果的尝试，互动的短暂性经常被消解在社会分析中。结构。但Charonne成功地超越了这种区分。社会结构无法完全解释事件的奇异性，事件也不应被理解为某种自主的、漂浮的事件。这本书在很多方面都继承了卡尔·曼海姆开创的社会学传统：它提供了关于所研究案例的众多观点之一，同时也提供了一个因此尤为有力的全景视角。如果历史研究能够充分证实现场抗议者的说法，并有论据和证据支持，那么Dewerpe 所作的不仅仅是学术上的合法性。他更进一步，提供了一种社会学视角来审视社会和政治进程，这些进程通过审视而变得可描述。这部著作既与其试图分析的对象紧密相连（例如，它充当了国家暴力的提醒者和分析模型），也是努力从外部视角审视该对象的成果。这样，我们就可以理解引言结尾那句感人至深的话：“如果身为沙罗讷殉道者的儿子并不能带来任何清醒，也不能妨碍一个人履行历史学家的职责。”我们不得不敬佩这样一种能力：既不放弃社会科学所要求的任何科学要求，又保持着由绝对戏剧性的个人经历所塑造的规范视角。

Dewerpe’s book provides the social sciences with a lesson in general methodology. It is currently fashionable to denounce the supposedly artificial distinction between event and structure. But such denunciation is rarely accompanied by any attempt to work through its consequences, and the ephemera of interactions are regularly dissolved in analysis of social structures. But Charonne successfully moves beyond the distinction. Social structures cannot fully account for the singularity of the event, nor should the event be understood as some autonomous floating occurrence. In many ways, this book shares in the sociological tradition initiated by Karl Mannheim: It provides one point of view among others on the case under study, while also providing a panoramic view that is thus particularly robust. If historical research fully validates the versions given by protesters at the scene, backed up by arguments and proof, Dewerpe does not merely provide academic legitimization. He goes a step further, providing a sociological vision of social and political processes that, by virtue of being examined, become describable. The work is both bound up with the object it seeks to analyze (in that it acts as a reminder and an analytical model of state violence, for example) and the result of an endeavor to reach an external point of view on that object. This is how one may make sense of the deeply moving sentence on which the introduction closes: “If being the son of a martyr of Charonne does not provide any lucidity, nor does it prevent one from doing one’s job as a historian.” One cannot but respect such a capacity to relinquish none of the scientific demands required by the social sciences while maintaining a normative perspective forged by an absolutely dramatic personal experience.

塞德里克·莫罗·德·贝兰

Cédric Moreau de Bellaing

Alain Dewerpe，Charonne，1962 年 8 月：Anthropologie historique d'un Massacre d'État（巴黎：Gallimard [“Folio”]，2006）。

Alain Dewerpe, Charonne, 8 février 1962: Anthropologie historique d’un massacre d’État (Paris: Gallimard [“Folio”], 2006).

2007

2007

灭绝岁月：弗里德兰德将大屠杀置于纳粹研究的核心

The Years of Extermination: Friedländer Puts the Holocaust at the Heart of Scholarship on Nazism

尽管考虑到大屠杀在我们过去形象中的地位，如今看来这似乎不太可能，但《纳粹德国与犹太人》这两卷书最初构思的初衷是为了对抗对大屠杀的遗忘。20世纪七八十年代，索尔·弗里德兰德（生于1932年）对德国记忆的变化感到担忧。他察觉到有人试图将奥斯维辛从历史记录中抹去，正如他在1976年的一篇文章中所解释的那样。在那篇文章中，他勾勒出一项针对该事件的“全球历史研究”（他长期搁置此研究），对肇事者、受害者和背景给予同等关注。大约十年后，他与慕尼黑当代史研究所（Institut für Zeitgeschichte）所长马丁·布罗萨特（Martin Broszat）之间引发的著名争论，使他的研究项目重新获得了现实意义。

Although it seems improbable today given the place the Holocaust has in our images of the past, the two volumes of Nazi Germany and the Jews were initially conceived as books to do battle against its oblivion. In the 1970s and 1980s, Saul Friedländer (born 1932) was worried by changes in German memory. He detected an attempt to erase Auschwitz from the historical record, as he explained in a 1976 article in which he sketched out a “global historical study” of the events (which he long put off), paying equal attention to the perpetrators, victims, and context. The famous controversy opposing him, ten or so years later, to Martin Broszat, the director of the Munich Institute of Contemporary History (Institut für Zeitgeschichte), gave his project renewed topicality.

布罗萨特提倡将纳粹主义“历史化”，并表示希望将纳粹罪行置于边缘地位：十二年的德国历史不能仅仅归结于此。这场辩论紧张激烈，引人入胜。未经任何抵抗，辩论就转向了弗里德兰德的一方。他自己的一生都打上了大屠杀的烙印。他的父母都死于奥斯维辛，而他在十几岁时也刚刚逃脱了同样的命运。另一个问题恰恰在于犹太受害者留下的记录应归属于何处。布罗萨特与弗里德兰德的立场截然相反，他排除了这些记录作为资料来源的可能性，声称它们基于一种“神话记忆”——用现在看来不可思议、近乎丑闻的说法，揭示了随后发生的转变的全貌。

Promoting a “historicization” of Nazism, Broszat voiced a wish to relegate Nazi criminality to the margins: Twelve years of German history could not be reduced solely to that. The debate was tense, violent, fascinating. It turned without a fight to Friedländer’s advantage. His own life had been marked by the Holocaust. Both his parents had died in Auschwitz, and, in his early teens, he had only just escaped the same fate. Another issue was precisely the place to grant to records left by Jewish victims, which Broszat, adopting a diametrically opposed stance to Friedländer, ruled out as a source, claiming they were based on a “mythic memory”—to use an expression that now seems inconceivable, almost scandalous, revealing the full extent of the subsequent shift.

第一卷《迫害岁月》 （1997 年）长达 300 页，考察了战前时期，因此重点关注了德国。鉴于弗里德兰德此前关于如何理解一个将代表性问题推向极限的事件的理念，这一叙述可能不如预期那么激进。叙事的新颖性和丰富性源于施暴者决定并实施的迫害与受害者经历的迫害（或以更疏远的方式，由其他社会行为者观察）之间的交替。总而言之，弗里德兰德进行了双重操作。与他最初的设想一致，他确认了大屠杀在纳粹历史中的核心地位，同时也为受害者在这段历史叙述中创造了——甚至强加了——一个位置。当然，在过去的半个世纪里，犹太人并非完全缺席历史叙述。但受害者的历史通常以地方为单位进行，影响有限，而主流历史则聚焦于施暴者，试图理解他们是如何走到这一步的。在这样的叙述中，犹太人只在必要时作为偶然人物出现。相反，在弗里德兰德的书中，人们可以说，犹太人不仅死了：他们还活着，但后来被杀了。

Over the course of 300 pages, the first volume, The Years of Persecution (1997), examines the prewar period, focusing therefore on the Reich. The account is less radical than might be expected, given Friedländer’s previous ideas on how to make sense of an event pushing the question of representation to the limits. The novelty and fertility of the narrative stems from the alternation between the persecution decided on and implemented by the perpetrators and the persecution as experienced by victims or, in a more distanced way, observed by other social actors. All in all, Friedländer conducts a dual operation. In accordance with his original project, he confirms the centrality of the Holocaust in the history of Nazism but also invents—imposes even—a place for victims in this historical account. Of course, the Jews had not been totally absent from the historical narrative over the previous half-century. But the history of victims, often conducted on a local scale, had had limited impact, while the dominant history focused on the perpetrators, trying to understand how they had reached such a point. In such an account, the Jews were only present when necessary, as contingent figures. In Friedländer’s book, on the contrary, the Jews, one may say, are not only dead: they are alive, and later only are killed.

他们被杀了。这发生在第二卷《审视之年》中，该书厚达 1000 页左右，出版于十年后。记述变得更加复杂，涵盖了整个大陆，解释了例如在比亚利斯托克、柏林、布鲁塞尔和波尔多发生的事情。记述也更加压抑，因为 1941 年之后，一切都只是杀人或被杀的问题。它之所以压抑，还因为在第二卷中，弗里德兰德系统地使用了第一卷中较少出现的资料：即被迫害犹太人留下的日记——他们写作时如此鲜活，如此鲜活，但第二天就死了。我们一章一章地追读其中一些日记，然后它们突然在最后一篇日记中即兴停了下来。因此，1942 年 8 月 4 日，在华沙，哈伊姆·卡普兰写道：“如果我死了，我的日记会怎样？”

They are killed. This happens in the second volume, The Years of Examination, running to 1,000 or so pages, published ten years later. The account becomes more complex, covering an entire continent, explaining what happened in Byałistok, Berlin, Brussels, and Bordeaux, for instance. The account is also more oppressive, for after 1941 it was solely a matter of killing or being killed. It is also oppressive because, in this second volume, Friedländer systematically uses sources less present in the first: that is, diaries left by persecuted Jews—so lively, so alive when they wrote, then dead the day after. We follow some of them from chapter to chapter, and then suddenly they stop, at an impromptu moment, on a final entry. Thus on August 4, 1942, in Warsaw, Chaïm Kaplan wrote: “If I die, what will happen to my diary?”

然而，弗里德兰德并非仅仅关注受害者的历史。关于施害者的历史，他提出了一系列富有洞察力的论断。他提出的“救赎性反犹主义”概念尤其有用，它使我们得以区分希特勒在《我的奋斗》中倡导的反犹主义形式与之前的反犹主义，并解释一切实施的残酷残酷：据说，德国人民的“救赎”因犹太人的存在而受到削弱和玷污。在其中，只有通过消灭犹太人，通过社会排斥、强制移民或谋杀才能实现。同样，弗里德兰德凭借其权威，为稳定如今在“最终解决方案”演变研究中占据主导地位的时间划分做出了巨大贡献：在冲突全球化和美国参战的背景下，希特勒于1941年12月做出了彻底灭绝的决定；随后，从1942年春季开始，灭绝进程急剧加速。

Nevertheless, Friedländer does not focus solely on the history of the victims. Concerning that of the perpetrators, he puts forward a set of insightful propositions. His concept of “redemptive anti-Semitism” is particularly useful, making it possible to distinguish the form of anti-Semitism advocated by Hitler in Mein Kampf from what had preceded and to explain the relentless ferocity with which everything was implemented: The “redemption” of the German people, said to be weakened and sullied by the Jewish presence in its midst, was supposed to occur only through the elimination of Jews, through their social exclusion, forced emigration, or murder. Equally, and through his authority, Friedländer did much to stabilize the chronological division that now dominates in scholarship concerning the evolution of the “final solution”: The decision for total extermination was taken by Hitler in December 1941, against the backdrop of the globalization of the conflict and the United States joining the war; it was followed by a radical acceleration as of spring 1942.

《纳粹德国与犹太人》两卷本被翻译成多种语言，并荣获诸多奖项。它们以其激进的创新性——提出“整合史”——占据着独特的地位。出版时如此，至今依然如此。然而，如果说这部不朽之作留下了持久的印记，那并非人们最初想象的那样。因为它并没有强加一种新的规范，即用多焦点叙事取代先前盛行的叙事方法。相反，它表明，运用恰当的形式，结合高超的写作技巧，我们能够更全面、更敏锐地解读这场在悲剧性的二十世纪留下不可磨灭印记的可怕事件。

The two volumes of Nazi Germany and the Jews were translated into many languages and won many prizes. They occupy a unique place, with their radical novelty in proposing an “integrated history.” This was the case when they came out and is still the case today. But if this monumental work has left a lasting mark, it is not what one might have initially imagined. For it has not imposed a new canon, that of a multifocal account replacing the previously prevalent approaches. Rather, it has shown that using the appropriate form, combined with great dexterity of writing, it is possible to account more completely and more sensitively to this monstrous event that indelibly marked the tragic twentieth century.

弗洛朗·布拉亚尔

Florent Brayard

索尔·弗里德兰德（Saul Friedländer），《灭绝岁月：纳粹德国与犹太人，1939-1945》（纽约：哈珀柯林斯，2007 年）。

Saul Friedländer, The Years of Extermination: Nazi Germany and the Jews, 1939–1945 (New York: Harper Collins, 2007).

2008

2008

暴力：柯林斯将暴力视为情境效应

Violence: Collins Makes Violence an Effect of Situation

《暴力》是一部反常且夸张的作品，它借鉴了关于军事战斗、街头斗殴、夫妻暴力、大规模屠杀和操场争吵的丰富多样的文献资料，力图以如此疏离的距离来理解其主题，以至于有时甚至会流露出一丝令人惊讶的顽皮。其作者，社会学家（兼小说家）兰德尔·柯林斯（生于1941年），现任宾夕法尼亚大学教授，提出了一个假设，其挑衅性鲜明地展现了出来：如果所有暴力的根源都完全源于引发暴力的情境，情况会怎样？这种思路的激进性在其附录中显而易见，因为它等于将个体的社会化及其所属的群体文化置于暴力病因学的次要地位。

Drawing on rich and varied documentation about military battles, street fights, conjugal violence, mass massacres, and playground quarrels, Violence is an abnormal and exorbitant work that seeks to apprehend its subject with such distance that it at times displays a surprising hint of mischievousness. Its author, the sociologist (and novelist) Randall Collins (born 1941), currently a professor at the University of Pennsylvania, puts forth a hypothesis whose provocative nature he makes resoundingly clear: What if the cause of all violence was entirely rooted in the situation giving rise to it? The radicality of this approach is transparent in its codicil, for it amounts to holding the socialization of individuals and the group culture to which they belong to be secondary in the etiology of violence.

柯林斯的目的是补充其早期著作《互动仪式链》 （2004）中关于“成功互动仪式”的研究，并将其与“暴力互动”的研究相结合。暴力互动的特殊之处在于它“违背了正常的互动仪式”。这种互动始于“对抗性紧张”的情境，这是一种在人与人之间蔓延的低水平敌意，伴随着以恐惧为主导的负面情绪（因此他使用了“紧张/恐惧”这一术语）。如果这种状态是诉诸暴力的先决条件，我们还需要看到它同时也起到了抑制暴力的作用。由于恐惧会引发回避态度，大多数此类情境都会终止，要么是因为主角散去，要么是因为正常的互动情境重新建立。柯林斯坚持认为，暴力是一种罕见现象。

Collins’s purpose was to supplement the study of “successful interaction rituals,” addressed in an earlier work, Interaction Ritual Chains (2004), with that of “violent interactions,” whose specificity is that they “go against the grain of normal interaction rituals.” They start with situations of “confrontational tension,” a sort of low-level hostility that takes hold between people, accompanied by negative emotions dominated by fear (hence his use of the phrase “tension/fear”). If this state is a precondition for resorting to violence, we further need to see that it also acts as a brake on it. Since fear gives rise to avoidance attitudes, most such situations cease, either because the protagonists disperse or because a normal interaction situation is reestablished. Violence, Collins insists, is a rare phenomenon.

暴力的发生需要进一步的条件，引导参与者克服恐惧。因此，柯林斯强调了一系列激励机制：例如，公众的存在促使主角实施暴力行为，或者属于某个团体或组织，从而迫使其采取暴力行动。但最重要的因素是力量的不对称：如果一方认为自己可以压制对手，暴力发生的可能性就会大大增加。这些情况凸显了所有暴力情境的一个特征：“前向恐慌”，这种愤怒状态赋予暴力以无序和不受控制的特质，从而使暴力难以与暴力建立严格的工具性关系，只有像狙击手这样的高能专业人士才能例外。

For violence to occur, further conditions are needed, leading the participants to overcome the fear inspired. Collins thus emphasizes the importance of a set of incentivizing mechanisms: the presence of a public, for example, pushing protagonists to perpetrate acts of violence, or else belonging to a group or organization exerting an obligation to act violently. But the most important factor is asymmetrical forces: If one party feels it can crush the adversary, this considerably increases the probability of violence. These situations accentuate a trait characterizing all situations of violence: “forward panic,” a state of rage giving violence its disordered and uncontrolled aspect, thereby making it difficult to have a strictly instrumental relation to it, a rule to which only high-powered professionals, such as snipers, are an exception.

然而，在柯林斯看来，固守这一基本框架就等于忽视了这样一个事实：设定情境（微观社会学）决定因素与考虑社会历史（宏观社会学）因素之间并不对立，没有这一点，他提出普遍暴力理论的雄心壮志注定会失败。对他而言，情境属于历史，因此采取结构化的形式，对身处其中的人的行为施加限制。因此，他详细讨论了人类群体寻求规范和驯服暴力的方式。柯林斯认为，这些努力的共同原则是，它们寻求通过确保一定的力量平衡来避免冲突，从而限制诉诸暴力的过度步骤（例如，产生公平规则），从而遏制未来恐慌的风险及其潜在的不可逆转的后果。仇杀和决斗等行为、战时法规范以及某些犯罪集团的荣誉准则都体现了这一点，就像娱乐性暴力（尤其是体育运动）在当代社会中一样。

Yet, to Collins’s mind, sticking to this elementary scheme would entail overlooking that there is no opposition between positing situational (micro-sociological) determination and taking sociohistorical (macro-sociological) aspects into account, without which his ambition to put forward a general theory of violence would be doomed to failure. For him, situations belong to history and therefore take structured forms exerting constraints on the action of those caught up in them. He thus discusses at length the ways in which human groups seek to regulate and tame violence. Collins suggests the common principle to these efforts is that they seek to contain the risks of forward panic, and its potentially irreversible consequences, by favoring situations that prevent conflict by ensuring a certain balance of forces, thereby limiting the exorbitant step of resorting to violence (resulting, for example, in rules of fairness). Practices such as vendettas and duels, the norms of jus in bello, and the codes of honor of certain criminal groups are illustrations of this, just as recreational violence—particularly sport—is in contemporary societies.

科林斯的许多读者并不认同他的论点。他们有时认为，在特定的社会情境中，某些个人和群体比其他个人和群体更容易使用暴力；他们可能认为社会组织如此重要，以至于社会关系会根据其性质而转向更和平或更不和平的方向，或者社会与暴力的关系会因贯穿其中并不断转变的总体趋势而变化。然而，这些都是显而易见的论断，科林斯认为完全没有必要去争论。他的目标则在另一个层面。暴力最好被解读为一项实验的方案。他将情境决定暴力的假设推向了极限，而不是否定他讽刺地称之为“替代理论方法”（即倾向方法）的方法，而是将其置于真正的视角中。考虑到此类方法的霸权特征，这一举动是大胆的，不仅在社会科学中，这本来是两害相权取其轻，而且尤其在我们通常自发地对暴力采取的态度中。这不仅仅是一个理论上的反命题，而是一个柯林斯所描述的实际的——因此也是政治的——替代方案：如果在所有条件相同的情况下，情况会增加或减少暴力的可能性，那么通过针对最有可能发生暴力的情况采取行动，可以遏制这种暴力。这为针对那些被认为最有可能诉诸暴力的个人和群体采取截然不同的方法铺平了道路。

Many of Collins’s readers are not convinced by his arguments. They have sometimes considered that, in a given social situation, certain individuals and groups are more prone to use violence than others; they may feel that social organization is of such importance that, depending on its qualities, social relations take a more or a less peaceful turn, or else that the relation societies have with violence varies, depending on the general tendencies running through and transforming. Yet these are obvious statements that Collins feels absolutely no need to dispute. What he is aiming at lies on another plane. Violence is best read as the protocol for an experiment. He pushes the hypothesis of the situational determination of violence to its limits, not to invalidate what he ironically calls “alternative theoretical approaches” (that is, dispositional approaches) but to put them in their true perspective. The move is daring, considering the hegemonic character of such approaches, not only in social sciences, which would be a lesser evil, but especially in the attitudes we commonly and spontaneously adopt toward violence. It is not just a theoretical counterproposition but a practical—hence political—alternative that Collins portrays: If, all things being equal, situations increase or decrease the probability of violence, this violence may be curbed by acting on the situations in which there is the strongest risk of it occurring. This paves the way to very different approaches to those targeting individuals and groups reputed to be most likely to resort to violence.

多米尼克·林哈特

Dominique Linhardt

兰德尔·柯林斯，《暴力：微观社会学理论》（新泽西州普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，2008 年）。

Randall Collins, Violence: A Micro-Sociological Theory (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2008).

2009

2009

不被统治的艺术:斯科特与无政府主义历史的人类学结果

The Art of Not Being Governed: Scott and the Anthropological Outcome of an Anarchist History

《不受统治的艺术》自出版之日起便受到广大读者的热烈追捧，并引发了远在东南亚专家圈子之外的历史学家、人类学家和政治学家的热烈讨论。它的成功很大程度上归功于它对惯常的进化模式的质疑。根据该模式，人类从原始组织形式逐渐建立起以国家为基础的、有文化的农业文明，而后者则以残余的形式存在于边缘部落中。相反，詹姆斯·斯科特（生于1936年）基于对印度北部山区人口的文献研究，认为这些人群的社会形态和生计方式更应被视为对地方国家强加于农民的种种限制——奴隶制、徭役、征兵和税收——的反抗形式。这些边缘人群的社会政治组织并非国家社会建立的古老基础，而实际上是一种颠倒的衍生产物——一种带有自由主义色彩的反模式。斯科特认为，这些社会是“排斥国家”和“逃避国家”的社会。至于山地居民，他们并非来自原始定居的族群，而大多是逃离低地、为摆脱国家过度高压统治的农民的后裔。

From the moment it was published, The Art of Not Being Governed was enthusiastically received by a wide readership and debated by historians, anthropologists, and political scientists far outside the circle of Southeast Asia specialists. Its success owes much to its disputing the habitual evolutionary schema, according to which humanity progressively built up literate agricultural state-based civilizations from primitive forms of organization, the latter existing in residual form through tribes living on the margins. Drawing on documentary research into mountain populations in northern India, James Scott (born 1936) argues, on the contrary, that these populations’ social morphology and livelihoods are better seen as forms of resistance to the regime of constraints that local states impose on the peasantry: slavery, statute labor, conscription, and taxation. Rather than being the archaic base on which state societies were built up, the sociopolitical organization of these marginal peoples is in fact an inverted derivative product—a counter-model of libertarian hue. Scott argues that these are “state-repelling” and “state-escaping” societies. As for the mountain dwellers, they do not hail from some stock of primitive settlement but descend mostly from peasants who fled the lowlands to be free of the overly heavy hand of the state.

斯科特在此借鉴了皮埃尔·克拉斯特（Pierre Clastres）1974年出版的《社会反对国家》 （ La société contre l'État ）的遗产。他还借鉴了马尔科姆·雅普（Malcom Yapp）在《开伯尔的部落与国家，1838-1842》中提出的“水母部落”概念。对于雅普而言，部落社会的高度分割和内部自治赋予了它们一种无定形、难以捉摸的性质，使得对他们施加政治控制十分困难。然而，与这两位作者相比，斯科特的观点源于一种激进的建构主义。他指出，印度支那山区居民在难以到达的地区实行的刀耕火种农业需要流动和分散，而且产生的剩余价值很低。因此，他认为这是一种逃逸农业，是一种刻意劝阻的技术经济体系，目的是抵御平原国家的掠夺性倾向。对他来说，山区居民有意选择了将缺乏政治领导与社会分裂和可互换身份相结合的原则。他们拒绝书写，因此拒绝读写：他们不是前文字时代而是后文字时代，缺乏文本使他们能够操纵自己的家谱、过去和身份，以不那么引人注目，从而减轻现代国家、帝国和王国的行政机构的控制。

Scott here draws on the legacy of Pierre Clastres’s La société contre l’État (Society against the State, 1974). He also takes up the concept of “jellyfish tribes” set out in Tribes and States in the Khyber, 1838–1842 by Malcom Yapp, for whom the high degree of segmentation and internal autonomy of tribal societies endow them with an amorphous, impalpable nature, making it hard to exert political control over them. However, in comparison to these two authors, Scott’s perspective proceeds from a radical constructionism. He notes that slash-and-burn agriculture, practiced by Indochinese mountain dwellers in hard-to-reach zones, requires mobility and dispersal and generates low surpluses. He therefore argues that it is an escape agriculture, a deliberately dissuasive techno-economic system to ward off the predatory tendencies of plain states. For him, mountain dwellers have deliberately opted for principles combining a lack of political leadership with social segmentation and interchangeable identity. They reject writing, hence literacy: They are not preliterate but postliterate, where the lack of texts allows them to manipulate their genealogies, their past, and their identity so as to be less visible, hence lessen the control exerted by the administrative apparatus of modern states, empires, and kingdoms.

这一理论与文明主义和东方主义的论述相比，其优势在于使亚洲山地居民成为其自身历史的正式参与者。这并不是斯科特著作中的新内容。斯科特是一位先驱政治学家，他早期的庶民研究著作（《农民的道德经济学》和《弱者的武器》）已经围绕东南亚农民用来反抗国家强加的勒索形式的抵抗形式展开。尽管如此，他早期的关注点在于揭示在国家严密控制下的低地农民所共有的态度和策略，而现在他将关注点扩大到那些由于地处地理边缘而逃脱国家控制的刀耕火种的农民。此外，他还将这些清理农民的哲学树立到一种替代性的社会模式中，作为明确阐述无政府状态的历史的一部分。他非但没有认可霍布斯的论点，即遵循利维坦是人类进步的先决条件，反而描绘了朝着相反方向发展的群体，以寻找自由的手段并在刻意重塑的自然状态下蓬勃发展。

This theory, which, in comparison to civilizational and orientalist accounts, presents the advantage of making Asian mountain dwellers fully-fledged actors in their own history, is not a new facet to Scott’s work, a pioneering political scientist whose earlier works in subaltern studies (The Moral Economy of the Peasant and Weapons of the Weak) were already built around the forms of resistance used by Southeast Asian peasantries to counter state-imposed forms of extortion. Nevertheless, whereas his earlier concern was to bring out sets of attitudes and strategies common to lowland peasantries under close state control, he now expands his focus to slash-and-burn farmers who escape this hold due to their place on the geographical margins. Further, he erects the philosophy of these clearance farmers into an alternative social model as part of a history that explicitly addresses anarchy. Far from accrediting the Hobbesian thesis that adherence to a Leviathan is the precondition for human progress, he depicts groups moving in the opposite direction, to find the means to be free and to thrive in a deliberately recomposed state of nature.

这正是本书成功的原因之一。正如《反国家社会》为20世纪70年代盛行的自由主义理论提供了学术支持一样，斯科特的著作也呼应了2008年金融危机导致西方民主政府陷入的合法性危机，并最终引发了2011年的“愤怒者”运动。在这种背景下，国家看起来越来越不国家不再像启蒙运动社会契约的表达和保障者，而越来越像全球化金融资本主义的傀儡。斯科特的著作将国家简化为一个约束机制，为这种祛魅提供了人类学论证。

This is one of the reasons for the book’s success. Just as La société contre l’État had lent academic backing to the libertarian theories in fashion in the 1970s, so Scott’s book echoed with the legitimacy crisis affecting Western democratic governments as a result of the 2008 financial crisis, giving rise to the Indignados movement in 2011. In this context, the state looked less and less like the expression and guarantor of the Enlightenment social contract and more and more like the puppet of globalized financial capitalism. In reducing the state to a regime of constraints, Scott’s book provided anthropological arguments for this disenchantment.

然而，他的论点招致了批评，尤其是来自东南亚专家的批评。鉴于缺乏关于山地群体社会起源的史料，他的建构主义解读似乎有些推测性。将所有这些人群的特征仅仅归咎于他们拒绝国家模式，这过于简化，尤其是在斯科特只保留了支持其论点的证据的情况下。因为构成中国南部和印度支那半岛北部边界地带的弧形山脉从来都不是当地统治者无法触及的避难所。地势将这片区域分割成众多山谷，由种植水稻的国家占据，使得那里的山地居民与其他人群保持着密切的联系：刀耕火种的农民群体倾向于通过结盟和妥协而不是反抗、抵抗和逃亡来应对国家的压力。

Yet his thesis came in for criticism, particularly from specialists of Southeast Asia. His constructionist interpretation seems somewhat speculative, given the lack of historical sources on the sociogenesis of mountain groups. Linking all these populations’ characteristics solely to their rejecting the state model is highly reductive, especially as Scott only retains evidence supporting his argument. For the arc of mountains forming a border zone between southern China and the north of the Indochinese Peninsula has never been a zone of refuge beyond the reach of local potentates. The relief divides the area up into a multitude of valleys, occupied by rice-growing states, causing mountain dwellers there to be in close contact with other populations: groups of slash-and-burn farmers tended to respond to state pressure through alliances and compromise rather than opposition, resistance, and flight.

这本书最持久的贡献最终在于它定义了一个新的文化领域，Zomia（借用地理学家 Willem van Schendel 的名字），将从阿萨姆邦到越南的许多山地民族统一到同一研究领域内。

The book’s most lasting contribution ultimately lies in its defining a new cultural area, Zomia (borrowed from the geographer Willem van Schendel), uniting many mountain peoples from Assam to Vietnam within the same field of study.

伯纳德·福尔莫索

Bernard Formoso

詹姆斯·C·斯科特，《不被统治的艺术：东南亚高地无政府主义历史》（康涅狄格州纽黑文：耶鲁大学出版社，2009 年）。

James C. Scott, The Art of Not Being Governed: An Anarchist History of Upland Southeast Asia (New Haven, CT: Yale University Press, 2009).

2010

2010

酋长如何成为国王：基尔希赋予波利尼西亚自己的古老国家

How Chiefs Became Kings: Kirch Endows Polynesia with Its Own Archaic State

众所周知，最早的国家出现在公元前埃及、美索不达米亚、印度、中国、中美洲和安第斯文明中。此前人们认为，世界某些地区必须等到西方火器贸易到来，其贵族酋长才能演变为领土国家。考古学家帕特里克·基尔希（生于 1950 年）出版的《酋长如何成为国王》一书推翻了这种以欧洲为中心的论述。凭借在大洋洲的田野调查以及对从台湾到太平洋的南岛语系移民的重建，他确定了夏威夷群岛在一段时期（16 至 18 世纪）诞生和发展了一个国家间体系，当时这八个岛屿处于完全自给自足的状态。

It was known that the earliest states appeared independently in the Egyptian, Mesopotamian, Indian, Chinese, Mesoamerican, and Andean civilizations before the Christian era. And it was previously considered that certain regions of the world had to await the arrival of Western trade in firearms for their aristocratic chieftains to mutate into territorial states. In publishing How Chiefs Became Kings, the archaeologist Patrick Kirch (born 1950) exploded this Eurocentric account. On the strength of fieldwork in Oceania and his reconstitution of Austronesian migrations in the Pacific from Taiwan, he identified the birth and development of an interstate system in the Hawaiian archipelago at a period (sixteenth to eighteenth century) when this set of eight islands existed in a state of complete autarky.

基希的论证是对夏威夷语言学、考古学、民族学和历史资料的权威性综合，以及加里·费因曼、乔伊斯·马库斯、罗伯特·卡内罗和布​​鲁斯·特里格关于国家起源的比较研究的成果。他的方法论借鉴了词汇的语言年代学；对鱼塘、农田和纪念性石制建筑的发掘；博物馆收藏的树皮服饰、双体独木舟、垫子和羽毛饰品；欧洲探险日记以及檀香山传教士和商人的文献；土著精英的口述传统和历史记载；以及十九世纪夏威夷君主制的行政档案。至于他的解释模型，它巧妙地融合了外在和内在的视角、不同尺度上起作用的原因以及多种策略和环境，以解释这些酋长如何转变为神圣的皇家国家。

The argument that Kirch marshals is a magisterial synthesis of linguistic, archaeological, ethnological, and historical data about Hawaii and of comparative works by Gary Feinman, Joyce Marcus, Robert Carneiro, and Bruce Trigger on the origins of states. His methodology draws on glottochronology of vocabulary; excavations of fishponds, farmland, and monumental stone architecture; museum collections of bark clothing, double-hulled canoes, mats, and feathered adornments; diaries of European expeditions and texts by missionaries and traders in Honolulu; the oral traditions and historical accounts of indigenous elites; and the administrative archives of the nineteenth-century Hawaiian monarchy. As for his explanatory model, it elegantly combines etic and emic perspectives, causes operating at different scales, and many strategies and circumstances to account for the transformation of these chieftains into divine royal states.

他论证的要点恰恰在于，国家起源于詹姆斯·乔治·弗雷泽所推崇的那种神圣的国王，即人间诸神的后裔和化身，通过仪式将创立宇宙和生命的能量（玛那）赋予其臣民，并在继位时处死他，在本例中是被他的胜利者处死，胜利者将他献祭在祭坛上，献给战神库，每当敌方公国的领土被征服时，人们就会向战神库祈求。整个问题在于理解某个祖先体系中的首领如何成为这个独特的君主的代表，成为“人间虎鲨”，被禁忌所包围，统治着人民，排斥他人。

The main point of his argument is precisely that the state originated in the type of divine king dear to James George Frazer, the descendant and incarnation of the gods on earth, ritually granting his subjects the energetic power (mana) founding the universe and life and put to death on his succession, in this instance by his victor who sacrificed him on the altar to Kū, the god of war, who was invoked whenever an enemy principality’s territory was conquered. The whole question is to understand how the chief of one ancestral system among others came to represent this unique sovereign, the “tiger shark on earth,” encircled by taboos and reigning over the population to the exclusion of others.

为此，基尔希将十八世纪末重建联系后的夏威夷社会与公元一千年末期马克萨斯群岛首批殖民者传入的波利尼西亚文化进行了比较。最初，这里有几个小型的亲属群体，他们实行自给自足，按年龄、性别和等级划分，由一位酋长领导，酋长负责奉献第一批收成，并记住族谱，以证明被认可的成员有权使用珊瑚礁和农田。最终，数十万人在一个由相互交织的领地和寺庙分割的领土内，被划分为三个行政等级。他们就这样被划分成几个等级，有的脸上有纹身的贱民仆人，有的要履行徭役、纳贡才能获得劳动成果自给自足的平民家庭，还有的是由世袭酋长（ali'i）和官方礼拜形式的祭司组成的内生群体，他们拥有土地和海岸线，拥有宫廷首席工匠，还有那些垄断战争、寺庙仪式、历史知识以及宫殿中珍贵物品的重新分配和消费的人。这两个时期之间发生了什么？

To do so, Kirch compares Hawaiian society, described once contact was reestablished in the late eighteenth century, with the Polynesian culture imported by the first colonists from the Marquesas Islands at the end of the first millennium. Initially, there were a few small kin groups practicing self-subsistence, differentiated by age, gender, and rank and headed by a chief who offered up the first harvest and memorized the genealogies justifying access to the coral reefs and cropland for recognized members. Eventually, there were several hundred thousand people divided into three administrative levels in a territory segmented by interlocking domains and temples. They were thus hierarchized into pariah servants with tattooed faces, commoner households that had to perform statute labor and render tributes to obtain the right to feed and dress themselves from the fruit of their work, and the endogenous group of hereditary chiefs (ali‘i) and priests of the official form of worship, owners of the land and coastline, head craftsmen at court, and those holding the monopoly over warfare, ritual practice at temples, historical knowledge, and the redistribution and consumption of prestige goods stored at the palaces. What had happened between these two times?

群岛的人口和人口密度不断增加，最终不得不在东部岛屿的平原上种植山药和红薯，以补充西部岛屿的泻湖水产养殖和芋头的灌溉种植。然而，种植活动受降雨波动和边际劳动生产率较低的不利因素影响，因此，随着农业集约化发展，需要大量劳动力。亲属群体数量的不断增长加剧了各部落之间的法定竞争。酋长的数量不断增加，他们面临着年轻亲戚篡夺他们权力或获得自治权的企图。这导致了对越来越大剩余产品的榨取，从而加强了粮食和手工业生产的集约化和扩张。这两个内在联系的过程在16世纪后期导致了一个新的局面：可用土地的枯竭与土壤的枯竭和劳动边际生产率的下降同时发生，尤其是在平原地区。夏威夷原住民发动了对西部岛屿的领土征服战争，以扩大他们的附庸基础，并能够利用他们所缺乏的劳动力和生态资源。随后，他们在宗教和婚姻领域进行了创新：首先，为他们武士精英保留了兄弟姐妹之间乱伦生育和岛屿间贵族通婚的神圣特权；其次，通过颠覆宗教意识形态来服务于军阀的利益，通过建造新的庙宇来进行一年一度的巡回庆典（mahaliki），在战神和农神之间交替，通过将缴纳贡品和开始敌对行动仪式化，并且将第一次收获的祭品和对祖先的家庭崇拜替换为现在以动物和植物为中心的活动。
